description.hltext_display: Senators call on EPA to set drinking water standard for hexavalent chromium
description.content:
LOS ANGELES, Calif. - California's two Democratic U.S. senators have called on the Environmental Protection Agency to protect the public from hexavalent chromium following a report that found the carcinogen in the tap water of 31 cities across the U.S.
In a letter obtained Tuesday by The Associated Press, Sen. Barbara Boxer, who chairs the Senate environment and public works committee, said she plans to introduce legislation with California colleague Sen. Dianne Feinstein that would set a deadline for the EPA to establish an enforceable standard for the chemical also known as chromium 6. The committee will also hold a hearing on the issue in February.
The letter was sent after the release of a study by the Environmental Working Group that analyzed drinking water in 35 cities across the country. The five cities with the highest levels of chromium 6 were Norman, Oklahoma; Honolulu, Hawaii; Riverside, California; Madison, Wisconsin; and San Jose, California.
The chemical is commonly discharged from steel and pulp mills, metal-plating plants and leather-tanning facilities, the group said in the report.
"There are no enforceable federal standards to protect the public from hexavalent chromium in tap water," read the letter to EPA chief Lisa Jackson.
The EPA currently tests for total chromium levels but the letter said the tests do not show precise amounts of chromium 6. In addition, the agency's chromium standard is outdated because it was set nearly two decades ago, the letter said.
EPA spokesman Jalil Isa could not immediately comment on the letter. However, the agency did issue a response to the study.
"Ensuring safe drinking water for all Americans is a top priority for EPA," the statement said. "The agency regularly reevaluates drinking water standards and, based on new science on chromium 6, had already begun a rigorous and comprehensive review of its health effects."
In September, the agency released a draft of a scientific review. When the assessment is finalized in 2011, the agency will determine whether new standards need to be set.
Studies show that chromium 6 can cause cancer in people and has also been found to cause damage to the gastrointestinal tract, lymph nodes and liver of animals.
The federal government's current total chromium standard is 100 parts per billion. California has set a goal for safe limits for chromium 6 at 0.06 parts per billion.
The public became aware of the dangers of chromium 6 as a result of the hit movie "Erin Brockovich" in 2000, which followed a case in which Pacific Gas & Electric Corp. was accused of leaking the contaminant into the groundwater of Hinckley, a small desert town.
The utility subsequently agreed to a $333 million settlement with more than 600 residents who blamed the contamination for a variety of health problems including cancer.

description.hltext_display: ．嫌犯蘆洲拒捕企圖衝撞警方 警開三槍嫌棄車逃逸
description.content: 台北縣蘆洲警方，22號上午在集賢路，兩名員警正在返回派出所，看到一台黑色自小客車，沒有懸掛車牌，因此上前盤查，但駕駛拒絕受檢，還開著車就衝出去；員警馬上展開追捕，追到五華街口，員警再度要駕駛下車，但駕駛不聽，還企圖衝撞員警， 警方對著輪胎開三槍示警，但嫌犯依舊加速逃逸，蘆洲警方表示，車子剛才在微風運河的停車場已經找到，也查出這輛車是報失竊的，但嫌犯已經棄車逃逸，目前警方還在找尋嫌犯的行蹤。

description.hltext_display: Wladimir wants Haye fight - Vitali
description.content:
Vitali Klitschko says his brother, Wladimir, is ready to agree a fight with David Haye, it was reported on Tuesday.
Wladimir holds three of the current world heavyweight belts, Vitali one and Haye the other.
"Wladimir is ready to fight Haye. It is always Haye who comes up with the excuses," the elder Klitschko told the Golzka paper. "Last year we had a signed contract and that wasn't enough. Haye has the last remaining title that doesn't belong to a Klitschko. There are no problems with us to make a fight with Haye." But, after Wladimir's fight with Dereck Chisora was called off 10 days ago owing to injury, Vitali says that his sibling is ready to do business with Haye, who has made no secret of his desire to unify the division by his 31st birthday in October - the day he will retire from the sport.
Haye's manager Adam Booth said: "We are now perfectly positioned to get together and make this fight with Wladimir Klitschko.
"Despite the fact we know we bring more UK television money to the table, David and I are happy to split the entire pot 50-50 and grant Wladimir the deal he has wanted since day one. We have offered them 50-50 on everything - just as they requested - and now see no reason why this tremendous fight can't happen. The path is clear."
Booth added: "We have removed every possible excuse and have shown we are serious about making this fight become a reality. I'll smoke him out if I have to.
"I only pray Wladimir is as serious as we are, because this fight needs to happen for the good of the sport."

description.hltext_display: Peltner und der FCE: Keine Vertragsverlängerung vor Weihnachten
description.author: DIRK MLLERS
description.content: Rheine. Grn-Wei hat es getan, Amisia ebenso und krzlich verlngerte auch der SV Mesum den Vertrag mit dem Cheftrainer der 1. Mannschaft. Nur der FC Eintracht Rheine lsst sich noch Zeit und legt kein Geschenk in Form eines bis 2012 datierten Arbeitspapieres unter den Weihnachtsbaum. Wir sind noch dabei, momentan gibt es nichts Neues, blockt Sportleiter Klaus-Peter Forst ab und mutmat, dass sich in der Woche vor dem FCE-Hallenturnier (7./8. Januar) etwas bewegen wird. In einer ersten Gesprchsrunde mit den Vorstandsmitgliedern Manfred Laumann und Michael Kortevo stellte Peltner, Trainer der 1. Mannschaft, seine Vorstellungen einer weiteren Zusammenarbeit vor. Wir haben uns getroffen, wobei ich meine Standpunkte dargelegt habe. Jetzt ist die andere Seite am Zug, wartet der 46-Jhrige auf eine Rckmeldung. Bis zum 29. Dezember ruht der Ball, dann bittet er das Personal zum ersten Hallenturnier der Winterrunde. Beginn ist um 14 Uhr bei Borussia Emsdetten in der Euregio-Halle.

description.hltext_display: Biddeford woman charged with arson for two fires
description.content:
Edna Godin, pictured here, was arrested on Friday and charged with with arson in connection with a fire Thursday night at an apartment building at 358 Main St. (SUBMITTED PHOTO)
Staff Writer
Published:
BIDDEFORD — A 43-year-old woman has allegedly confessed to starting two fires, including a 2009 blaze that destroyed a three-story, five-unit apartment building on Kossuth Street, displacing several residents.
Both fires broke out in buildings where she lived. Police arrested Edna Godin on Friday, and charged her with arson in connection with a fire Thursday night at an apartment building at 358 Main St.
It was during the course of an interview with detectives that Godin allegedly confessed to starting both the Main Street fire as well as the 8 Kossuth St. fire on May 19, 2009, said Biddeford Deputy Police Chief JoAnne Fisk in a prepared statement.
Godin was arraigned at York County Jail via video link in Springvale District Court Monday, and her bail was set at $10,000 cash or personal recognizance with a Maine pre-trial contract. Such contracts usually mandate that those charged with crimes adhere to a number of conditions. As of Monday afternoon, Godin remained incarcerated, a booking officer said.
Godin had been a tenant at the 8 Kossuth St. building, along with her daughter. Interviewed by the Journal Tribune shortly after the fire, her daughter Samantha Godin said she lost everything that day, including her shoes.
One resident had to be treated with oxygen at the scene of the 2009 fire and was taken by ambulance to Southern Maine Medical Center. None of the victims of that fire had renter’s insurance and most lost all of their possessions.
Firefighters and police responded to a fire at 358 Main St. at about 10 p.m. Thursday.
Police said an individual who reported the fire told them the asbestos siding had been set alight but had gone out – asbestos was once used in exterior siding because of its heat and fire resistance.
Police officers noticed that several newspapers had been stuffed underneath the siding.
Fisk said Godin is known to police and has in the past been charged with such crimes as assault and hindering apprehension.
Arson is a Class A felony. The maximum sentence upon conviction is 30 years in prison.
— Staff Writer Tammy Wells can be contacted at 324-4444 or twells@journaltribune.com.

description.hltext_display: Krefeld gewinnt DEL-Verfolgerduell in Berlin
description.content:
Berlin (dpa) - Ex-Meister Krefeld Pinguine hat in der Deutschen Eishockey-Liga das Verfolgerduell bei den Eisbären Berlin gewonnen. Der Champion von 2003 siegte 3:2 (1:0, 1:1, 0:1) nach Penaltyschießen und verteidigte Rang drei vor den Berlinern.
Während die Krefelder nach zuletzt zwei Niederlagen wieder einen Erfolg verbuchten, verloren die Eisbären zum dritten Mal nacheinander. Tabellenführer ist weiter Düsseldorf vor Wolfsburg.
Krefeld ging nach einem Berliner Scheibenverlust durch Patrick Hager (13.) in Führung, Torwart Rob Zepp ließ den Schuss des Nationalspielers passieren. Derrick Walser (29.) glich im zweiten Drittel aus, musste danach aber ebenso wie Krefelds Daniel Pietta wegen einer Spieldauerdisziplinarstrafe vorzeitig vom Eis. Richard Pavlikovsky (38.) schoss die Pinguine erneut in Front, Frank Hördler (43.) egalisierte zum 2:2. Die Partie wurde am Ende der regulären Spielzeit erneut von einer Schlägerei überschattet. Pavlikovsky war im Penaltyschießen als einziger Schütze erfolgreich.
Mehr zu: Eishockey DEL

description.hltext_display: ．會計師用假發票侵佔774萬 被判一年十個月
description.content:
洪姓會計師利用職務之便，涉嫌業務侵占，遭台北地院判1年10個月。會計事務所洪姓負責人，涉嫌利用職務之便，在替委託人處理公司稅務申報時，以不實的進項發票，作為該公司的扣抵銷項稅額，再趁機侵占公司774萬餘元。
(潘千詩報導)
洪姓男子是台北市大安區一間會計事務所的負責人，民國94年開始，欣欣茶葉公司委託這間事務所，幫忙處理公司的稅務申報，洪姓男子竟涉嫌利用職務之便，非法取得呷尚寶跟馥躍公司的不實進項發票，作為欣欣茶葉的進項憑證以抵扣銷項稅額，更趁機侵占欣欣茶葉超過774萬元。後來，欣欣茶葉遭到國稅局檢舉逃漏稅，並裁處罰鍰，欣欣茶葉這才發現，是洪姓男子所為，憤而告上法院。
法院審理後，洪姓男子坦承犯行，而且犯後態度良好，另外，洪姓男子已經和欣欣茶葉達成和解，最後，法院是依業務侵占罪，判處洪姓男子期徒刑1年10個月，全案可以再上訴。

description.hltext_display: شيرين تصالح جمهورها بـ «ما تعتذرش»
Video's DNA could check piracy
description.content: Washington, Dec 22 : Israeli researchers have developed a novel technique to track video piracy and nip it in the bud. The technique is "video DNA matching". It detects aberrations in pirated videos in the same way that biologists detect mutations in the genetic code to determine an individual's family connections.Alex Bronstein of Tel Aviv University's Department of Electrical Engineering, with his twin Michael, as also Ron Kimmel, has developed the solution to stop video pirates - treating video footage like DNA. "It's not only members of the animal and plant kingdom that can have DNA," says Bronstein who was inspired by sequencing tools used in bioinformatics labs, according to a Tel Aviv statement. "If a DNA test can identify and catch criminals, we thought that a similar code might be applicable to video. If the code were copied and changed, we'd catch it."Of course, video does not have a real genetic code like members of the animal kingdom, so Bronstein and his team created a DNA analogue like a unique fingerprint that can be applied to video files. The technology employs an invisible sequence and series of grids applied over the film, turning the footage into a series of numbers. The tool can then scan the content of websites where pirated films are believed to be offered, pinpointing subsequent mutations of the original.Video piracy occurs on a massive scale, causing the global film industry and the US economy loss of billions of dollars annually.Production companies know their only hope in recouping stolen content is by automating the process. "Video DNA" can provide a more accurate and useful form of this automation.

event_or_fact.property: Tel Aviv University's Department of Electrical Engineering

description.hltext_display: Sidak & Teece decken Netzneutralitätsregulierungen auf
description.content:
> Home > Meldungen > PR-Ticker > Sidak & Teece decken Netzneutralitätsregu… 22.12.2010 00:37 Uhr
Die Wirtschaftsargumentation der Netzneutralitätsregulierung, die voraussichtlich diese Woche bei der Federal Communications Commission eingehen wird, ist im Wesentlichen fehlerhaft, so die Professoren J. Gregory Sidak und David J. Teece. In einem Artikel aus dem Journal of Competition Law & Economics, herausgeben von ...
Washington (ots/PRNewswire) - Die Wirtschaftsargumentation der Netzneutralitätsregulierung, die voraussichtlich diese Woche bei der Federal Communications Commission eingehen wird, ist im Wesentlichen fehlerhaft, so die Professoren J. Gregory Sidak und David J. Teece. In einem Artikel aus dem Journal of Competition Law & Economics, herausgeben von der Oxford University Press, erklären Sidak und Teece, dass die geplanten Regulierungen der FCC eine Verbannung oder Beschränkung bewirken würden der freiwilligen Business-to-Business Geschäftsvorgänge zwischen Breitband-Internetanbieter (Internet-Service-Provider, ISPs) und Inhatanbietern, die für verbessertes Liefern der Pakete übers Internet da sind. Die geplante "Gleichbehandlungs-" Regel würde ironischerweise aktiv gegen alle Arten von Inhalt oder Anwendung diskiminieren, die sich im Gewissheitsbedürfnis für bessere Übertragungsqualität übers Internet (auch bekannt als Quality of Service oder QoS) von dem was undifferenzierte, beste Lieferanstrengungen bieten könnten, unterscheiden. Dieser Resultat würde nicht nur die stationäre Effizienz reduzieren durch die Unterstützung der hohen Verbraucherpreise, sondern würde auch dynamische Effizienz reduzieren durch ein Zurückhalten der Innovation.
Den vollen Text finden Sie auf der folgenden Seite: http://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=1593761.
David J. Teece ist der Vorsitzender und Principal Executive Officer der Berkeley Research Group LLC (http://www.brg-expert.com) und der Thomas-W.-Tusher-Professor in Global Business an der Haas School of Business an der University of California, Berkeley.
Beide sind international anerkannte Experten in Sachen Kartellrecht, geistiges Eigentum, Regulierungen der Netzwerkindustrien und komplexe Wirtschaftsprozesse.
Originaltext: Criterion Economics, L.L.C.
Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/82680
Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_82680.rss2
Pressekontakt: CONTACT: Allison Crowley, +1-202-518-5120, acrowley@criterioneconomics.com

description.hltext_display: Blagoslov Spomen-križa u Domu hrvatskih hodočasnika u Rimu
description.content:
U četvrtak, 16. prosinca 2010. otkriven je i blagoslovljen u Domu hrvatskih hodočasnika u Rimu veliki križ visine 3,3 metra. Križ je podignut u spomen Velikoga Jubileja 2000. godine te istodobno i u spomen svim Hrvatima koji su kroz povijest dali svoje živote za vjeru i domovinu; posebice je posvećen žrtvama dugogodišnjeg komunističkog režima te žrtvama Domovinskog rata.
Križ je izraden od bračkoga kamena i od cigala iz ruševina razorenog svetišta Gospe Aljmaške. Kamen za izradu križa darovalo je poduzeće Jadran Kamen s Brača, a umjetnički ga je oblikovao akademski kipar Lovre Jaksić. Na tri kamene ploče koje su postavljene uz Spomen-križ stoje natpisi koji tumače smisao i značenje ovoga Spomen-križa. Natpis na posljednjoj ploči završava riječima:
KAO ZNAK NAŠEGA SPASENJA OVAJ KRIŽ KOJI SE IZDIŽE IZ RUŠEVINA RAZORENOG ALJMAŠKOG GOSPINA SVETIŠTA, SVJEDOČI I PORUČUJE: ISUS KRIST POBJEĐUJE SVAKO ZLO I PO SVOJEM KRIŽU I USKRSNUĆU PREOBRAŽAVA SVAKU PATNJU ZA DOBRO ONIMA KOJI U BOGA VJERUJU I NJEGA LJUBE.
Svečanost blagoslova križa počela je najprije u Kapeli Doma gdje je sve nazočne pozdravio o. Božidar Nagy, idejni začetnik ovoga projekta koji je upoznao uzvanike o značenju ove inicijative koja se pripremala deset godina, o tijeku njezina ostvarenja te je potom podijelio posebne zahvalnice svim darovateljima ovoga pothvata. Hrvatski veleposlanik RH u Italiji Tomislav Vidošević pozdravio je također sve nazočne i u svome je dojmljivom govoru izrazio zadovoljstvo što se ponovno nalazi u hrvatskom Domu i što sudjeluje u ovoj svečanosti obilježavanja uspomene na sve hrvatske žrtve.
Nakon programa u kapeli svi nazočni pošli su do križa koji je podignut u vrtu Doma gdje ga je otkrio i blagoslovio vlč. Ljubomir Galov.
Ovaj Spomen-križ, jedinstven po svojoj zamisli, poruci i izradi, koji povezuje hrvatski jugozapad s krajnjim sjeveroistokom, ali i po materijalu iz kojega je izrađen, bit će i mali oltar hrvatske domovine u Vječnom gradu gdje će brojni hrvatski hodočasnici navraćati i pomoliti se za vječni pokoj svih onih koji su ugradili svoje živote za slobodnu hrvatsku domovinu i ostavili nam svjedočanstvo svoje kršćanske vjere.

description.hltext_display: Pickup truck crash leaves one dead in Lake Charles
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Wednesday, December 22, 2010 12:38 AM EST
NEWS More>>
Stay In Touch More>>
Local News, Weather, Traffic, Sports, Stocks, Movies on your Cell Phone More>>
LAKE CHARLES, LA (KPLC) – The driver of a pickup lost control on LA 385 (Common Street) Tuesday night and rolled over. The driver later died at the hospital.
State Police say the driver lost control making a left hand turn from a parking lot, hit a curb and rolled over several times. The driver was not wearing a seat belt and was ejected from the vehicle. He was rushed to a hospital where he died.
A passenger in the truck was also injured, suffering what are described as minor injuries.
The crash remains under investigation.

description.hltext_display: Federer gewinnt erstes Benefizspiel gegen Nadal
description.content:
Zürich (dpa) - Roger Federer hat das erste von zwei Tennis-Benefizspielen gegen seinen großen Rivalen Rafael Nadal gewonnen. Der Schweizer siegte in Zürich im «Match for Africa» 4:6, 6:3, 6:3 gegen den Weltranglisten-Ersten aus Spanien.
/sport/tennis/news/art787,532778,B?bn=619604
Rafael Nadal bei der Vorstellung vor dem Match in Zürich.
Foto:
12 000 Zuschauer verfolgten das anderthalbstündige Spiel zu guten Zwecken. Beide treffen in Madrid erneut aufeinander. Der Millionen-Erlös der beiden Veranstaltungen kommt den jeweiligen Stiftungen der Stars zugute. Den bislang letzten offiziellen Vergleich hatte Federer im November in London im Finale des ATP World Tour Finals gewonnen.
Mehr zu: Tennis Federer Nadal

description.hltext_display: دمشق محطة دياب في رأس السنة
description.content: أكدت مصادر مقربة من المطرب عمرو دياب أنه قرر التوجه إلى دمشق بديلا عن بيروت لإحياء حفل فندق مطار دمشق الدولي، حيث سيذهب هو وأولاده وزوجته زينة عاشور، على أن يذهبوا جميعاً إلى أميركا لثلاثة أيام فقط لقضاء إجازة قصيرة، بعدها يعود ليستأنف العمل في ألبومه الجديد. ورجحت هذه المصادر أن يكون إلغاء المطرب المصري لحفلة بيروت سببه مشاركة جان صليبا في الحفل، حيث دخل دياب مع الأخير في نزاع قانوني بعد إلغائه حفل رأس السنة العام الماضي. omar - بلد آخر ابو احمد - الإمارات الجيشاوي - الإمارات عصمت غزال - الإمارات ذخر بوحمده - الإمارات

description.hltext_display: Kamene jaslice Hrvatice u Udinama
description.content:
U četvrtak, 16. prosinca 2010. otkriven je i blagoslovljen u Domu hrvatskih hodočasnika u Rimu veliki križ visine 3,3 metra. Križ je podignut u spomen Velikoga Jubileja 2000. godine te istodobno i u spomen svim Hrvatima koji su kroz povijest dali svoje živote za vjeru i domovinu; posebice je posvećen žrtvama dugogodišnjeg komunističkog režima te žrtvama Domovinskog rata.
Križ je izraden od bračkoga kamena i od cigala iz ruševina razorenog svetišta Gospe Aljmaške. Kamen za izradu križa darovalo je poduzeće Jadran Kamen s Brača, a umjetnički ga je oblikovao akademski kipar Lovre Jaksić. Na tri kamene ploče koje su postavljene uz Spomen-križ stoje natpisi koji tumače smisao i značenje ovoga Spomen-križa. Natpis na posljednjoj ploči završava riječima:
KAO ZNAK NAŠEGA SPASENJA OVAJ KRIŽ KOJI SE IZDIŽE IZ RUŠEVINA RAZORENOG ALJMAŠKOG GOSPINA SVETIŠTA, SVJEDOČI I PORUČUJE: ISUS KRIST POBJEĐUJE SVAKO ZLO I PO SVOJEM KRIŽU I USKRSNUĆU PREOBRAŽAVA SVAKU PATNJU ZA DOBRO ONIMA KOJI U BOGA VJERUJU I NJEGA LJUBE.
Svečanost blagoslova križa počela je najprije u Kapeli Doma gdje je sve nazočne pozdravio o. Božidar Nagy, idejni začetnik ovoga projekta koji je upoznao uzvanike o značenju ove inicijative koja se pripremala deset godina, o tijeku njezina ostvarenja te je potom podijelio posebne zahvalnice svim darovateljima ovoga pothvata. Hrvatski veleposlanik RH u Italiji Tomislav Vidošević pozdravio je također sve nazočne i u svome je dojmljivom govoru izrazio zadovoljstvo što se ponovno nalazi u hrvatskom Domu i što sudjeluje u ovoj svečanosti obilježavanja uspomene na sve hrvatske žrtve.
Nakon programa u kapeli svi nazočni pošli su do križa koji je podignut u vrtu Doma gdje ga je otkrio i blagoslovio vlč. Ljubomir Galov.
Ovaj Spomen-križ, jedinstven po svojoj zamisli, poruci i izradi, koji povezuje hrvatski jugozapad s krajnjim sjeveroistokom, ali i po materijalu iz kojega je izrađen, bit će i mali oltar hrvatske domovine u Vječnom gradu gdje će brojni hrvatski hodočasnici navraćati i pomoliti se za vječni pokoj svih onih koji su ugradili svoje živote za slobodnu hrvatsku domovinu i ostavili nam svjedočanstvo svoje kršćanske vjere.

description.hltext_display: Haiti cholera toll rises to 2,591
description.content: Port-au-Prince, The toll in the deadly cholera epidemic in Haiti has risen to 2,591, officials said. Since the cholera epidemic struck the poverty-stricken Caribbean country in mid-October, 121,518 people have been affected by the outbreak, of whom 63,711 were hospitalised, according to a latest report from the health ministry released on Tuesday. The epidemic has spread to all of Haiti's 10 provinces, but the hardest hit is Artibonite, where over 800 people have died. The disease which broke out in neighbouring Dominican Republic, first appeared in the country in October in Mirebalais city. A French medical study said the outbreak was caused by human waste being dumped in a river by a camp of Nepalese soldiers, members of the UN Mission for the Stabilisation of Haiti (Minustah). UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon has said that he will form a group of scientific experts to investigate the origin of the cholera epidemic in Haiti.

event_or_fact.property: he will form a group of scientific experts to investigate the origin of the cholera epidemic in Haiti.

description.hltext_display: ICVL to appoint adviser on Riversdale stake bid: Source
description.content:
NEW DELHI: An Indian consortium of state-run companies will meet later on Wednesday to appoint a merchant bank to advise on whether it should bid for a stake in Africa-focused Riversdale Mining , a source at a member of the consortium said.
"We are inclined towards bidding (for a stake in Riversdale) subject to the outcome of due diligence," the source said, requesting anonymity.
The members of the International Coal Ventures consortium are NTPC , Steel Authority of India, NMDC , Coal India and Rashtriya Ispat Nigam Ltd.
"The board is meeting this evening to appoint a merchant banker to do the due diligence," the source added.

description.hltext_display: Stari božićni običaji Hrvata u Mađarskoj
description.content:

description.hltext_display: Elevance Renewable Sciences bringt in 3. Finanzierungsrunde 100 Million Dollar auf
description.content:
> Home > Meldungen > PR-Ticker > Elevance Renewable Sciences bringt in 3. F… 22.12.2010 03:22 Uhr
Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc. gab heute bekannt, dass das Unternehmen in seiner dritten Finanzierungsrunde 100 Million US-Dollar aufgebracht hat. Elevance stellt aus nachwachsenden Rohstoffen leistungsstarke Inhaltsstoffe her, die in Pflegeprodukten, Reinigungsmitteln, Schmierstoffen und anderen Spezialchemikalien- und Treibstoffmärkten eingesetzt werden. Neben TPG ...
Bolingbrook, Illinois (ots/PRNewswire) - Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc. gab heute bekannt, dass das Unternehmen in seiner dritten Finanzierungsrunde 100 Million US-Dollar aufgebracht hat. Elevance stellt aus nachwachsenden Rohstoffen leistungsstarke Inhaltsstoffe her, die in Pflegeprodukten, Reinigungsmitteln, Schmierstoffen und anderen Spezialchemikalien- und Treibstoffmärkten eingesetzt werden. Neben TPG Biotech und TPG Growth gehören nun zu den Finanzgebern des Unternehmens auch neue Investoren wie Total Energy Ventures International und, allen voran, Naxos Capital Partners.
Die Investitionen unterstützen das anhaltende Wachstum von Elevance, unter anderem die Expansion und Einrichtung von Bioraffinerien in Asien, Nord- und Südamerika.
Bei der Gründung von Elevance im Jahr 2007 investierten TPG, Cargill and Materia Kapital und Technologie im Wert von über 40 Millionen Dollar. Zu den wichtigsten Eckpunkten in der Entwicklung von Elevance im Jahr 2010 gehört das Joint Venture mit Wilmar International für den Bau der weltweit grössten Bioraffinerie in Indonesien sowie ein Entwicklungskooperationsvertrag mit Stepan Company zur Kommerzialisierung neuartiger Tenside und antimikrobieller Substanzen. Zu den strategischen Partnern von Elevance zählen neben Wilmar International und Stepan Company auch Cargill Inc., Dow Corning Corporation, Trent University, Tetramer Technologies, United Soybean Board und SaskCanola.
Informationen über Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc.
Das in Bolingbrook im US-Bundesstaat Illinois ansässige Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc. stellt Spezialchemikalien aus natürlichen Ölen her. Mithilfe der so genannten Olefinmetathese, eines mit dem Nobelpreis ausgezeichneten Verfahrens, produziert das Unternehmen leistungsstarke Inhaltsstoffe, die in Pflegeprodukten, Reinigungsmitteln, Treibstoffen, Schmiermitteln und anderen Spezialchemikalienmärkten eingesetzt werden. Weitere Informationen über Elevance erhalten Sie auf http://www.elevance.com
Informationen über Naxos Capital Partners
NAXOS Capital Partners ist eine in Luxemburg ansässiges Private-Equity-Gruppe, die sich dem Erwerb und der Weiterentwicklung von Unternehmen mit einzigartigem geistigem Eigentum oder Marktpositionen widmet. Insbesondere konzentriert sich das NAXOS-Team dabei auf Investitionen in Bereichen, in denen es bereits in der Vergangenheit erfolgreich war, z. B. Landwirtschaft, Lebensmittel, Energie und saubere Technologie. Mit einem aktiven, praktischen Ansatz engagiert sich NAXOS für die den Aufbau langfristiger, nachhaltiger Werte für die Unternehmen und Investoren seines Portfolios.
Informationen über Total Energy Ventures
Total Energy Ventures ist der Venture-Capital-Zweig von French oil & gas major Total. Mit seinen Investitionen unterstützt das Unternehmen die Weiterentwicklung von Firmen mit innovativen Technologien und Geschäftsmodellen in Bereichen wie alternative und erneuerbare Energien, effiziente Nutzung von Energie und natürlichen Ressourcen, Abfallwirtschaft und Reduzierung der Treibhausgase usw., die dazu beitragen werden, die Herausforderungen der Energieumstellung zu bewältigen. Seine Investitionen bestehen vorwiegend darin, bei Kapitalerweiterungen ausgewählter Unternehmen Minderheitsbeteiligungen zu erwerben und damit deren Weiterentwicklung mitzufinanzieren.
Total ist einer der grössten Öl- und Gaskonzerne der Welt und in mehr als 130 Ländern tätig. Seine 96.000 Mitarbeiter bringen ihr Fachwissen in allen Bereichen der Branche ein - Exploration und Gewinnung von Öl und Erdgas, Raffination und Marketing sowie Gas- und Energiehandel. Total arbeitet für die Versorgung der Welt mit Energie - sowohl heute als auch morgen. Darüber hinaus ist der Konzern auch im Bereich von Chemikalien ganz vorne mit dabei.
Informationen über TPG Biotech
TPG Biotech ist Teil der Wachstums- und Venture-Investment-Plattform der globalen privaten Investmentgesellschaft TPG. TPG Biotech investiert in pharmazeutische Entdeckungen und Entwicklungen, Medizintechnik, Diagnostik, Gesundheitswesen und pharmazeutische Dienstleistungen, Biowissenschaften sowie industrielle Anwendungen der Biotechnologie. TPG Biotech kann auf die grösseren Ressourcen von TPG zugreifen. Besuchen Sie http://www.tpgbiotech.com.
Informationen über TPG Growth
TPG Growth ist die Plattform der globalen privaten Investmentgesellschaft TPG für das mittlere Marktsegment und Wachstumsinvestitionen. TPG Growth investiert mit Hilfe von Leveraged Buyout, Wachstumsaktien und so genannten PIPE-Strukturen (Private Investment in Public Equity) in verschiedensten Branchen und geographischen Gebieten. TPG Growth unterhält Niederlassungen in den USA, China und Indien.
ANSPRECHPARTNER PRESSE: Anthea Holley und Mia Quinn, Public Strategies, Inc. +1-940-704-0777 und +1-202-354-8270 aholley@pstrategies.com und mquinn@pstrategies.com

description.hltext_display: Clemson star, Albany native Young has Tigers rolling after career game
description.content:
ALBANY — Andre Young was glad his father Colie was happy. Or maybe he was just glad dear old dad was finally off his back.He’s still not sure.
What the former Deerfield star and current Clemson starter is sure of is that his Tigers have won two in a row after a loss during his homecoming (to the area) at Florida State on Dec. 12 — and Young had a career night to show for it along the way.
“My dad was actually at the game,” Young told The Herald on Tuesday about his career-high 22-point night in a 71-61 win against UNC-Greensboro on Sunday at Littlejohn Coliseum in South Carolina. “He’s been bugging me forever to break that 20-point mark, so he was really happy for me.”
Young paused, then added with a laugh: “But just when I thought I got him off my back, now he wants me to break 30.”
Well, thanks to a challenge by Clemson (7-4) head coach Brad Brownell to become more defensive-minded after that 75-69 loss to FSU — which Young says has led the Tigers to many more easy buckets in transition on offense — the opportunity for more breakout games like that for the Albany native could be just around the corner.
Clemson started the season 5-1, then hit a rough patch and lost three in a row, a streak that culminated with the defeat in Tallahassee that night as nearly 40 family and friends were on hand to see Young play.
“That, to me, is one of my biggest games of the year because (it’s an ACC game) and because I had so many people there that I don’t get to see very often (any more),” said Young, whose supporters all sat right behind the Clemson bench in a big group thanks to Young’s teammates graciously giving up their road-game tickets so their junior point guard could accommodate everyone.
Young’s previous career-high was 19 points, which he scored twice — once against the Seminoles a year ago, then tied it later in the season against Missouri. Young had 11 points in the Dec. 12 loss to FSU — all in the first half — but was shut out the second half, leaving Young searching for answers as to what was wrong with his team after the game.
“We just need to work on everything. Just communicating better. Playing better defense. The whole nine yards,’’ Young told The Herald outside the Clemson locker room after the loss to the Seminoles. “We have a long way to go but it’s a long season, so we just need to start working (to fix it) now.’’
That work started the very next day.
Young says Brownell came to practice the following Monday and preached about how the team needed to get away from the focus of having an explosive offense like years past, and just get back to the basics in Brownell’s new motion offense he brought to the Tigers when he was hired away from Wright State in the offseason to replace Oliver Purnell, who left for the vacant job at DePaul.
“Coach just made us realize that we needed to focus more on defense, and stop people from scoring. Then our scores (would come as a product of that),” said Young, who also dished out a team-high five assists, went 8-for-14 from the floor and 4-for-8 from 3-point range, as well as two steals and three rebounds, in his career night against UNC-Greensboro. “I think everyone got caught up — the team, the media, everyone — about how this new offense was supposed to be so up-tempo and fast-paced, that we forgot about defense.
“Once we started playing better defense, the offense just came (naturally).”
Clemson became a different team almost overnight.
In the Tigers’ next game this past Friday after the loss to FSU, they held Savannah State to just 40 points in a 61-40 rout as Young scored 10 and added three steals to bring his team-high swipe total to 20.
Then the Tigers turned around two days later and beat UNC-Greensboro, holding the Spartans to a staggering 16 first-half points.Young said of the game-high: “It was really because of our defense. We’d make a steal, get it down the court quickly and guys were just making that extra pass, finding me open, and I was just hitting the shots.”
Young said he doesn’t keep track of personal stats while on the court — “Most guys don’t, but it just depends on the player,” he added — and that he only found out he surpassed his previous career high after he came off the court.
“The big thing on my mind (when I’m out there) is just winning the game,” he said. “And if that means scoring points, that’s what I’m gonna try and do. I got a couple of pats on the back afterward, though, when the guys found out (it was a career night for me).”
Next up, the Tigers have four very winnable games on their schedule — beginning tonight on the road at College of Charleston, then three straight home contests (vs. Delaware State, East Carolina and The Citadel) — before they get back to ACC play Jan. 8 against Miami at Littlejohn Coliseum.
And while the Tigers know the big boys — Duke and North Carolina — are just around the corner, Young says their focus is just getting better game-by-game.
And so far, so good.
“I think we’re going in the right direction now, and we’re probably playing our best basketball,” he said. “We’re starting to pick up more on everything (coach Brownell is teaching us), and our practices are more defensive-focused.
“I think this team has a good chance of doing something big this year.”After Albany native and Clemson starter Andre Young and his Tigers hit rock bottom following a loss 10 days ago to FSU — their third straight defeat — the former Deerfield star rallied his guys together for two wins in a row, complete with Young’s best game of his career.

description.hltext_display: Pobjeda Schild, Jelušić 16.
description.content:
Pobjednica trećeg slaloma sezone u francuskom Courcheveleu je Austrijanka Marlies Schild s vremenom 1:34,95.
Drugo je mjesto sa zaostatkom od 78 stotinki sekunde zauzela Finkinja Tanja Poutianen, koja je bila u vodstvu nakon prve vožnje, a treća s 1,98 sekundi zaostatka Slovenka Tina Maze.
Hrvatska skijašica Ana Jelušić prvi je put ove sezone izborila plasman u drugu vožnju, i to 12. pozicijom u prvoj. No u drugom laufu, posebno u donjem dijelu staze, malo je pokvarila plasman te se morala zadovoljiti sa 16. mjestom s 3,68 sekundi zaostatka za Marlies Schild. No, bitno je da je Riječanka osvojila prve bodove (15) u Svjetskom kupu i nadamo se da slijede bolji nastupi.
U prvom slalomu sezone u Leviju Jelušić se nije uspjela plasirati među najboljih 30, dok je u drugom u Aspenu odustala.
Već nakon prve vožnje bilo je jasno da neće biti promjena na samom vrhu poretka Svjetskoga kupa, jer su i Amerikanka Lindsey Vonn i Njemica Maria Riesch odustale.
Nakon tri slalomske utrke na vrhu redoslijeda Svjetskog kupa u toj disciplini su Schild i Poutiainen s 200 bodova, ispred Šveđanke Marije Pietilae-Holmner sa 174 boda. U ukupnom redoslijedu Svjetskog kupa vodi Vonn s 581 bodom, a tri manje ima drugoplasirana Maria Riesch.

description.hltext_display: حديقة الحنين
description.content: «حنين حنين حنين.. أنا دايبة فيك حنين.. والغربة دوبتني، لكن ما توهتني، عنّك طول السنين.. عنّك طوال السنين». غالية بن علي في أذنيّ. عصفور يرعى قرب قدمي ولا أكترث. ثم يطير. يعرج في طيرانه، كطفل صغير أو شيخ عجوز أو جنيّة المكنسة التي تعيش فوق الأشجار. حشرة صغيرة، أصغر من الحرف، لا أعرف لها اسما، تتجوّل على الكتاب الذي في يدي. العصفور يعود. أخلع قميصي الأصفر المشعّ كي لا يظنّ أنني أغويه كما لو أنّه بعوضة. البعوض هو الذي ينساق الى الأصفر، والعصافير لا تحب أن يحطّ الناس من قدرها، وهي تعي فرادتها الوجودية بشكل جيّد. أرمي له فتات الخبز الذي اشتريته هذا الصباح. الخبز إسباني، هكذا قال لي جاري البقّال الإيراني، في «بر دبي»، محاولا إغوائي، لكنّ العصفور، رغم ذلك، لم يكترث. يخطو فوق الخبز كأنّه هند رستم في فيلم «شفيقة القبطية» تفشج فوق رأس حسين رياض «الطايح» تحت قدميها، وتختال في مشيتها كملكة العصور كلّها. أحببت ذلك العصفور، رغم أنّه قرر أن يهرب قبل أن التقط له صورة بالكاميرا الديجتال. ربما، لذلك أحببته. لأنّه فضّل أن يكون جزءا من ذاكرتي المنسيّة، بدلا من أن يتجمّد في ذاكرتي الافتراضية المؤرشفة في ملفات صفراء على جهاز الكومبيوتر. هكذا، تكون الغواية، دائما، أجمل. لكنني في كل الأحوال، اكتشفت أنّ لا مكان لصورة مضافة تتسّع لها ذاكرة الكاميرا وانّه يتوجبّ عليّ أن أمحو بعض صور، قبل أن ألتقط أيّ واحدة جديدة. هل كان العصفور لينتظر؟ أضع الكاميرا في فردة الحذاء والهاتف في فردة أخرى. يعحبني المنظر. التقط لهما صورة. لحظة، قلت الكاميرا في فردة الحذاء، كيف ألتقط لها صورة اذا؟ يبدو أنها ليست الكاميرا تماما تلك التي كانت في فردة الحذاء. مجرّد غطائها. شيء لا قيمة حقيقية له، سوى أنّه يغطّي عري الكاميرا. ويحافظ على الصورة. هند رستم، في الفيلم، لا تتعرّى رغم أنّ في حذائها خمر. أقوم بمباعدة الفردتين بزاوية، قد تكون ثلاثين درجة. بات لكلّ منهما اتجّاه خطوات مختلف. تهاجمني صورة فتاة تأكل الكرز.«.. لم يكن حبا في الحقيقة، بل فرحا أبيض دافئا ولذيذا. فرح بها وبحضورها الشفيف..»، أقرأ في الكتاب، فيما نسيم يلفحني في ظهري المتعرّق بفضل قماش قميصي الأصفر، الذي تخالطه خيوط «نايلون»، والذي خلعته منذ دقيقة.«..والأكيد أنّها تعرف حتى الأشياء بالغة الخصوصية التي تحصل بيننا. فرجاء تحكي لها كلّ شيء. كل شيء. مهما بدا صغيرا وتافها...». الباكستاني الذي يمرّ الى جانبي يغنّي. لم أسمعه لأن الموسيقى كانت لا تزال في أذنيّ، لكنّ حركة رفيقه الذي كان ينظر الى عينيه بولع ويلوّح بأصابعه كمن يهدهد النغمات، أوحت اليّ بذلك. ولطالما سألت نفسي ما اذا كان سائقو التاكسي والعمال يغنون وراء المقود وتحت الرافعات وعلى «سقالات» الأبراج، ولمن يغنون: «حنين حنين حنين.. أنا دايبة فيك حنين.. والغربة دوبتني، لكن ما توهتني، عنّك طول السنين.. عنّك طوال السنين». ibrahimt@albayan.ae omar - بلد آخر ابو احمد - الإمارات الجيشاوي - الإمارات عصمت غزال - الإمارات ذخر بوحمده - الإمارات

description.hltext_display: India mulls ways to adjust pared debt auction size
description.content:
NEW DELHI, Dec 22 - India may either auction 100 billion rupees of debt on Feb. 18 to make up for the recent cuts in auction sizes or adjust it by topping up its scheduled weekly auctions, a finance ministry official said on Wednesday.
The official, who has direct knowledge of the matter but did not want to be named, said the timing of the bond auction would depend on the liquidity situation.
The scheduled weekly bond auctions run until Feb. 11.
Bond yields nudged up briefly with the benchmark 10-year bond yield IN078020G=CC edging up 3 basis points to 7.96 percent after the comments, but retreated as traders were expecting the government to adjust the auction size cuts with supply later.
Tight cash conditions have been weighing on market sentiment. Banks have been borrowing around 1 trillion rupees daily on an average since last month. They borrowed 1.6 trillion rupees at the morning repo auction held by the Reserve Bank of India on Tuesday.
Cash conditions have been tight on tepid government spending and an increase in the currency in circulation due to heavy withdrawals by depositors during the festival season.
An estimated outflow of 550 billion to 600 billion rupees as advance tax payments for the December quarter has worsened the liquidity situation.
To inject liquidity into the system, the government reduced its borrowing size by 50 billion rupees each at two auctions this month, while the Indian central bank announced it would buy upto 480 billion rupees bonds through open market operation.
A source in the finance ministry had earlier told Reuters that there would be no change in the federal government's scheduled borrowing programme. [ID:nBMA009186]
The government, which had set a borrowing target of 4.57 trillion rupees for the current fiscal year, later scaled it down by 100 billion rupees mainly due to better-than-expected revenue from auctions of telecoms spectrum.

description.hltext_display: Schlagerspiel Füchse - Kiel im Pokal-Viertelfinale
description.content:
Berlin (dpa) - Die Füchse Berlin und Handball-Rekordmeister THW Kiel treffen im Schlagerspiel des Viertelfinales um den DHB-Pokal aufeinander. Das ergab die Auslosung durch Tennis-Spielerin Sabine Lisicki in Berlin.
Die Füchse hatten im Achtelfinale daheim Cup-Verteidiger und Bundesliga-Spitzenreiter HSV Hamburg ausgeschaltet. Am 1. oder 2. März empfangen außerdem die Rhein-Neckar Löwen die MT Melsungen, Frisch Auf Göppingen erwartet den SC Magdeburg, Zweitligist VfL Bad Schwartau ist Gastgeber für die SG Flensburg-Handewitt.

description.hltext_display: Oklahoma population grew almost 9 percent since 2000
description.content:
Dec. 22--Oklahoma's population grew by almost 9 percent in the last decade as the state added 300,000 residents, the U.S. Census Bureau said Tuesday.
The latest population count meant Oklahoma had 3,751,351 residents on April 1. That's up from 3,450,654 people in the 2000 Census. The state slipped one place in the rankings and is now the 28th-largest in the nation.
Oklahoma has shown a healthy rate of growth during the last decade, said Deidre Myers, director of research and economic analysis with the state Commerce Department. Those coming to the state have been attracted by stable home prices and a low cost of living.
"Oklahoma has had sustainable growth," Myers said. "We haven't had bubbles like Nevada or Arizona, which causes problems with infrastructure and other things. We haven't been experiencing decline like the states with economic woes.
"Our growth patterns fall right in line with the kind of economic growth and wage growth we've had."
Nationally, the country added 27.3 million people between 2000 and 2010. The nation's population was 308.7 million on April 1, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. That reflected a growth rate of 9.7 percent, the slowest rate since 1940.
California, with 37.2 million people, continues to be the country's most populous state. At the other end of the scale, Wyoming is the least populous state with 563,000 people.
Along with state and national population totals, the Census Bureau released the latest numbers of seats for each state in the U.S. House of Representatives. Under that process -- called apportionment -- Oklahoma remained at five House seats. The state lost a seat after the 2000 Census.
U.S. Rep. Tom Cole, R-Moore, said redrawing congressional districts in Oklahoma likely would be a lot less contentious than a decade ago. That process ended up in court because then-Gov. Frank Keating, a Republican, and the Democrats in the Legislature disagreed on the boundaries.
"It won't be a 'life-or-death situation' like we had in 2001 and 2002," Cole said.
"Of course, the final decisions lie with the Legislature and the governor."
Cole said he expects minor changes among existing congressional district boundaries.
"The current lines generally make a lot of sense," Cole said. "They don't split many counties, and where they do, there are good reasons like including military installations."
8 states gain seats
Texas was the big winner in the latest apportionment, gaining four seats in the House to bring it to 36 seats. Florida added two seats. The Rust Belt states of New York and Ohio each lost two seats. In all, 18 states will trade 12 House seats ahead of the 2012 elections.
Keith Gaddie, a redistricting expert and political science professor at the University of Oklahoma, said the south and west continue to be winners in both population gains and political power.
"If you look at the states where seats were lost, they are mainly being lost in states where Barack Obama won," Gaddie said. "They're mainly being gained in states where Obama lost, or where Obama is probably going to lose in 2012."
Gaddie said Republicans control the redistricting process in most of the states that gained House seats.
Oklahoma, which grew 8.7 percent in the last decade, was No. 16 on the list for adding a House district, Gaddie said. With the latest population numbers, the House of Representatives would have to increase to 451 members for Oklahoma to gain a seat. It has been set at 435 members since 1911.
State redistricting
In February and March, the Census Bureau will release population and racial breakdowns so states can work on redrawing the boundaries for legislative districts.
Rep. Dale DeWitt, R-Braman, co-chairman of the state House steering committee on redistricting, said early estimates point to the addition of about 2,300 people per House district. Most House districts had about 34,000 people at the time of the last census.
The new data likely will show a continuation of the trend of faster growth in suburban Oklahoma City and Tulsa and slower growth in many rural areas.
"That in itself dictates that the lines are going to change, and especially in some rural areas, quite drastically," DeWitt said. "It brings new districts into urban areas, as well."
Legislative redistricting leaders have held several public meetings to gather input from residents and to educate them on the redistricting process. More meetings are planned for early 2011.
"At the end, the lines are going to change, and not everybody's going to be happy, but we're going to be as fair as we can and do the best we can," DeWitt said.
Sen. Clark Jolley, R-Edmond, co-chairman of the Senate's redistricting committee, said committee members and staffers are preparing for the new data to be released next year.
"Clearly we have to draw fair and legal lines where the population lives," Jolley wrote in an e-mail. "While there is additional population in the two metro areas, we will continue to have a healthy representation from rural areas as the census data will likely show."
Legislative leaders and Gov.-elect Mary Fallin must agree on a state legislative redistricting plan by the end of the 2011 session in May. New lines for congressional and county districts are supposed to be finished before the candidate filing period for the 2012 elections.
To see more of The Oklahoman, or to subscribe to the newspaper, go to http://www.newsok.com.
Copyright (c) 2010, The Oklahoman, Oklahoma City

description.hltext_display: Medveščak slavio u Salzburgu
description.content:
Pobjednica trećeg slaloma sezone u francuskom Courcheveleu je Austrijanka Marlies Schild s vremenom 1:34,95.
Drugo je mjesto sa zaostatkom od 78 stotinki sekunde zauzela Finkinja Tanja Poutianen, koja je bila u vodstvu nakon prve vožnje, a treća s 1,98 sekundi zaostatka Slovenka Tina Maze.
Hrvatska skijašica Ana Jelušić prvi je put ove sezone izborila plasman u drugu vožnju, i to 12. pozicijom u prvoj. No u drugom laufu, posebno u donjem dijelu staze, malo je pokvarila plasman te se morala zadovoljiti sa 16. mjestom s 3,68 sekundi zaostatka za Marlies Schild. No, bitno je da je Riječanka osvojila prve bodove (15) u Svjetskom kupu i nadamo se da slijede bolji nastupi.
U prvom slalomu sezone u Leviju Jelušić se nije uspjela plasirati među najboljih 30, dok je u drugom u Aspenu odustala.
Već nakon prve vožnje bilo je jasno da neće biti promjena na samom vrhu poretka Svjetskoga kupa, jer su i Amerikanka Lindsey Vonn i Njemica Maria Riesch odustale.
Nakon tri slalomske utrke na vrhu redoslijeda Svjetskog kupa u toj disciplini su Schild i Poutiainen s 200 bodova, ispred Šveđanke Marije Pietilae-Holmner sa 174 boda. U ukupnom redoslijedu Svjetskog kupa vodi Vonn s 581 bodom, a tri manje ima drugoplasirana Maria Riesch.

description.hltext_display: Dinamova želja za boljom prošlošću
description.author: Dražen Krušelj
description.content:
Neobičan slučaj Benjamina Buttona na hrvatski način. U godini kada bi trebao ponosno proslaviti 66. godišnjicu djelovanja, ostarjeti preko noći i roditi se kao stogodišnjak. Na današnjoj skupštini onaj dosadni i konfekcijski prefiks "nogometni klub" dobit će društvo pa ćemo ubuduće pred sobom imati "građanski nogometni klub". To će, usput rečeno, djelovati vrlo zbunjujuće na svakoga tko je uživo Benjamin Button, junak kratke pripovijetke Scotta Fitzgeralda, rodio se kao jako star i odživio je život unatrag, od duboke starosti prema djetinjstvu. U trenutku kad je kretao na fakultet, njegove su vršnjake "pucali" hormoni i teško su se koncentrirali na gradivo koje je on rasturao lijevom rukom. Međutim, umjesto da u zrelim godinama nastavi briljirati, Benjamin bi na važnom sastanku iznenada zaspao i općenito su ga sustizali znakovi staračke demencije. Predviđam da će Dinamo krenuti istom stazom.
Sljedeće godine živahni će stogodišnjak pucati od zdravlja i sve oko sebe daviti povijesnim reminiscencijama, ali već za deset godina tražit će da mu na rođendansku tortu stave svjećicu s brojkom 75 i prevrnut će Plavi salon tražeći onih 100 milijuna kuna od prodaje Vrsaljka i Kovačića koje je, eto, jučer skrio tamo "iza one vaze".
Siroče jedno zaboravno, neće se moći sjetiti da je isti novac prije pet godina pohranio na skrbničkom računu na Cipru. Do 100. rođendana 2045. godine potpuno će prolupati i zahtijevati da mu u grb vrate i malu zvijezdu petokraku.
O građanskom nogometnom klubu skupštinari bi danas mogli naširoko i nadugačko raspredati. Na dnevni red već su sletjeli krajnje živopisni prijedlozi i primjedbe. Na primjer, zašto građanski, a ne HAŠK građanski nogometni klub Dinamo? Ili, zašto se Građanski i Dinamo ne bi smjenjivali po principu par-nepar? Neke su skupštinske guje u njedrima, vjerojatno Hajdukovi diverzanti, predlagali da klubu u prefiks uvale "malograđanski" nogometni klub, ali su uvijek budni Mirko Barišić i Zdravko Tomac odmah shvatili njihovu namjeru. Ne dolazi u obzir jer bi akronim MNK previše podsjećao na "malonogometni klub" Dinamo.
Oni sa slonovskim pamćenjem i uvidom u pouzdanije dokumente tvrde da je Dinamu promašeno nametati Građanski jer je klub 1945. u život pustio haškovac Ivica Medarić, i ubrzo se preselio na HAŠK-ovo igralište. I u prvom derbiju s Partizanom u momčadi crno-bijelih istrčalo je više nogometaša Građanskog, nego na plavoj strani. Ali opet, ne budimo nepravedni prema Dinamu. On samo čezne za boljom prošlošću, baš kao i mnogi drugi klubovi na ovim prostorima. Hajduk je, primjerice, iskoristio prvu priliku za bijeg od aure kluba narodnooslobodilačke vojske i već petnaestak godina dično u prefiksu nosi naziv "hrvatski". I Rijeci je, čini se, bila muka od maltretiranja s "fiumanštinom" i optužbama da je ekspozitura velikih srpskih klubova, pa se od svega obranila prelaskom u HNK. Jedino valjda Hrvatski dragovoljac nema ovaj prefiks u imenu. Oni su klub osnovali kao Hrvatski nogometni klub Dragovoljac, ali im je onaj "NK" poslije postao smetnja...
U potrazi za zlatnim nogometnim vremenima, uz malo mašte i Fredija Kramera kao ovlaštenog historiografa, ne bismo se smjeli zaustaviti na pola puta. Siguran sam da arheološke lokacije u srcu Slavonije kriju dokaze da su Marsonia i Cibalia igrali ozbiljne prvenstvene utakmice sve tamo do 476. godine pr. n. e. i pada Zapadnog Rimskog Carstva. Priča se i da su rimske legije naziv ukrale baš od brodske navijačke grupe.
Uslijedit će vrijeme progona nogometaša kršćana koji sljedećih nekoliko stoljeća igraju prijateljske utakmice po katakombama. Nogomet je na ovim prostorima oživio tek dolaskom hrvatske reprezentacije na zimske pripreme u sedmom stoljeću, što naši povjesničari i umjetnici malo pretenciozno nazivaju "dolaskom Hrvata na more".

description.hltext_display: Stadium sparkles under floodlights
description.content:
The snow-covered Olympic Stadium sparkled under floodlights for the first time on Monday night.
Prime Minister David Cameron, accompanied by a choir of local schoolchildren, hit the button for the big switch-on which shone a megawatt of light on to the showpiece venue.
It was the first time that all 532 bulbs had been lit together - in a scene that will be repeated during the London 2012 Games.
Mr Cameron joked that the 537 million stadium in Stratford, east London, looked more like a winter Olympic venue with ski-jumper 'Eddie the Eagle' expected at any moment rather than the setting for the London 2012 summer Games.
But he told the 400-strong invited crowd, which included 2012 builders at the site: "It is being delivered on time and on budget thanks to British genius and many of the people here."
Introductions were carried out by London Mayor Boris Johnson, who described it as a "wonderful and historic evening", while also joking that with plans so advanced, including 75% of building work complete, London 2012 might consider holding a snap Olympics now 17 months before the Games "to catch the world napping".
During the switch-on, Mr Cameron added: "In 2012 a light will shine on all of our country as billions look on.
"I want the world to see that Britain is a confident, forward-looking country - a great place to live, work, invest and do business.
"I want to see huge spin-off benefits as people come and see our culture, heritage, great cities, countryside and our dynamism - and decide they want to come back again.
"Seeing the stadium lit up is incredibly exciting and I can't wait for the Games to begin."

event_or_fact.property: In 2012 a light will shine on all of our country as billions look on.
which included 2012 builders at the site: "It is being delivered on time and on budget thanks to British genius and many of the people here.

description.hltext_display: Lass mich deinen Herzschlag hören
description.content:
> Home > Meldungen > PR-Ticker > Lass mich deinen Herzschlag hören
22.12.2010 08:22 Uhr
Was, wenn das Prüfen Ihrer Herzschlagfrequenz genauso leicht wäre wie Musik hören, während Sie joggen? Dank des Fortschritts in der Weltraumtechnologie wird ein iPhone bald in der Lage sein, beide Aufgaben zu erfüllen - Sie mit Ihren Lieblingsmusikern und mit Ihren Vitalparametern ...
Noordwijk, Niederlande (ots/PRNewswire) - Was, wenn das Prüfen Ihrer Herzschlagfrequenz genauso leicht wäre wie Musik hören, während Sie joggen? Dank des Fortschritts in der Weltraumtechnologie wird ein iPhone bald in der Lage sein, beide Aufgaben zu erfüllen - Sie mit Ihren Lieblingsmusikern und mit Ihren Vitalparametern in Einklang zu halten.
Das Ergebnis ist eine korrekte Ablesung Ihrer Herzschlagfrequenz, ohne die Unannehmlichkeit, einen Brustgurt tragen zu müssen.
"Viele Menschen hören Musik, während sie Sport treiben, und viele Menschen empfinden die Gurte als unangenehm," sagte Dr. Andrea Ridolfi von CSEM, "also dachten wir, es wäre eine gute Idee, die Herzfrequenz über das Ohr zu messen."
Lösung dank Weltraumtechnologie
Frühere Versuche von CSEM, die Herzfrequenz über Ohrhörer zu messen, waren nicht zufriedenstellend, sagte Dr. Ridolfi, da die verfügbare Technologie nicht ausgereift genug war. Doch das änderte sich, als CSEM im Rahmen einer langfristigen medizinischen Studie der ESA einen komplexen Brustsensor zur Messung der Blutsauerstoffwerte von Astronauten entwickelte. "Wo wir das nun geschafft haben," meinte Dr. Ridolfi, "sagten wir uns, verwerten wir das doch nochmals."
Mit einem Zuschuss aus der Initiative "Technologie-Transfer-Demonstrator" im Rahmen des ESA TTP entwickelte CSEM den Prototyp. Die Initiative unterstützt die Entwicklung von neuer Hardware und Software, um die Lücke zwischen Weltraumtechnologie und deren irdischer Nutzung zu überbrücken.
Eine iPhone-Anwendung zeigt Ihre Herzfrequenz über einen längeren Zeitraum auf dem Bildschirm an und vergleicht zum Beispiel Ihren heutigen Jogging-Lauf mit dem von letzter Woche. Personen, die das Gerät während ihres Fitness-Trainings getestet haben, gaben dem Gerät sehr gute Noten. Während der jetzige Prototyp nur die Herzfrequenz misst, könnten zukünftige Versionen so angepasst werden, dass sie auch andere Vitalparameter wie etwa die Blutsauerstoffwerte messen könnten. Dadurch ergäbe sich eine Reihe von medizinischen Anwendungsmöglichkeiten.
"Technologietransfer aus dem Weltraum hat ein enormes Potential, Innovationen in Bereichen anzutreiben, in denen man es normalerweise nicht erwartet, Weltraumtechnologie zu finden," erklärt Frank M. Salzgeber, Leiter des ESA TTP. "ESA TTP möchte der europäischen Industrie helfen, ausgeklügelte Lösungen für den Weltraum in ihren Märkten zu nutzen."
Aufruf an Technologie-Transfer-Demonstratoren: http://www.technology-forum.com/demonstrators/
Mehr Informationen: http://www.esa.int/ttp
Originaltext: European Space Agency ESA/ESOC
Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/54530
Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_54530.rss2
Pressekontakt: CONTACT: Kontakt: ttp@esa.int / +31-71-565-6208

description.hltext_display: Transport agency at the ready as snow rolls in
description.content:
Sweden's Transport Administration (Trafikverket) has allocated extra resources to remove the large amounts of snow covering transport routes, as London air traffic is expected to return to normal easing the passage of thousands of stranded Swedes.
Rail chaos continues as snow record awaits (21 Dec 10)
Thousands of Swedes trapped in flight chaos (21 Dec 10)
Heavy snow set to disrupt Christmas traffic (20 Dec 10)
After a very cold night across the country, down to lows of -36 degrees Celsius in Idre in central Sweden, a new weather front carrying snow is on its way into northern Götaland and Hälsingland.
Swedish meteorological agency, SMHI, has issued a class 1 warning (of three on an ascending scale) for about a decimetre of snow in Hälsingland during the morning and around noon.
Air traffic to and from London is however set to resume to near-normal levels on Wednesday.
"As it stands right now, we have cancelled a London flight from Stockholm in the afternoon and from Gothenburg, we have cancelled a return flight to London. We sincerely hope that we will be able to operate the rest," said SAS CIO Elisabeth Manzi.
The situation in London remains chaotic however with SAS alone having around 6000 Swedes stranded there.
The airline is planning to switch to larger aircraft in order to get as many home in time for the holidays as possible.
"But it's hard to sit and promise something, it becomes such a delicate situation when so many are affected. But now we are crossing our fingers because we really need to ease the pressure," said Elisabeth Manzi.
"Of course, our goal is that everyone will get to celebrate Christmas at home. We are doing everything we can to get everyone home."
SAS has called in extra staff to answer questions and take care of the re-booking for all those affected, but waiting times have been very long.
"We hope for understanding, but they (the passengers) have needed to equip themselves with a great deal of patience."
In Paris, Amsterdam and Frankfurt the airlines have managed to service the stranded passengers, as traffic has largely been maintained, albeit with delays and cancellations.
in Sweden, the Transport Administration has put in extra resources to avoid a repeat of yesterday's snow-related problems. The ambition is to keep long-distance trains rolling.
"What we now have is the aftermath of yesterday's major problems with the switches," said Tommy Andersson at national rail operator SJ's press office.
"Some trains have ended up in the wrong place in the tumult, one can say."
Some 20 trains in the Mälardalen region around Stockholm will be replaced by coaches and some passengers have been rescheduled to other departures.
"Otherwise it is all rolling on, generally it looks good," Andersson said.

event_or_fact.property: As it stands right now, we have cancelled a London flight from Stockholm in the afternoon and from Gothenburg, we have cancelled a return flight to London.; We sincerely hope that we will be able to operate the rest

But it's hard to sit and promise something, it becomes such a delicate situation when so many are affected.; But now we are crossing our fingers because we really need to ease the pressure; Of course, our goal is that everyone will get to celebrate Christ
Otherwise it is all rolling on, generally it looks good

description.hltext_display: Cibona u očekivanju nove uprave
description.content:
Pobjednica trećeg slaloma sezone u francuskom Courcheveleu je Austrijanka Marlies Schild s vremenom 1:34,95.
Drugo je mjesto sa zaostatkom od 78 stotinki sekunde zauzela Finkinja Tanja Poutianen, koja je bila u vodstvu nakon prve vožnje, a treća s 1,98 sekundi zaostatka Slovenka Tina Maze.
Hrvatska skijašica Ana Jelušić prvi je put ove sezone izborila plasman u drugu vožnju, i to 12. pozicijom u prvoj. No u drugom laufu, posebno u donjem dijelu staze, malo je pokvarila plasman te se morala zadovoljiti sa 16. mjestom s 3,68 sekundi zaostatka za Marlies Schild. No, bitno je da je Riječanka osvojila prve bodove (15) u Svjetskom kupu i nadamo se da slijede bolji nastupi.
U prvom slalomu sezone u Leviju Jelušić se nije uspjela plasirati među najboljih 30, dok je u drugom u Aspenu odustala.
Već nakon prve vožnje bilo je jasno da neće biti promjena na samom vrhu poretka Svjetskoga kupa, jer su i Amerikanka Lindsey Vonn i Njemica Maria Riesch odustale.
Nakon tri slalomske utrke na vrhu redoslijeda Svjetskog kupa u toj disciplini su Schild i Poutiainen s 200 bodova, ispred Šveđanke Marije Pietilae-Holmner sa 174 boda. U ukupnom redoslijedu Svjetskog kupa vodi Vonn s 581 bodom, a tri manje ima drugoplasirana Maria Riesch.

description.hltext_display: [Goal.com] EPL 전반기 워스트 11
description.author: Sangyoon Jeon
description.content: 골키퍼 로버트 그린 (웨스트 햄, 17경기 출� � 30 실� �)그린의 이번 시즌은 시작되기� �에 이미 꼬여버� �다. 남아공 월드컵 미국과의 조별리그에서 끔찍한 실수로 잉글랜드의 승리를 � � �버� �던 그린은 충격에서 헤어나오지 못 하는 모습이다. 아스널를 상대로 � 방을 펼치기도 했지만 그린의 불운은 지난 여름 이후 계속되� 있다. 가장 최근에는 맨체스터 시티와의 홈 경기에서 자책골을 기록하며 아브람 그랜트 감독과 팬들을 실망시켰다. 수비수 � �임스 페르쉬 (뉴캐슬 � 나이티드, 8경기 출� � 1자책골)페르쉬는 시즌 초반 부상으로 결장했던 대니 심슨의 공백을 메우기 위해 크리스 휴튼 � � 감독이 노팅엄 포� �스트로부터 영입했다. 뉴캐슬의 승격과 함께 프리미어 리그에서 첫 시즌을 치르게 됐지만 의욕이 지나쳤을까. 그는 시즌 초반 5경기에서 매경기마다 경� 를 받아 출� �� �지 징계를 받았� , 스� 크 시티와의 홈 경기에서는 자책골까지 기록하며 1-2 패배의 원흉이 되었다. 심슨이 부상에서 회복해 복귀한 후 페르쉬는 벤치로 밀� �났다.안톨린 알카라즈 (위건, 16경기 출� � 1득� �)파라과이 출� 의 수비수 알카라즈는 지난 여름 남아공 월드컵 직� � 클럽 브루헤로부터 영입되었다. 알카라즈는 파라과이의 남아공 월드컵 8강 진출의 주역으로 활약하며 기대를 모았지만 프리미어 리그에서는 수준 이하였다. 알카라즈가 합류한 위건의 수비진은 시즌 초반 2경기에서 10골을 실� �하는 최악의 수비� �을 보였다.매튜 업슨 (웨스트 햄, 16경기 출� � 1자책골)웨스트 햄의 형편없는 수비는 골키퍼 로버트 그린만의 잘못은 아니다. 그리� 업슨은 그린과 마찬가지로 남아공 월드컵에서의 부진이 이번 시즌까지 이어지� 있다. 업슨은 볼턴 원더러스와의 2라운드 경기에서 자책골을 기록한 이후 잉글랜드 국가대표 답지 않은 경기� �을 보여주� 있� , 리그 최다 실� �을 기록한 웨스트 햄은 최하위에 머물러 있다. 폴 콘체스키 (리버풀, 13경기 출� �)콘체스키는 지난 여름 로이 호지슨 감독을 따라 풀럼을 � 나 리버풀에 입성했지만 기대에 못 미치� 있다. 올 시즌 리버풀의 성� �이 부진하면서 콘체스키는 호지슨 감독과 함께 팬들에게 가장 큰 비난을 받� 있는 � 수이기도 하다. 특히 � 트넘 원� � 경기에서 추가 시간에 아� � �넌을 막지 못 하� 결승골을 헌납했을 때야 말로 올 시즌 최악의 순간이었다.미드필더크리스티안 폴센 (리버풀, 8경기 출� �)리버풀의 또 다른 영입 실패작. 폴센은 지난 여름 바르셀로나로 � 난 하비에르 마스체라노의 빈자리를 메우기 위해 � 벤투스로부터 영입됐지만 두 � 수의 몸값 차이만큼이나 현격한 실� � 차이를 드러냈다. 호지슨 감독의 폴센 영입은 지금까지는 실패인 듯 하다. 하미� �스 (첼시, 13경기 출� �)카를로 안첼로티 감독은 지난 여름 미하엘 발락, 조 콜, 데� 를 � 나 보낸 후 하미� �스를 야심차게 영입했다. 그러나 하미� �스는 지난 시즌 벤피카에서의 돋보였던 활약을 프리미어 리그에서는 재현하지 못 하� 있다. 하미� �스가 잉글랜드 무대에 � �응하지 못 하는 또 다른 브라질 � 수가 � 지는 좀 더 지켜봐야 � 지만 현재와 같은 모습이라면 첼시에 오래 남아있기는 힘들 듯 하다. 스티븐 아일랜드 (아스톤 빌라, 10경기 출� �)아스톤 빌라가 � �임스 밀너를 맨체스터 시티에 내주는 대� 거액의 이� �료와 함께 아일랜드를 받았을 때는 누구나 성공� �인 거래라� 평가했다. 그러나 친� �팀에서 방출당한 충격이 컸던 탓일까. 아이랜드는 좋은 활약은 커녕 실망스러운 경기� �으로 벤치로 밀� �나� 말았다. � �라르 울리에 감독마� � 아일랜드가 자� 의 재능을 100% 발휘하지 못 하� 있다� 비판했을 � �도로 좋지 않았다. 공격수마우로 보셀리 (위건, 7경기 무득� �)위건 팬들은 아르헨티나 국가대표로 A매치 2경기에 출� �한 � �이 있는 보셀리를 영입했다는 소식이 들� �왔을 때 테� 스나 밀리� , 이과인급의 � 수일 것이라� 기대했을지도 모르� 다. 그러나 600만 파운드의 이� �료를 들여 영입된 보셀리는 여� �히 프리미어 리그에서 데뷔골 조차 득� �하지 못 하� 있다. 사실 보셀리는 스완시 시티와의 칼링컵 경기에서 한 골을 득� �하기는 했다. � �이슨 스코틀랜드처럼 보셀리는 위건의 또 다른 실패작이 � 것 같다. 칼튼 콜 (웨스트 햄, 18경기 1득� �)칼튼 콜은 지난 시즌만 해도 잉글랜드 국가대표로 꾸준히 발탁� 수 있을 것 처럼 보였다. 그는 에밀 헤스키의 대체자로 평가되었� , 지난 여름에는 리버풀의 관심을 받기도 했다. 하지만 올 시즌 웨스트 햄의 부진과 함께 콜 역시 � 개없는 추락을 계속하� 있다. 공격수로서 18경기에서 1골은 형편없는 기록이다. 웨스트 햄의 최다 득� � � 수는 4골을 터트린 미드필더 스캇 파커와 올 시즌 영입된 프� �드릭 피키온이다. 루이 사아 (에버턴, 13경기 무득� �)에버턴의 데이비드 모예스 감독은 올 시즌 성� � 부진의 원인으로 공격수들의 골 결� �� � 부족을 지� �했� , 13경기에서 무득� �에 그치� 있는 사아가 이에 대한 책임을 회피� 수는 없을 듯 하다. 올 시즌 사아의 가장 빛났던 부분은 그의 오� �지색 머리였을 뿐이었다. 만약 그가 내년에도 에버턴에 남기를 원한다면 좀 더 분발해야 � 것 같다. 지금 에서 경기 프리뷰, 실시간 문자 중계, 최� & 최악의 � 수, � 수 랭킹 그리� 더 많은 � �보들을 확인하세요![GOAL.com 인기뉴스]☞ ☞ ☞ ☞ ☞ ☞ - 가장 � 른 뉴스, 실시간 twitter! 지금 @goalcom_kr을 추가하세요--ⓒ � � 세계 축구 네트워크 골닷컴 (http://www.goal.com/kr), 무단 � �재 및 재배포 금지-

description.author: David Boon

description.hltext_display: Seven hours to cross into Zim
description.content:
There is severe congestion at the Beit Bridge border post to Zimbabwe, with many regular travellers saying the service has not improved under the power-sharing government and is worse than it has been at other holiday times.
The volume of traffic has increased since companies in Zimbabwe and South Africa closed on Friday for the year.
Travellers on both sides of the border were complaining on Monday, saying it took up to half a day for them to get through both sides.
The former Zanu-PF government put in place time-consuming procedures to clear people and vehicles and failed to introduce computer systems to speed up imports and exports through the border. The unity government has done little to speed up the antiquated processes it inherited.
Christmas and New Year mark the main annual trek home for tens of thousands of Zimbabweans working in South Africa.
Officials on the Zimbabwean side said from 15 000-20 000 people a day were entering Zimbabwe, as opposed to about 2500 a day outside holiday seasons.
According to Immigration Department figures, 55 190 people entered Zimbabwe between Friday and Sunday night, while 21 738 left the country.
The Zimbabwean Revenue Authority and the Immigration Department have deployed staff members from other stations at Beit Bridge but the numbers remain inadequate.
The minister of transport, communication and infrastructure development, Nicholas Goche, a Zanu-PF member, and finance minister Tendai Biti, of the MDC, visited the border post on Monday.
The assistant regional immigration officer in charge, Charles Gwede, said: ?We have enlisted the services of the police to assist with controlling queues and preventing touts from entering the border post.? The Zimbabwean side of the Beit Bridge border post is filthy and the toilet facilities are largely unusable.
Biti promised improvements, saying: ?People are taking between six and seven hours to cross from Zimbabwe to South Africa. ?We are going to do everything within our power to improve the situation. This is affecting the speedy movement of cargo and private traffic.? The South African side is often understaffed. Many Zimbabweans say they bribe officials to speed entry. - The Mercury

description.hltext_display: Cuatro menores fueron asesinados en Ciudad Juárez
description.author: gentedigital.es
description.content: Cuatro menores de edad han sido asesinados en Ciudad Juárez, en el estado de Chihuahua, ubicado en el norte de México, por dos sujetos que interrumpieron a los jóvenes mientras jugaban un partido de fútbol, informó la Policía Municipal.

description.hltext_display: Koeln angažirao Rensinga
description.content:
Pobjednica trećeg slaloma sezone u francuskom Courcheveleu je Austrijanka Marlies Schild s vremenom 1:34,95.
Drugo je mjesto sa zaostatkom od 78 stotinki sekunde zauzela Finkinja Tanja Poutianen, koja je bila u vodstvu nakon prve vožnje, a treća s 1,98 sekundi zaostatka Slovenka Tina Maze.
Hrvatska skijašica Ana Jelušić prvi je put ove sezone izborila plasman u drugu vožnju, i to 12. pozicijom u prvoj. No u drugom laufu, posebno u donjem dijelu staze, malo je pokvarila plasman te se morala zadovoljiti sa 16. mjestom s 3,68 sekundi zaostatka za Marlies Schild. No, bitno je da je Riječanka osvojila prve bodove (15) u Svjetskom kupu i nadamo se da slijede bolji nastupi.
U prvom slalomu sezone u Leviju Jelušić se nije uspjela plasirati među najboljih 30, dok je u drugom u Aspenu odustala.
Već nakon prve vožnje bilo je jasno da neće biti promjena na samom vrhu poretka Svjetskoga kupa, jer su i Amerikanka Lindsey Vonn i Njemica Maria Riesch odustale.
Nakon tri slalomske utrke na vrhu redoslijeda Svjetskog kupa u toj disciplini su Schild i Poutiainen s 200 bodova, ispred Šveđanke Marije Pietilae-Holmner sa 174 boda. U ukupnom redoslijedu Svjetskog kupa vodi Vonn s 581 bodom, a tri manje ima drugoplasirana Maria Riesch.

description.hltext_display: Ezentis se adjudica dos contratos en Rumanía por 9,46 millones de euros
description.content:
La división de infraestructuras del Grupo Ezentis se ha adjudicado dos contratos en Rumanía por un importe global de 9,46 millones de euros, según ha informado la compañía.
En concreto, Ezentis se ha adjudicado, en consorcio con la rumana Complis, las obras de remodelación de la zona industrial de la localidad de Moreni, a 90 kilómetros al Norte de Bucarest, por valor de 8,8 millones de euros.
El otro contrato, adjudicado por la sociedad gestora de aguas de Bucarest, consiste en la renovación, ampliación y mantenimiento de la red de abastecimiento de aguas y saneamiento de varias calles de la ciudad. Este contrato, ganado por Ezentis en consorcio con Triada Prod Impex, está valorado en 660.000 euros.

description.hltext_display: Eurochallenge-Aus für Frankfurt - ALBA siegt
description.content:
Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Die Frankfurt Skyliners verpassten in der Eurochallenge trotz eines 72:60 (35:38) gegen den ukrainischen Vertreter Chimik Juschni den Sprung in die Zwischenrunde, weil zuvor Maccabi Haifa bei den Letten von BK Ventspils klar mit 62:99 (29:56) verloren hatte.
Damit ist die Basketball-Bundesliga im kommenden Jahr nur noch mit zwei Clubs im Europapokal vertreten. Ventspils sicherte sich Platz eins in der Gruppe B, während der direkte Vergleich mit Haifa gegen die Frankfurter sprach. Bester Werfer bei den Skyliners, die trotz drei Siegen ausschieden, war Spielmacher DaShaun Wood mit 18 Punkten.
Damit sind aus Deutschland in der zweiten Gruppenphase nur noch ALBA Berlin und die BG Göttingen im Eurocup dabei. Die EWE Baskets Oldenburg im Eurocup und die Telekom Baskets Bonn in der Eurochallenge hatten schon vor dem letzten Spieltag keine Chance mehr auf das Weiterkommen.
Etwas Selbstvertrauen tankte derweil ALBA Berlin im Eurocup. Drei Tage nach der Blamage von Bamberg, wo die Berliner in der Bundesliga die höchste Niederlage der Vereinsgeschichte kassiert hatten, gewann das Team des stark in die Kritik geratenen Trainers Luka Pavicevic bei den Russen von Krasnje Krylia Samara mit 72:68 (38:27). Damit schloss ALBA die Vorrunde damit ohne Niederlage ab. Bester Werfer bei den Berlinern, die zahlreiche Stammspieler geschont hatten, war Bryce Taylor mit 22 Punkten.
Niederlagen im Eurocup gab es für die BG Göttingen und die EWE Baskets Oldenburg. Die bereits für die Zwischenrunde qualifizierten Göttinger verloren bei Besiktas Istanbul nach Verlängerung mit 86:91 (79:79, 39:44). Oldenburg unterlag daheim gegen Le Mans mit 71:73 (41:38) und kassierte damit die fünfte Niederlage im sechsten Spiel. In der Eurochallenge verloren die Telekom Baskets Bonn bei KK Novo Mesto in Slowenien mit 65:70 (32:39). Die Rheinländer hatten schon zuvor alle Chancen auf ein Weiterkommen eingebüßt.
Mehr zu: Basketball Eurochallenge Frankfurt Bonn

description.hltext_display: Chatten mit dem Präsidenten? SUPER RTL zeigt mit der Komödie "E-Mail ans Weiße Haus", wie es geht Sendedatum: Sonntag, 26. Dezember um 23.05 Uhr
description.content:
> Home > Meldungen > PR-Ticker > Chatten mit dem Präsidenten? SUPER RTL ze… 22.12.2010 08:52 Uhr
Eine außergewöhnliche Chat-Bekanntschaft steht im Mittelpunkt der Komödie E-Mail ans Weiße Haus (Kanada / USA 2000). Um sich über die Meinungen der Jugendlichen zu informieren, loggt sich der US-Präsident unter Pseudonym in einen Chatroom ein. Schnell kommt es ...
Köln (ots) - Eine außergewöhnliche Chat-Bekanntschaft steht im Mittelpunkt der Komödie E-Mail ans Weiße Haus (Kanada / USA 2000). Um sich über die Meinungen der Jugendlichen zu informieren, loggt sich der US-Präsident unter Pseudonym in einen Chatroom ein. Schnell kommt es zu einem Austausch mit "Big Jack W", der dem mächtigsten Mann der Welt Tipps für seinen bevorstehenden Wahlkampf gibt. Dass allerdings der 13-jährige Kenny sein Chatpartner ist, ahnt der Präsident ebenso wenig, wie Kenny weiß, mit wem er es zu tun hat... Randy Quaid (Oscar-Nominierung für "Das letzte Kommando") und Billy Switzer spielen die Hauptrollen in dem Familienspaß, den SUPER RTL am 26. Dezember um 23.05 Uhr zeigt.
Originaltext: Super RTL

description.hltext_display: ACS en Alemania dice oferta por Hochtief se mantiene sin cambios
description.content:
La portavoz de ACS (Xetra: A0CBA2 - noticias) en Alemania dijo el miércoles que la oferta de la empresa por la alemana Hochtief (HOTF.EX - noticias) y su estrategia se mantiene sin cambios.
Esta mañana, ACS informó que a 21 de diciembre posee el 27,26 por ciento de los derechos de voto de Hochtief y que hasta la misma fecha habían acudido 5.825 acciones de la alemana a la opa.

description.hltext_display: Sensex jumps 77 points in opening trade
description.content: MUMBAI: Extending its gaining streak, the BSE benchmark Sensex rose by 77 points in opening trade today on sustained buying by funds, taking cues from other Asian markets. The 30-share index of the Bombay Stock Exchange rose by 77.07 points, or 0.38 per cent, to 20.137.39 points in opening trade. The Sensex has gained over 410 points in the previous three sessions. Similarly, the wide-based National Stock Exchange Nifty index moved up by 18.40 points or 0.31 per cent to 6,019.05. Buying activity was more pronounced in banking, metal and realty sector stocks, market analysts said. Continued buying by funds emboldened by driven by overnight gains in the US and a mixed trend in other Asian markets influenced the trading sentiment as well, they said. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index was up by 0.17 per cent in early trade today, but Japan's Nikkei Index was down by 0.21 per cent. In the US, the Dow Jones Industrial Index ended 0.48 per cent higher yesterday.

description.hltext_display: Toshiba Adds Preo Printelligence To The Companyâs Portfolio Of Managed Print Services
description.content:
New Application Provides Granular Reporting Down to the Individual User, Helping Businesses to Change Print Behaviors for the Better
Toshiba America Business Solutions Inc. (TABS) recently announced the introduction of Preo Printelligence, a managed print services (MPS) solution that helps businesses seamlessly manage end-user print behavior, cutting costs and reducing environmental impacts without affecting employee productivity. Dealers selling MPS can use this software solution as an optional component to the Toshiba Encompass Assessment, which assists companies seeking to optimize their document imaging fleet. Once installed, it will unobtrusively monitor usage on a granular, end-user level. Based on the data culled, rules can be customized to control or advise users on how and where to print, whereas other MPS solutions focus on device management, Preo Printelligence helps educate and modify end-user behavior.
"As a leader in MPS, we're always looking for ways to improve and expand our offerings to both dealers and customers," said Bill Melo, vice president, Marketing, Services and Solutions, TABS. "We chose Printelligence because it is a very flexible, rules-based, end-user-focused solution that will provide much more detail than we've been able to offer in the past. It truly helps employees understand the impact and cost of printing, and that in turn changes behavior quickly, and in a meaningful and lasting way."
How Preo Printelligence Works
Once Preo Printelligence is installed, data regarding company-wide print behavior is collected. Using information gleaned from that data, administrators choose which rules to implement. For example, one cost control rule is to inform a user that printing to a local device is more expensive than printing to a networked device. The next time a user tries to print to a local device, a message will appear on the user's screen with the cost of their last print job and the money they could have saved by printing to a networked device. One of the "green" rules is to reduce the number of simplex jobs. Once implemented, users trying to print more than two pages simplex will see a message letting them know that corporate policy recommends anything over two pages be printed duplex and asking the user to "think green" next time.
Administrators don't always have to choose these friendly reminder messages. Preo Printelligence enables tighter control of end user print behavior as well. Rather than the passive "recommendation," the message can say that corporate policy "mandates" this behavior.
Earlier this year, Toshiba announced they were partnering with Preo Software Inc., a market leader in Print Knowledge Management Systems. Toshiba will market Preo's Printelligence MPS solution throughout the United States, Mexico, Central and South America, and the Caribbean.
About TABS
Toshiba America Business Solutions Inc. (TABS) is an independent operating company of Toshiba Corporation, the seventh largest electronics/electrical equipment company in the world. TABS is a leading provider of managed print and professional services (MPS and PS), and manages product planning, marketing, sales, service, support and distribution of copiers, facsimiles, multifunction printing products, network controllers, and toner products throughout the United States, Mexico, Central and South America and the Caribbean. MPS and PS are strategic focus areas for the company, which first developed and began marketing the Encompass MPS program in 2003. Headquartered in Irvine, Calif., TABS has five divisions: the Electronic Imaging Division; the Toner Products Division; the Document Solutions Engineering Division; the International Division; and Toshiba Business Solutions (TBS), a wholly-owned subsidiary corporation of TABS, that operates a network of wholly-owned office equipment dealers throughout the United States.
Honored with the Channel's Choice top award for "Superior Performance" eleven times by the Business Technology Association (BTA), Toshiba's entire product line, customer support and marketing distribution policies are markers for the industry. For more information, visit www.copiers.toshiba.com.
SOURCE: Toshiba America Business Solutions Inc.
