description.hltext_display: Held at gunpoint in Somalia
description.content:
Cape Town journalists Chris Everson and Anton van der Merwe, who were arrested by security police in Somaliland as suspected mercenaries and detained for 10 days, arrived back yesterday saying they had simply ?been in the wrong place at the wrong time?. The experienced film crew, who covered violence in the Cape Flats in the 1980s and conflict in the Gulf, Afghanistan and Pakistan, say with hindsight they should have found out more about their filming assignment in Puntland, a semi-autonomous region in northern Somalia. ?We weren?t briefed on the assignment really except that it was about training of security guards. We got to Entebbe and were told ?jump on this charter?, which had a Russian crew. We didn?t even know what was on board the plane. It was a big learning curve?, sound man Van der Merwe said from his Tokai home yesterday.
The two often work for the American television network CBS?s 60 Minutes. But this assignment was commissioned by a friend and former CBS producer, Shawn Efran, who has his own film company.
They flew Kenyan Airways to Entebbe on December 8 and were due to leave on the Russian Antonov charter the same day, but were told to wait until December 10 for cargo to arrive on an SAA flight. Everson said: ?The only others on board were the six Russian crew, who couldn?t speak English. We didn?t know the flight plan, only that it was a nine-hour flight via Addis Ababa. After about three hours we landed in Hargeisa in Somaliland to refuel. ?The back of the plane was down and we were waiting. Some guys in uniform arrived and they searched our stuff, then the cargo. In the boxes were T-shirts and boots and instruments for looking under cars, innocuous stuff, not military. I didn?t know what was in the boxes; they came off the SAA plane. Then suddenly they said we were under arrest,? Everson said. The security police took them to a hotel, confiscated their cellphones, laptops and satellite phone, and instructed the hotel staff not to allow them to make or receive any calls. ?They said the T-shirts and boots were military stuff,? Everson said. The South Africans and Russians protested that hey they knew nothing about the cargo, but to no avail. ?We had no way of letting anyone know what had happened, but then Anton remembered he had a cheap throw-away cellphone he had bought in Kurdistan. There was a little store next to the hotel and we bought a sim card and airtime, so we were able to phone our families, which was golden,? Everson said. ?There was a New Zealand guy in the hotel and I scribbled a letter and said please believe me when I say what I am and I?ve got a CBS card and ID, and e-mail this to my wife.? They were restricted to the hotel, and if they went too near the gate, soldiers with AK-47s ordered them back. ?Sadly, we?d left two bottles of whiskey on the plane, because that place is dry.? Days later, Matt Bryden, co-ordinator of the UN Security Council?s Monitoring Group on Somalia, arrived to question them, at the request of the Somaliland authorities. Bryden said there was a UN embargo on transporting military goods into Somalia and the clothing on the aircraft was considered military goods. ?He said: ?You?re under arrest and you?ve been charged. If I don?t agree with your story, I will report back to them precisely that. If I say you are what you say you are, I will say that, and the problem will be solved.? After an hour-and-a-half he said he was satisfied with our story. ?I can see you are in the wrong place at the wrong time and I will communicate that to the Somali authorities. You should be out of here soon?. Then he left. ?We heard nothing until the next night; the CID guys came back and took us to an appaling place that was dark, dirty, smelly, with a bare bulb on a cord and said: ?This is where you are staying.? ?We were at a pretty low point as clearly things had taken a turn for the worse.? But after a short while, they were marched out of the building to the Safari Hotel where they were left for eight days. ?We made friends with the waiters, fine guys, and they brought us the best pawpaws and mangoes.? Meanwhile Bryden had travelled to South Africa and was in contact with the South African and Somali authorities and both men?s families. ?He was keeping us all sane. He?s the most amazing man,? he said. Ten days after their arrest, they were told they could leave.
Asked about reports that they were to film counter-piracy operations run by Saracen International, headed by Lafra Luitingh of the defunct South African mercenary company, Executive Outcomes, Everson said: ?We have no connection with them at all. We were doing a legitimate story about security training in Puntland. I?m quite sure that the people being trained were in some way connected with the piracy threat, but we don?t know who was training them.? - Cape Times

description.hltext_display: Velika hladnoća i dalje ometa promet
description.content:
U hrvatskom turizmu iduće će godine najvažnija biti dodjela koncesija za turističko zemljište i izrada strategije razvoja, što će imati dugoročne strateške implikacije na razvoj tog sektora, a kao i ove godine, provodit će se brojne udružene promotivne i druge tržišne aktivnosti javnog i privatnog turističkog sektora s ciljem što uspješnije sezone, izjavio je za Hinu ministar turizma Damir Bajs.
Koncesije će se tvrtkama za zemljište koje nije ušlo u njihov temljeni kapital u pretvorbi dodjeljivati na 50 godina za naknadu koja će se plaćati godišnje, a sastavljena je od fiksnog i varijabilnog dijela vezanog za prihode tvrtki.
Tvrtke koje sada rade na pojedinom zemljištu imat će prvenstvo pri traženju koncesije, pravo na tzv. prioritetnu koncesiju, ali ako to ne žele tražiti, ne moraju jer im to nije obveza. Tada bi se koncesije davale putem natječaja po najvišoj cijeni, pa tko dobije, dobije - kaže ministar.
Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
Donošenje Zakona o turističkom zemljištu ministar Bajs ocjenjuje iznimno važnim jer je time nakon gotovo dvadeset godina riješeno strateško pitanje hrvatskog turizma otvaranjem puta za daljnji razvoj tvrtki i nove, prijeko potrebne investicije, posebno u hotele i kampove.
Bitno je i što će se novac od koncesija vraćati u turizam kroz poseban razvojno-turistički Fond te lokalnoj samoupravi, koji će ga morati namjenski trošiti za poticanje standarda u turizmu.
Iduće će se godine početi izrađivati dugo očekivani dokument strategije razvoja hrvatskog turizma.

description.hltext_display: Los liberales insisten en su rechazo a un estatus como el de Andorra
description.author: Redacción
description.content: El líder del partido liberal, Joseph García, declaró ayer que un estatus como el de Andorra para Gibraltar "representaría un rechazo y un debilitamiento de la soberanía británica".García recordó que Andorra es un Principado "y por eso la jefatura del Estado recae en dos copríncipes con poder político incluyendo poder para actuar libremente a la hora de nombrar jueces y negociar tratados internacionales". También apuntó que es algo que ni él, ni el partido liberal "podrían soportar", y cree que tampoco los gibraltareños, "especialmente si se tiene en cuenta el resultado del referéndum de 2002 en el que se rechazó la soberanía conjunta para Gibraltar".

description.hltext_display: España donó 20 toneladas de ayudas a damnificados
description.content:
Más de 270 millones de pesos cuestan los kits enviados por los españoles que beneficiarán a unas 11.000 personas.
El gobierno de España a través de la Agencia de Cooperación Internacional para el Desarrollo, Aecid, realizó una donación de 20 toneladas de ayuda humanitaria para los damnificados por el invierno en Colombia, especialmente para el departamento de Bolívar, uno de los más afectados por las inundaciones.
La ayuda está representada en 1.440 kits de higiene familiar, 816 kits de cocina familiar, 1.200 lonas plásticas impermeables reforzadas y 2.000 mosquiteras impregnadas.
La asistencia está valorada en 104.000 euros (más de 270 millones de pesos), y permitirá atender a 2.256 familias, lo que supone más de 11.000 personas aproximadamente.
Con esta contribución ya son más de 1 millón...

Suman 2.405 los muertos en Haití por epidemia de cólera 17 Dec 2010
En un solo día fallecieron 46 personas y la problemática tiende a agravarse, según señalan expertos en salud.
Un total de 2.405 personas han muerto en Haití como consecuencia de la epidemia de cólera que afecta el empobrecido país desde hace casi tres meses, reportó el Ministerio de Salud Pública y Población, Mspp.
El más reciente boletín de la cartera de salud de esa nación, fechado el 12 de diciembre, registró 46 muertos más por cólera que el anterior, del día 10.
El Mspp precisó, además, que la epidemia ha afectado a 109.196 personas en todo el territorio nacional.
Según los datos suministrados por dicho ministerio, en Artibonite, en el noroeste, han fallecido 805 personas, por lo que continúa siendo el departamento más afectado por el cólera, una enfermedad que...

description.hltext_display: Scanning the past
description.content:
BRATTLEBORO -- On most afternoons in Brooks Memorial Library, Jessica Weitz goes through stacks of gray boxes and begins scanning each image individually. She wears gloves to keep the prints in decent condition. She will only format the contrast or brightness slightly to preserve the original view as seen through the eyes of the early 20th century photographer Porter C. Thayer.
After that, she adds a brief description for each photograph before cataloging and transferring them to UVM’s digital collection.
Weitz is a Brooks library staff member who is in charge of digitizing an extensive collection of Thayer’s iconic snapshots, a project that is a partnership between the library and the University of Vermont.
The Brattleboro-based library has worked in conjunction with UVM’s Libraries’ Center for Digital Initiatives to scan and catalog nearly 1,300 photographs taken in the county between 1906 and 1920, providing a unique glimpse of rural and village living in southern Vermont from that time period.
More than 100 of Thayer’s photographs of Brattleboro are now available for public viewing free of charge at the UVM website -- cdi.uvm.edu.
"We have about 100 ready to go, so within two weeks it will be doubled. And then each week, we’re going to add about 20 or 30 images," said Weitz. "The important part of putting this work online is that, right now,
people can only see these images through the microfilm copies, and that loses a lot of the detail and it can be hard to search."
The library expects to have all 1,300 photographs online by the end of 2011. The digital project also offers viewers the opportunity to comment on the images or contribute any additional information.
"It’s a truly social networking program because people can add to the content," said Library Director Jerry Carbone. "It’s 21st century. It’s a digital library project and it allows for more information and it definitely is making this collection more accessible."
Thayer, an apple farmer and avid photographer born in Williamsville, took pictures around the county for nearly 20 years using a 5-by-7 and a 6.5-by-8.5 view camera and made glass dry-plate negatives to create his images. He traveled the narrow dirt roads of southern Vermont in his buggy, towed by his horse Lady.
While part of his business included selling photographic postcards and taking portraits of families and estates in exchange for payment, Thayer also worked on his own accord to document the working life of Vermonters. A vast number of photographs are of loggers, sugarmakers or workers cutting ice.
"These images hold a lot of detail in them," Weitz said.
After a 1979 exhibit of Thayer’s work at the Brattleboro Museum and Art Center, the Arts Council of Windham County received several grants to preserve the photographs. Each was briefly cataloged by library staff and preserved on microfilm, where it is still available to date.
Half of the funding for the digitizing project came from the Windham Foundation. Library officials said they are still looking for the other half.
On Jan. 15, 2011, beginning at 3 p.m. in the library meeting room, local photographer and historian Forrest Holzapfel of Marlboro will discuss the role of village photographers like Thayer in Vermont.
Chris Garofolo can be reached at cgarofolo@reformer.com or 802-254-2311 ext. 275.

description.hltext_display: Dos empresas españolas del mueble de diseño, premiadas en EEUU con el galardón "Best of Year"
description.content:
Las firmas nacionales estaban nominadas a siete de las 43 categorías de productos. Vondom y Sancal obtuvieron el reconocimiento al mejor diseño, explica el ICEX.
El pasado 2 de diciembre, la revista "Interior Design" celebró la V edición de los premios "Best of Year". La ceremonia, a la que siguió un cóctel que reunió a los mejores nombres de la escena internacional del diseño de interiores, tuvo lugar en el IAC Building, diseñado por Frank Gehry y emplazado en el barrio neoyorquino de Chelsea.
De entre las 43 categorías de producto que se valoraban en el certamen, España estaba representada en siete de ellas a través de los finalistas, dos de los cuales obtuvieron el premio al mejor diseño. Vondom se alzó con la estatuilla por su silla de exterior Surf Chaise; mientras Sancal lo hizo con su sofá Tea, una circunstancia que refleja cómo el mobiliario español se está abriendo hueco en el mercado estadounidense.
El Departamento de Hábitat de la Oficina Económica y Comercial de España en Nueva York asistió al evento para compartir este nuevo éxito del diseño español, que ha sido avalado por las votaciones de 55.000 profesionales especializados.

description.hltext_display: Erradicadas 19.000 hectáreas de cultivos ilícitos en Nariño
description.content:
Un total de 19.000 hectáreas de cultivos ilícitos se han erradicado en el departamento de Nariño en lo corrido de este año.
Así lo dio a conocer el director de Antinarcóticos de la Policía Nacional, general César Augusto Pinzón, quien señaló que esta es la región de Colombia donde más se eliminó plantaciones de coca, marihuana y amapola, entre otras.
En el 2010 en total en todo el país han erradicado 42.491 hectáreas y han asperjado otras 101.171, afirmó el alto oficial.
Según los datos oficiales, aunque la cifra es positiva, fue inferior a la del año pasado, que llegó a 60.954 hectáreas erradicadas.
Para el 2010 la meta trazada por el Gobierno era de 80.000 hectáreas.
En cuanto a las cifras de aspersión sí se superaron, teniendo en cuenta que la meta era de 100.000.
Leer más... Actualizado ( 22 Dec 2010 ) Escrito por: Diario del Sur

description.hltext_display: Pucalpa, núcleo de formación técnica
description.content:
Cientos de jóvenes de Pasto se han graduado de programas de formación titulada y complementaria.
La Comuna Doce es conocida por ser el lugar de expansión urbanística del municipio de Pasto, pero además en ella funciona el Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, Sena, que prepara a cientos de jóvenes de este sector y de comunas aledañas.
Programas de formación titulada y programas de formación complementaria son ofertados por el Sena, que tienen cobertura en varios municipios del departamento de Nariño como Ipiales y Tumaco, además de educación virtual.
Cientos de jóvenes se han graduado de programas como dirección de ventas, gestión contable y financiera y planificación para la creación y gestión de empresas.
El Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje, Sena, surgió de la necesidad de que el país...
Leer más... Actualizado ( 22 Dec 2010 ) Escrito por: Paola Ximena Arteaga
Compartir en:
Casona Taminango, joya del turismo 18 Dec 2010
En la Comuna Siete de Pasto se erigen construcciones coloniales y republicanas, que incluso han sido declaradas como Monumento Nacional.
En la Comuna Siete del municipio de Pasto está ubicada la Casona Taminango, que data de 1623 y se ha restaurado en dos ocasiones, en 1970 y 1973. Este museo es considerado para los residentes de este sector y su soberana como uno de los iconos más representativos de este sector y de la capital nariñense.
La Casona Taminango es una reliquia arquitectónica declarada Monumento Nacional mediante decreto N° 2000 de 1971, conservada y restaurada por la Fundación Museo Taminango Monasco Dachis. Este inmueble se convirtió en museo de Artes y Tradiciones Populares el 14 de julio de 1989.
En las diferentes salas se exhiben los procesos artesanales del ‘mopa mopa’ o barniz de Pasto, ebanistería, talla, torno de madera, tejidos en lana y en...

description.hltext_display: Health Benefits of the Mineral Called Magnesium
description.content: Magnesium is a wonder mineral which help us to stay young, healthy and vigorous. A deficiency in magnesium in your body can make you age faster! You will be interested to know the signs of magnesium deficit in your body are very much similar to the signs of old age. The signs present often are uneven heartbeat, blocked arteries, bigger danger of heart attack, resistance of insulin, increased blood pressure etc. Predisposition to diabetes along with osteoporosis is other symptoms.If you don't want to get old before time you can start taking magnesium supplements without delay. In spite of the availability of magnesium sources, it has bee found more than 75% of Americans have magnesium deficiency! The senior citizens are all the more at risk. Diabetics on diet, people who consume low-calorie diets, persons who take drugs for heart diseases, alcoholics, those who engage in heavy exercise and persons who suffer from fat mal absorption problems should take care to supplement their body with magnesium.The health benefits of magnesium supplements are so many, we cannot ignore it. It acts as anti aging agents, shelters us from heart problems, lowers blood pressure, safeguards against diabetes, avoid reappearance of kidney stones and assist to shelter us from osteoporosis. You can take the supplements with a magnesium rich diet to shelter yourself from a variety of ailments.Many people are not aware of the fact that magnesium supplements and calcium has to be administered together. An elderly individual who supplements calcium without magnesium stands the risk of blood clots, stroke and heart attack. The accepted rule is that if you administer 1000mg of calcium per day you should take 500mg of magnesium too.Magnesium is a dominant antioxidant that enables cell membranes to be flexible. It safe guards your body against the attack of cancer-creating free radicals. A person who has had magnesium deficiency for a long time will most probably be deficient is vitamin E too. This is due to the exhaustion of vitamin E in the body as they get done in fighting to keep away free radicals which get promoted due to insufficiency of magnesium. A good supply of magnesium along with magnesium sources in diet will shelter the body's supply of vitamin E.Magnesium supplements alter the quantity of calcium to make the heart beat regular. It also assists in the deterrence and even the setback of Adult Diabetes. In spite of all the advantages of magnesium, the dose if exceeds 500mg a day cause problems. The noted disadvantage of an overdose of magnesium is diarrhea. Further, persons who have a history in the family of heart and kidney problems should take medical advice before they start on magnesium supplements.

description.hltext_display: Mantén un peso estable en Navidad
description.content:
La nutricionista concedió en decir que es más difícil subir de peso que perderlo, sobre todo cuando es consecuencia de una pérdida de apetito.
Estamos a pocos días de celebrar la Navidad y algunas personas ya están haciendo dieta para evitar subir de peso, porque en esta época del año nos acostumbramos a comer alimentos muy calóricos que nos hacen subir de peso fácilmente. Sin embargo, esto no tiene por qué ser necesariamente así.
La nutricionista Luz Marina de la Rosa dio algunos consejos para que en esta Navidad se pueda mantener un peso estable y evitar esos incómodos gorditos ocasionados por las empañadas, buñuelos, natilla, tamales entre otros ricos alimentos característicos de la temporada de diciembre.
La especialista señaló que los excesos típicos de las fechas navideñas pueden ser...

description.hltext_display: Jefferies stuft OMV-Aktien bei Erstbewertung mit "underperform" ein
description.content:
Die Analysten von Jefferies haben die Aktien der heimischen OMV bei ihrer Erstbewertung mit "underperform" eingestuft. Das Kursziel wurde von den Wertpapierexperten mit 25,00 Euro festgelegt. So berichtet der Informationsdienstleister Bloomberg.
Zum Vergleich: An der Wiener Börse notierten OMV-Aktien kurz nach Handelsbeginn mit einem Plus von 0,77 Prozent bei 30,64 Euro.
Analysierendes Institut Jefferies

description.hltext_display: Salt 2 a Possibility
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
There are films that didnt do well in America but does great in other countries. Just like Knight and Day or Salt. Knight and Day may not get a sequel but apparently Salt may.
Last August, Salt writer Kurt Wimmer told the LA Times that he had an idea for a Salt sequel and director Phillip NoycePhillip Noyce was interested in coming back. But now, that interest has seemed to fade. According to Noyce, "Those 3 [alternate] Blu-ray cuts [of the film] represent just about everything I have to offer on Evelyn Salt. If there ever is a sequel, better its directed by someone with a completely fresh take on what I believe could be a totally entertaining and complex series of stories." It is still a possibility of Noyce coming back but he is quite busy already. He has been attached to the time travel film Timeless, a spy thriller Wenceslas Square and an adaptation of Dirt Music with Russell CroweRussell Crowe.

event_or_fact.property: he had an idea for a Salt sequel and director Phillip NoycePhillip Noyce was interested in coming back.

description.hltext_display: 解读明星人气榜四宗"最" 双J"会师"被评最般配
description.content:
最"惨烈"——李宇春和东方神起争第一
毫无疑问，李宇春与韩国组合"东方神起"的巅峰对决将成为经典之战。双方曾经交错领先，但始终不相上下，尽管多数时间李宇春略微占一些便宜，但始终甩不开东方神起的穷追猛打。玉米的强悍我们早就领教过了，但如果要评选本次"全球明星人气榜"最给力的粉丝，恐怕非"仙后"莫属。到现在，双方的人气支持率都是1亿多，羡煞旁人。如此疯狂的粉丝参与度，恐怕早已经刷新了明星评选历史上的记录了，或许谈不上"后无来者"，但绝对"前无古人"。最"惊悚"——迈克尔·杰克逊、张国荣
这恐怕又是一个明星评选史上的奇迹了——由于本次评选没有划定任何界限，不分国界、不分其活跃的领域、不分时代，甚至不管明星是否已经过世，只要是明星，只有人气旺，就是"人气明星"。所以我们看到，迈克尔·杰克逊摘得了欧美明星的桂冠，而"哥哥"张国荣甚至超越了才子王力宏，人气惊人。最"悲催"——小月月位居第5000位

description.hltext_display: Irak dobio novu vladu
description.content:
U hrvatskom turizmu iduće će godine najvažnija biti dodjela koncesija za turističko zemljište i izrada strategije razvoja, što će imati dugoročne strateške implikacije na razvoj tog sektora, a kao i ove godine, provodit će se brojne udružene promotivne i druge tržišne aktivnosti javnog i privatnog turističkog sektora s ciljem što uspješnije sezone, izjavio je za Hinu ministar turizma Damir Bajs.
Koncesije će se tvrtkama za zemljište koje nije ušlo u njihov temljeni kapital u pretvorbi dodjeljivati na 50 godina za naknadu koja će se plaćati godišnje, a sastavljena je od fiksnog i varijabilnog dijela vezanog za prihode tvrtki.
Tvrtke koje sada rade na pojedinom zemljištu imat će prvenstvo pri traženju koncesije, pravo na tzv. prioritetnu koncesiju, ali ako to ne žele tražiti, ne moraju jer im to nije obveza. Tada bi se koncesije davale putem natječaja po najvišoj cijeni, pa tko dobije, dobije - kaže ministar.
Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
Donošenje Zakona o turističkom zemljištu ministar Bajs ocjenjuje iznimno važnim jer je time nakon gotovo dvadeset godina riješeno strateško pitanje hrvatskog turizma otvaranjem puta za daljnji razvoj tvrtki i nove, prijeko potrebne investicije, posebno u hotele i kampove.
Bitno je i što će se novac od koncesija vraćati u turizam kroz poseban razvojno-turistički Fond te lokalnoj samoupravi, koji će ga morati namjenski trošiti za poticanje standarda u turizmu.
Iduće će se godine početi izrađivati dugo očekivani dokument strategije razvoja hrvatskog turizma.

description.hltext_display: Iberdrola adjudica contratos por 524M$ de la línea de 800Km que conectará EE.UU. y Canadá
description.content:
Las empresas estadounidenses que se encargarán de liderar los principales trabajos para materializar esta iniciativa, valorada en 1.400 millones $, serán MYR Group, Inc., Irby Construction Co. y Hawkeye, LLC
Las empresas estadounidenses que se encargarán de liderar los principales trabajos para materializar esta iniciativa, valorada en 1.400 millones $, serán MYR Group, Inc., Irby Construction Co. y Hawkeye, LLC
Las empresas estadounidenses que se encargarán de liderar los principales trabajos para materializar esta iniciativa, denominada Maine Power Reliability Program (MPRP) y valorada en 1.400 millones $, serán MYR Group, Inc., Irby Construction Co. y Hawkeye, LLC. Estas adjudicaciones llevadas a cabo por IBERDROLA propiciarán la creación de hasta 1.000 empleos.
Cada una de las tres compañías adjudicatarias, que se dedican a construir líneas de transmisión de electricidad, se ocupará de las tareas en sendas zonas geográficas. En concreto, MYR Group, con sede en Illinois, se hará cargo de la zona este del proyecto; Irby Construction, ubicada Massachusetts, de la zona centro y oeste; y Hawkeye, con sede en Nueva York, de la zona sur.
"Estamos construyendo una red eléctrica más fuerte e inteligente -ha señalado la Presidenta de CMP, Sara Burns-. Cerca de 1.000 personas han trabajado hasta la fecha en el proyecto y esperamos que otras tantas se unan al mismo durante esta fase de construcción. El MPRP está creando puestos de trabajo cuando realmente se necesitan y nos garantizará unas infraestructuras eficientes y fiables que beneficiarán a largo plazo a los consumidores y el medio ambiente".
La iniciativa del Grupo IBERDROLA, cuyos trabajos arrancaron el pasado 29 de septiembre y que se prevé pueda estar culminada para mediados de 2015, va a beneficiar las interconexiones eléctricas entre Massachusetts, New Hampshire y Maine, así como entre este último Estado y Canadá.
Mediante este macro proyecto, la filial estadounidense de IBERDROLA construirá y renovará alrededor de 800 kilómetros de líneas de transporte de energía eléctrica de entre 115 y 345 kV, que atravesará 75 ciudades y pueblos, y pondrá en marcha cinco nuevas subestaciones de 345 kV en la citada región, ubicada al noreste del país -ver gráfico adjunto del proyecto-.
La nueva infraestructura de redes, que recibió en mayo de este año la aprobación de la Comisión de Servicios Públicos de Maine, servirá para atender las necesidades de siete millones de consumidores en New England, contribuyendo a reforzar la fiabilidad y eficiencia del suministro eléctrico. Asimismo, fomentará la integración de las renovables en el sistema eléctrico de Maine, Estado deficitario en generación de electricidad pero con un gran potencial de crecimiento en este sector.
La iniciativa MPRP no sólo supondrá la creación de hasta 3.100 puestos de trabajo durante su desarrollo, sino que contribuirá sustancialmente a mejorar la economía de Maine. De hecho, se trata de la mayor de toda la historia en el ámbito de las infraestructuras energéticas de este Estado y de la primera vez en 40 años que se renueva y mejora la red de transmisión eléctrica en el mismo.

description.hltext_display: Lubbock man arrested for sexually assaulting adoptive daughters
description.author: Lubbock Avalanche-Journal
description.content:
A Lubbock man is facing 16 counts of continuous sexual abuse...
Cruz
Advertisement
A Lubbock man is facing 16 counts of continuous sexual abuse against children. Police say he sexually assaulted his four adoptive daughters for more than six years.
Lubbock authorities this week arrested Henrique Cruz, 51, in connection with abuse that allegedly started in 2001, shortly after Cruz and his wife adopted the girls, who ranged from ages 5 to 11 at the time, according to court documents.
This summer, Cruz admitted to a Lubbock CPS worker he had molested his four adoptive daughters over the years, according to his arrest warrant issued this week.
His attorney, Jeff Nicholson, said, “We expect to cooperate with law enforcement.” He added he hadn’t reviewed any reports yet of the specific allegations so he couldn’t comment further on Tuesday.
Nicholson said Cruz retained his services in July or August, shortly after authorities launched an investigation.
Police began investigating after one of the girls told her adoptive mother — Cruz’s ex-wife — he had repeatedly touched her private parts, according to the arrest warrant. The child said the sexual abuse began around the year 2002 and continued until she moved away from Cruz in June 2009.
One of the girls said the abuse started when she was 8 years old and that she and Cruz were alone in their house on 90th Street in Lubbock.
One of the girls said her adoptive father would sneak into the bathroom and act like he was bringing her a towel, according to court documents. Other times, the attacks would take place in the child’s bedroom.
The girl said when she got older, her adoptive father began to demand she allow him to touch her if she needed money or wanted to go somewhere, according to her statement to police.
She said he told her not to tell anybody, and she said she feared the repercussions if she did.
The girl said the abuse continued during visitations after her adoptive parents divorced in 2005.
Two of his adoptive daughters made statements to authorities, but two of the children have refused to talk with police or confirm the allegations.
The adoptive daughters now range in age from 14 to 20 years old.
According to court documents, Cruz admitted to molesting them all for years, starting before they were all 14.
The Cruz couple adopted the four girls, who were blood sisters, and their little brother, but it was unknown if the children were adopted from the foster care system.
Paul Zimmerman, regional spokesman for the Texas Department of Family and Protective Services, said the process to adopt a child from foster care in Texas comes with extensive background checks.
“It’s a pretty extensive process when it comes to screening,” he said.
Zimmerman noted the process included mandatory classes by adoptive parents as well as a home study, which in total could take as long as six months.
The state also requires a six-month check after the adoption has taken place just to “double check” that the situation is working out. However, the state doesn’t have any legal bounds for monitoring a family after the first six-month period has passed.
Zimmerman was checking to see if the agency had any details about the Cruz adoption that could be released, but didn’t get back to The Avalanche-Journal before deadline. He couldn’t comment on the case before checking records.
Cruz was being held in the Lubbock County Jail on Tuesday in lieu of a $150,000 bond, according to jail records. Cruz, who had a listed address in the 7500 block of 19th Street, was booked into the jail on Monday afternoon.
He didn’t have a prior criminal history in Lubbock County, according to courthouse records.
To comment on this story:
robin.pyle@lubbockonline.com • 766-8742
james.ricketts@lubbockonline.com • 766-8706
Sources: Lubbock County court documents; Lubbock County Jail records

description.hltext_display: La oposición asegura que defenderá a los empleados de Serco
description.author: Redacción
description.content: La oposición se ha comprometido a proteger las condiciones e intereses laborales de los empleados de Serco (antiguos trabajadores de Defensa) y apuntó que no deben preocuparse porque en noviembre de 2012 estarán en el Gobierno.Recordó que "siempre han estado en desacuerdo con que trabajadores del Ministerio de Defensa sean contratados por empresas externas porque supone inestabilidad laboral".Por su parte, el Gobierno mostró su sorpresa porque el GLP-GSLP haya pedido a los empleados de Serco que no se preocupen porque van a ganar las elecciones y apuntó que sus puestos están seguros gracias a las negociaciones del Ejecutivo y sindicatos con Defensa.

description.hltext_display: The Importance of Boot Camp Fitness Program
description.content: Boot camp fitness programs are scientifically designed workouts to suit a wide range of people who value physical fitness and are serious about remaining physically agile and trim. The fitness programs may vary in style, rigor and intensity to meet individual needs. Boot camp techniques and exercises can burn the extra fat and calories and also initiate you into a different lifestyle.Losing weight and getting into shape seems nearly impossible for a lot of people and the only way to achieve results is through enforcing discipline and the fitness boot camps just do that. Understanding what needs to be done to make you physically fit and trim is winning half the battle and fitness boot camp trainers know what you need to do.Boot camp fitness participants are made to perform a wide assortment of strengthening, stretching, and cardiovascular drills, so the entire spectrum of bodily fitness - anaerobic, aerobic, and mobility - is trained with every session. Not long ago, boot camp fitness programs were terribly excruciating and you almost killed yourself with workouts that largely resembled the rigorous military training imparted to soldiers. Things have changed a lot and in a fitness boot camp, you need no longer train like a soldier to lose weight and get into proper physical shape. But still boot camp fitness programs are challenging and you need a lot of self-discipline.Boot camp workouts are productive because you work your entire body—nerves, tissues and muscles—through successive exercises one after the other with no respite in between. The workouts involve jumping jacks, crunches, body-weight squats, push-up with rotation, single-leg straddle, step jumps, explosive push-up, running, bicycling and lot more.In boot camp, the challenge is to test your physical endurance and to take your body to its farthest limits. Boot camp fitness programs are aimed at:• Effectively burn out a lot of unwanted calories leading to shedding of excess fat• Making you work your entire body within in a short span of time and increase your powers of endurance and enhanced muscle strength• Having each exercise differently so that you are not bored and remain enthusiastic• Keep you motivated as you will do the workouts in the company of peers• Easy to perform exercises that you can do anywhere with little equipment• Boosting your levels of self-confidence and achieving overall body fitnessSome select boot camp fitness programs for free fitness assessments to determine the type of workout you will require and also supply participants with nutrition booklet including guidelines & tips to speed up results. Each person's program is individualized to make it result-oriented - from the type of food and nutrition and the physical workout program design and behavioral education and changing of lifestyle. Before enrolling in boot camp fitness programs, please verify if they are reliable and whether they have qualified nutritionist, therapist, trainers and other healthcare professionals.Make sure the trainers at these fitness camps also undertake to build a program for you to pursue even after the session is over so that you sustain the levels of physical fitness you attained at the camp. This is critically important if attending a fitness camp is to guarantee long-term benefits and you get your money's worth.

description.hltext_display: Haitian men testify of abuse by Colo. man
description.content: Six young Haitian men have testified in a courtroom about sexual abuse they suffered at the hands of an American who ran a school in their impoverished Caribbean nation. The victims said they struggled with feelings of shame after Douglas Perlitz coerced them into sex for money. They testified yesterday at a sentencing hearing for Perlitz, 40, of Eagle, Colo. The former Connecticut resident admitted in August to engaging in illicit sexual conduct with eight children. Prosecutors want him sent to prison for at least 19 years.

description.hltext_display: Northern Petroleum Nederland reports board changes
description.content:
Northern Petroleum says that its wholly owned Netherlands subsidiary, Northern Petroleum Nederland B.V. ("NPN"), has appointed Brian A. Hepp, Northern's Director of Group Operations, and Cornelis Nicolaas (Nico) Tielens, NPN's Operations Manager and Acting Country Manager, as directors.
Mr Hepp, a Canadian national, has been Northern's Director of Group Operations since January 2006. Since joining Northern, Brian has directed all of the Group's drilling and development operations, including the development of the Grolloo, Geesbrug, Brakel and Wijk en Aalburg gas fields. In total he has over 28 years of international experience in design, drilling, production operations and petroleum field management with both major and small producers in North America and Europe.
Mr Hepp has represented NPN as an active member of the Executive Committee of The Netherlands Oil and Gas Exploration and Production Association ("NOGEPA") since NPN joined the organisation in 2006. NOGEPA promotes the common interests of all companies holding licenses to explore for, develop and produce hydrocarbons both on and offshore in The Netherlands.
Brian holds a Masters Degree in Administration and a Bachelor of Engineering degree. He is a Registered Engineer in Canada, a Chartered Engineer in the UK and Europe and is a Fellow of the Institute of Chemical Engineers.
Mr Tielens, a Netherlands national, has been NPN's Operations Manager since July 2006 and also Acting Country Manager since the start of 2010. Prior to joining NPN, Mr Tielens spent 23 years in the service side of the oil and gas industry, mainly in the Dutch onshore and North Sea offshore sectors, and has extensive operational experience in well and production operations. Mr. Tielens previously held various onshore supervisory and management positions before becoming General Manager for two different Multinational Service Company's Continental Europe operations immediately prior to joining NPN as Operations Manager.
Nico holds a Bachelor degree in Civil Engineering, has held the Chairman's role in the well services group of IRO (the association of oil and gas service providers in The Netherlands) as well as serving as a Board member of IRO. Since joining NPN he has been an active member of the Operations Committee of NOGEPA.
Following these appointments Derek Musgrove and Birger Polkamp have retired as directors of NPN.
Derek Musgrove, Managing Director of Northern, stated, "NPN has brought three gas fields into production, with another to follow imminently. It has become a significant gas producer and project manager. Following these achievements, it is an appropriate moment for these changes to be made to the NPN Board. Further appointments to the NPN Board are expected in due course, reflecting the company's increase in size and activities.
The fact that NPN has an excellent safety record is very much a credit to both Brian and Nico. I was, and will remain, thankful for their persistent diligence on behalf of all employees and stakeholders.
The Board of Northern also wishes to express its gratitude to Birger Polkamp for his work and guidance over the last five years, the formative period of the company. NPN's current activities are a reflection of his efforts. We are delighted to retain his services as a Commercial Adviser to the NPN Board."
Tags: Northern Petroleum

description.hltext_display: Češkoj vladi izglasano povjerenje
description.content:
U hrvatskom turizmu iduće će godine najvažnija biti dodjela koncesija za turističko zemljište i izrada strategije razvoja, što će imati dugoročne strateške implikacije na razvoj tog sektora, a kao i ove godine, provodit će se brojne udružene promotivne i druge tržišne aktivnosti javnog i privatnog turističkog sektora s ciljem što uspješnije sezone, izjavio je za Hinu ministar turizma Damir Bajs.
Koncesije će se tvrtkama za zemljište koje nije ušlo u njihov temljeni kapital u pretvorbi dodjeljivati na 50 godina za naknadu koja će se plaćati godišnje, a sastavljena je od fiksnog i varijabilnog dijela vezanog za prihode tvrtki.
Tvrtke koje sada rade na pojedinom zemljištu imat će prvenstvo pri traženju koncesije, pravo na tzv. prioritetnu koncesiju, ali ako to ne žele tražiti, ne moraju jer im to nije obveza. Tada bi se koncesije davale putem natječaja po najvišoj cijeni, pa tko dobije, dobije - kaže ministar.
Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
Donošenje Zakona o turističkom zemljištu ministar Bajs ocjenjuje iznimno važnim jer je time nakon gotovo dvadeset godina riješeno strateško pitanje hrvatskog turizma otvaranjem puta za daljnji razvoj tvrtki i nove, prijeko potrebne investicije, posebno u hotele i kampove.
Bitno je i što će se novac od koncesija vraćati u turizam kroz poseban razvojno-turistički Fond te lokalnoj samoupravi, koji će ga morati namjenski trošiti za poticanje standarda u turizmu.
Iduće će se godine početi izrađivati dugo očekivani dokument strategije razvoja hrvatskog turizma.

description.hltext_display: Бременна пострада при ПТП в Разградско
description.content:
Бременна в петия месец жена пострада при катастрофа на пътя между селата Вазово и Райнино.
Произшествието е станало около 17.25 часа на 21 декември. 22-годишен мъж от Райнино управлявал лекия автомобил "Ровър 45" с несъобразена скорост по заледения път, изгубил контрол над автомобила и се блъснал в крайпътно дърво. При сблъсъка е пострадала возещата се на задната седалка Н.О. на 19 години от село Райнино. Тя е настанена в исперихската болница, по първоначални данни няма опасност за нейния живот и този на плода. Пробата за алкохол на водача е отрицателна, той е ползвал и обезопасителен колан.
По случая е образувано досъдебно производство.

description.hltext_display: Louisville a winner in the end
description.content:
Justin Burke threw for a pair touchdowns, and Jeremy Wright scored on a 95-yard kickoff return Tuesday to help Louisville beat former Conference USA rival Southern Mississippi, 31-28, in the Beef O Bradys Bowl in St. Petersburg, Fla.
Burke tossed scoring passes of 11 yards to Cameron Graham and 10 yards to Josh Chichester, and the Cardinals (7-6) erased a 14-point first-half deficit, then produced a go-ahead field goal in the fourth quarter.
The win enabled Louisville to finish Charlie Strongs first season as a head coach with the Cardinals first winning record since 2006.Its so big, just from where we started out, said Strong, the former Florida defensive coordinator who inherited a team that went 4-8 last year. Nobody ever gave us a chance. And to watch this football team fight through so much adversity, go work so hard, develop trust, develop commitment thats what its all about, getting a foundation within this program.Austin Davis threw for 205 yards and two touchdowns to become Southern Mississippis career TD pass leader, moving ahead of Brett Favre and Lee Roberts in the Golden Eagles record book with 53 in three seasons.
The Southern Miss quarterback also scored on a 17-yard reception from receiver Quentin Pierce.Wrights long kickoff return made it 28-all early in the fourth quarter. Chris Philpotts 36-yard field goal gave the Cardinals their first lead with 6:30 remaining.
Davis completed 19 of 32 passes, including TD throws of 32 yards to Pierce and 8 yards to Zeke Walters for the Golden Eagles (8-5).
Desmond Johnson scored on a 62-yard run and finished with a season-high 107 yards rushing.DUCKS KELLY NAMED AP COACH OF YEAROregons Chip Kelly was voted AP Coach of the Year after leading the second-ranked Ducks to an undefeated record and a spot in the BCS national championship game in his second season as the teams leader.Kelly received 24 of 55 votes to beat out his title game counterpart, Gene Chizik of Auburn, who had 17 votes.Stanfords Jim Harbaugh was third with five votes. TCUs Gary Patterson, last years winner, and Mark Dantonio of Michigan State each received three votes.
SHORT YARDAGE
Michigan State will be without leading receiver B.J. Cunningham for the Capital One Bowl after he broke his foot during practice. The seventh-ranked Spartans face 15th-ranked Alabama in the Capital One Bowl on Jan. 1. ? Tennessee reported secondary violations to the NCAA after discovering 36 student-athletes were given special treatment at a bar in Knoxville, Tenn. The owners of Bar Knoxville said that Vols athletes were not required to pay cover charges on Thursday nights, when some other patrons were charged $5 to $10. ? Syracuse punter Rob Long will have to undergo post-operation treatment after doctors found malignant cells in a brain tumor removed a week ago TODAYS BOWL GAMEMAACO BOWL LAS VEGAS
Utah (10-2) vs. Boise State (11-1)
Kickoff: 5 p.m., Sam Boyd Stadium, Las Vegas.
TV: ESPN. Radio: 1380-AM.
THE LINE: Boise State by 161/2.
THE BUZZ: Utah has won nine bowls in a row, the nations longest active postseason streak. That ties for the second-longest bowl winning streak of all time with USC (nine consecutive from 1923-45). Florida State is the record-holder with 11 (1985-96). ? Boise State QB Kellen Moore (3,506 yards, 33 TDs, five picks), a former Prosser High star, was a Heisman finalist. ? The Utes will be without QB Jordan Wynn, who is out with an injury to his throwing shoulder. Senior backup Terrance Cain started two games this season and won both. ? Boise States ground game ranks No. 24 in the nation (200.1 ypg), and the Broncos have rushed for at least 200 yards in six games. ? The Utes rushing defense ranks No. 8 in the nation (104.2 ypg); theyve held seven foes under 100 yards. ? Boise States defense ranks No. 6 in the nation against the run (103.5 ypg), but the Broncos allowed 269 yards to Nevada and 250 to Utah State in their past two games.
BOTTOM LINE: Boise State will win if it stifles Utahs ground game. Cain is a veteran quarterback, but he isnt a polished passer.
THE PICK: Boise State 38, Utah 24.
McClatchy news services

description.hltext_display: KDDI startet E-Book Angebot mit 20.000 Titeln
description.content:
(www.emfis.com) Der japanische Telekomgigant KDDI Corp gab bekannt, sein E-Book Angebot pünktlich zum Start des neuen E-Book Readers, Biblio Leaf SP02 am kommenden Samstag, den 25. Dezember, an den Start zu bringen. Für die Kunden von KDDI soll es möglich sein über 20.000 Buchtitel ab Weihnachten zu ordern. Das Angebot wird, nach Angaben des Konzerns, bis März 2012 auf über 100.000 Titel gesteigert werden. Die Angebotspalette soll von Tageszeitungen über Comics bis hin zu wissenschaftlicher und Alltagsliteratur reichen.
Der Biblio Leaf SP02 wird von Toshiba in Zusammenarbeit mit KDDI produziert. Inhalte werden bei dem neuen E-Book Reader auf einem 6 Zoll großen monochromen Monitor dargestellt, der 16 Schattierungen bietet. Die Auflösung liegt bei 800 x 600 Bildpunkten und neben einer 3G-Verbindung ist auch WiFi mit an Bord. Zudem unterstützt Biblio Leaf SP02 die Darstellung von PDF-, EPUB- sowie XMDF-Dateien. Bei einer Größe von 198 × 130 × 9,6 Millimeter dürfen sich Nutzer des rund 295 Gramm schweren Geräts neben den Reader-Funktionen auf einen eingebauten Kalender, einen Taschenrechner sowie Notizbuch-Funktionen freuen. Überdies hat Toshiba neben einem internen Speicher von 2 GB auch einen Slot für microSD sowie microUSB integriert.
© 2010 EMFIS.COM
Klicken Sie hier, um weitere aktuelle Nachrichten zum Unternehmen zu finden:

description.hltext_display: 周立波夫妇携双方妈妈做节目 胡洁自揭发家史/图
description.content:
12月20日晚，周立波举办了一场声震全国的婚礼，婚礼以公益之名遍邀名流，成龙、刘嘉玲、杨澜吴征夫妇一家、史玉柱等均到场祝贺，并送上礼金。翌日，周立波夫妇出席海派清口专项公益基金接牌仪式，将前晚所收的324万礼金，再加上好友捐赠、企业捐赠以及夫妇俩的个人捐款，总计3669.6623万元悉数捐出。
从"博客门"到"公厕论"，这一年周立波形容自己"经历了各种‘门’"。年底将至，他用一场婚礼再次将自己置于舆论的顶点，从"公益婚礼"到"星云大师证婚"，从名流扎堆到"富婆"胡洁来历，无不成为人们讨论与猜测的话题。
12月21日下午，周立波夫妇带着双方的妈妈，还有一众好友做客《家庭演播室》节目。对于人们好奇的种种，一一做出解答。
胡洁自曝发家史"我是这样赚到的第一桶金"
提到周立波的新婚妻子胡洁，媒体习惯用"富婆"来形容。对于这个称呼，胡洁显得有点无奈。她坦言，突然间被说成富婆，她很纳闷，同时也感觉压力很大。"富，谈不上，我只是个职业女性。你要说我精神富有，我完全可以承认。婆，我觉得我还没到这个份上。"
尽管如此，周立波娶了一位非常有能力，且身价不菲的太太这确实是事实。
她26岁白手起家创办企业，如今经营着一家占地20多亩，厂房3万多平，员工1000多人，专门从事不锈钢餐具制造及出口业务的公司。她是温州当地非常有名的人物，两届的人大代表，同时担任着多种社会职务。
周立波说，第一次被胡洁带到她的工厂时，"见过世面"的他还是"傻掉了"，当然，他努力的掩饰住了自己的吃惊，没让胡洁看出来。而如今，已经为老公周立波放弃了个人事业的胡洁，回忆起自己创业的经历，依然难掩兴奋。
"我二十几岁读书毕业以后，我爸爸办了一个所谓的加工厂，那时正好赶上改革开放，加工厂主要加工五金产品。当时那个小工厂就两个工人，我和我表姐，所以我就对五金产品有了一些概念。后来偶尔有一个机会跟一个外贸公司去国外，在国外我看到了世界上非常著名的德国的一个品牌的餐具，我就买了它一套产品。我现在还记得那套产品是269马克。拿回来后我就开始模仿。初级阶段，只能去模仿。然后，我自己为它设计包装，买了一些绒布，还买了一些金丝的线，我就想把它带到广交会去。那时候我没有出去的费用，爸爸就给了我五千块钱，然后我就去了广州。
我的运气相当好，第一次就碰到一个德国客户，那个德国客户一下子给我下了四十万美元的订单。因为我那个产品可能在当时中国的市场上还没有，所以我就做对了这么一件事。那个客户订了我四十万美元，但我们没有出口权，所以就挂靠在了珠海的一家外贸公司下。这个客户每一次下的订单都非常大，一次就几千万美元。然后那个外贸公司就跟我签了合同。我签了合同后就组建生产，向亲朋好友借了很多钱，就这样把这个厂顶住。差不多做了半年时间，忽然外贸公司通知我说，那个客户不要这个订单了，要违约，我当时都不知道怎么办了。
很多人可能会想找外贸公司去打官司，但我想这样是不对的，找外贸公司没有用，我觉得还是要直接找德国客户。因为当时下订单的时候德国客户给了我一张名片，但当时我的英文写一篇文章还写不出来，所以我就用中文写好，然后拿到翻译社去翻译。当时我没有助理，也没财务，基本上是工人、老板全部我一人兼掉。我翻译好，发给客户，大概发了有四五份。当时的内容我都还记得很清楚，我跟我客户说，当时在广交会上，这个订单是您给我下的，如果您现在违约的话，不讲诚信的话，我现在已经一百多万人民币投下去了，那个时候才九几年，那么这一百多万对你们可能是很小的一笔数字，但是对中国的一个女孩子来说，那是一个天文数字，如果您不接受这批货的话，您会让我倾家荡产。
后来这个客户终于被我感动了，他把信用证直接传真到我的传真机上。那时候这事情我都没有告诉我的家人，我自己一个人默默的承担着，因为我怕说出去他们都受不了，因为这些钱都是向他们借过来的。
我当时真的失眠了，所以后来那个客户发给我的时候，我记得还很清楚，我整个人都跳起来了，非常的开心。但是，因为这是第一批订单，我在技术上都不过关，我觉得那批货非常对不起那个客户，因为那批货在质量上真的完全不过关，但还是运出去了。这就是我人生的第一桶金。"

description.hltext_display: Congress OKs heating funds
description.content:
WESTMINSTER -- Low-income Vermonters on fuel assistance will get a boost in their support payments after Congress on Tuesday approved another $10.8 million for the federally funded Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program, or LIHEAP.
The Senate voted 82-14 Tuesday morning to add the supplemental payment after an earlier bill passed before the October adjournment that only funded the state at about 60 percent of what it received last year.
The House took up the bill Tuesday night and passed it by a vote of 193-65.
President Obama is expected to sign it this week.
Southeastern Vermont Community Action Development Director Lisa Clarke said the agency had to tell everyone earlier this season that their benefits would be reduced until Congress came through with the additional payment.
In Windham County, SEVCA administers the statewide home heating assistance program.
"As you can imagine it was very disappointing to tell people earlier this year that their benefits were being cut," said Clarke. "We were on the edges of our seats. We hoped Congress would come through, but you can never be sure. This is great news we received today."
Earlier this year Vermont received $14.8 million compared to the $25.6 million it received last year.
The almost $11 million that Vermont got Tuesday was part of a $5.1 billion bill that will be shared by all 50 states.
"Topping up this essential program for the harsh
winter weather has been a top priority in the final days of this session, and I am pleased we are getting that job done," stated Sen. Patrick Leahy, D-Vt., a senior member of the Appropriations Committee, which crafted the bill. "Home heat in wintertime is not a choice but a necessity, and this will mean relief for thousands of struggling Vermont households."
The money that Congress approved Tuesday is about the same amount as sent to the state last year.
Last year about 2,300 families in Windham County received assistance through LIHEAP.
"At a time when heating oil prices are skyrocketing and temperatures are falling, this critically important program will help insure that no one in Vermont goes cold this winter," stated Sen. Bernard Sanders, I-Vt. "During these very difficult times, seniors on fixed incomes and families with children shouldn’t have to make the unacceptable choice between heating their homes and putting food on the table."
Clarke said that while the federal money that was announced Tuesday was welcome, it is still going to be tight winter for many families.
Vermont this year extended the eligibility requirements for fuel assistance, and this year more families are going to be eligible to apply for the federal aid.
But with the same amount of money coming up from Washington, it means, in the end, that everyone who received help last year is going to get less this year.
"On one hand we are thrilled that more people will be getting assistance this year," she said. "But for folks who have been relying on this in the past, it is going to be very hard to see those benefits cut."
The new, two-tiered LIHEAP system means that households that received about $1,100 last year will instead get about $900 this year, including the funding approved Tuesday.
And the second group, which includes households with higher incomes, will get about $380.
This year, abut 27,000 Vermont families will receive assistance compared to last year’s total of 20,300.
"This program is a critical safety net for countless low income families and seniors in Vermont," stated Rep. Peter Welch, D-Vt. "There is simply no excuse for failing to help Vermonters get through a cold, difficult winter during a time of such economic uncertainty."
Richard Moffi, Vermont’s fuel assistance program chief, said it is always a waiting game to see how Congress approves the fuel assistance.
"I am thrilled the roller coaster ride has ended," Moffi said. "We start receiving applications in the spring and we never know how much money we will get until September of October."
Moffi said the state still has to figure out how much of the money approved Tuesday will go toward fuel assistance and how much will be held for the fuel crisis program, which serve a more desperate need when people are threatened with losing their heat during the winter.
"Families have been struggling and this could not have come at a better time," he said. "This is a Christmas present for low income Vermonters."
Howard Weiss-Tisman can be reached at hwtisman@reformer.com or 802-254-2311, ext. 279.

description.hltext_display: Adif invierte 29 millones de euros en el mantenimiento de las instalaciones de control de tráfico
description.content:
Los trabajos se centrarán en el mantenimiento preventivo y correctivo de equipos y sistemas para garantizar el óptimo funcionamiento de los mismos.
El Consejo de Administración de Adif ha aprobado en su reunión de este lunes la licitación del contrato de mantenimiento de las instalaciones de control del tráfico y sistemas complementarios de la Línea de Alta Velocidad Madrid-Sevilla y el ramal La Sagra-Toledo, por importe de 29.092.524 euros.
El contrato licitado comprende el mantenimiento de diversas instalaciones, sistemas y equipos como enclavamientos electrónicos, circuitos de vía, señalización lateral, sistema Asfa (Anuncio de Señales y Frenado Automático), conducción automática LZB, ERTMS (Sistema de Gestión de Tráfico Ferroviario Europeo), sistemas de energía, detectores de caída de objetos, sistemas de protección de tren, cables de alimentación y señalización, cajas de conexión y edificios técnicos.
El objetivo es garantizar el óptimo funcionamiento de las instalaciones y resolver en el menor tiempo posible cualquier posible incidencia. Así, se contempla un mantenimiento preventivo y otro correctivo. El preventivo es ejecutado a intervalos predeterminados y está destinado a reducir la probabilidad de fallo o la degradación de funcionamiento de un elemento, siguiendo diversas metodologías según la disponibilidad y fiabilidad de la instalación. El mantenimiento correctivo es el que se realiza después del reconocimiento de una avería.
La licitación, con un periodo de vigencia de 21 meses y medio, contempla también un nuevo centro de trabajo para atender el incremento de las instalaciones motivadas por la puesta en servicio de la Línea de Alta Velocidad Madrid-Cuenca-Albacete/Valencia, que comparte sus primeros 27 km con la Madrid-Sevilla.

description.hltext_display: Stabilizira se zračni promet
description.content:

description.hltext_display: 四川若尔盖湿地重现鸥翔鹤舞 曾受鼠患侵扰
description.content:
若尔盖湿地受鼠患侵扰图据CFP
退化草地区产草量已提高一倍以上
“长江上游水源涵养地若尔盖湿地草原，水草丰茂，已经重现鸥翔鹤舞。”昨日，华西都市报记者获悉，由省科技厅组织实施的“十一五”国家科技支撑计划项目“若尔盖湿地修复技术研究与示范”，针对若尔盖湿地沙化加剧、植被严重退化、生物灾害频发、湿地生态功能退化等问题，已成功建立了高原湿地生态系统恢复与保护综合技术体系，将退化草地区的产草量提高一倍以上，沙化草地植被盖度达到50%以上，为退化湿地生态治理提供了重要的技术支撑。花湖湿地建成1座气象监测站
过度放牧、鼠虫肆虐、气候变化、开沟排水是导致若尔盖草原近几十年退化沙化最重要的原因，而其中过度放牧是重中之重。2007年，在四川的“两会”期间，人大代表提出了关于制定《四川省湿地保护条例》的议案，得到“两会”代表委员的广泛响应。省委省政府也发布了《关于建设生态省的决定》，明确要求在2010年前，使生态环境恶化趋势得到有效遏制。这也让四川成为西部地区第一个启动生态省建设的省份。
省科技厅相关负责人表示，“若尔盖湿地修复技术研究与示范”项目实施以来，在四川大学、北京师范大学、四川省草原科学研究院、兰州大学、若尔盖国家级湿地保护管理局等省内外依托单位的共同努力下，多学科交叉，产、学、研结合，提出了“高原湿地生态系统恢复与保护综合技术体系”，即湿地生态需水保障和蓄水、退化湿地生态系统恢复、沙化草地植被恢复、退化草地生态系统恢复等技术模式。在花湖湿地建成气象监测站1座，动态记录气压、气温、湿度、风向、风速、雨量等气象变化数值，测定不同植被类型和利用方式，泥炭湿地温室气体排放、吸收和固定效应。
沙化草地植被盖度达50%以上
针对高寒湿地和沙地生态恢复中牧草品种缺乏问题，专家学者们从当地植物中筛选到退化湿地植被、沙化草地植被多种的适生植物，其中阿坝硬杆仲彬草、阿坝燕麦和?草等生态治理草种已获得国家草种登记，并建立了相关的种子繁育技术体系，还研究了生于水边潮湿处的?草的后熟阶段、萌发条件，首次将其应用于湿地生态治理。
省科技厅社会发展科技处裴伟征介绍说，针对湿地退化的不同程度，项目组已建成了10个示范区和一个种子繁育基地，总面积达2850公顷，草甸区植被盖度达100%，将退化草地区的产草量提高了一倍以上，沙化草地植被盖度达到50%以上。在若尔盖的花湖四周、后花湖地区，红原的日干乔、月亮湾湿地和龙日坝湿地等，辐射推广高寒湿地生态系统恢复技术5000公顷，有效提高了辐射区的植被覆盖20%以上。相关链接啡舳?盖草原若尔盖大草原被中外专家称为“中国西部高原之肾”、“中国最美的湿地草原”，是中国六大草原之一，中国最大的高原泥炭沼泽地，是黄河上游重要的水源地。若尔盖县地处青藏高原东北边缘，位于四川省西北部和阿坝州北部，是四川通往西北省区的北大门。若尔盖湿地自然保护区位于若尔盖县境内，是我国面积最大、分布集中的泥炭沼泽区。主要保护对象为高寒沼泽湿地生态系统和黑颈鹤等珍稀动物。该保护区不仅是我国生物多样性关键地区和世界高山带物种最丰富的地区之一，还是重要的水源涵养区。

description.hltext_display: Обраха бензиностанция в Разград, оборотът бил 34 лв.
description.content:
В Разград обраха бензиностанция тази нощ.
Това е станало около 20,40 ч. на 21 декември. Двама мъже с черни качулки на главите влезли в бензиностанция „Релакс" в квартал „Орел" в града, единият нанесъл удар с пистолет по главата на 32-годишния продавач в обекта. Обирджиите взели оборота, който бил 34 лв., и побягнали в неизвестна посока.
Пострадалият е настанен в Хирургично отделение на разградската болница с контузна рана на главата, без опасност за живота.
По данни на потърпевшия лицата били с черни качулки на главите, облечени в черни дрехи, високи около 170 см.
По случая е образувано досъдебено производство.

description.hltext_display: 映汶高速七盘沟隧道双线贯通 预计2012年通车
description.content:
(记者 王代林)12月21日，映汶高速公路控制性工程七盘沟隧道双线顺利贯通。这是该项目自2009年5月9日开建以来贯通的第二座隧道。目前，映汶高速已完成38%的工程量，预计2012年10月全线建成通车。届时，成都至汶川2小时可达。映汶高速公路是汶川特大地震后都江堰至汶川的生命通道，也是国道213线(兰州-磨憨)和国道317线(成都-那曲)的共用段，甘肃南部、青海至成都的必经之路。映汶高速公路全长48.3公里，穿越“5?12”汶川特大地震震中地区，地质条件复杂，桥隧比高达75.4%，其中隧道占50%以上。七盘沟隧道总长1424米，为映汶高速最北端的隧道，靠近汶川县城，泥石流、高陡斜坡的滚石、落石、崩塌等地震次生灾害严重。建设者通过架设钢管棚、注浆等方式，昼夜施工，终于实现双线贯通。
2011年是映汶高速公路攻坚年，剩下的6座隧道将在这一年贯通。

description.hltext_display: 成都现诡异死亡路口 1个月发生5起车祸(图)
description.content:
同一个路口
10余小时内伤亡两人
1个月里5起车祸
此前两年却未见大型事故
这是一个什么样的路口……
前日晚，清波社区广场前的十字路口，一辆垃圾装运车在此撞上了一位妇女，令其当场殒命。10余小时后，还是在这里，一辆飞奔的摩托车又在此迎头撞上一辆“乐驰”，摩托车司机被甩出几米远，至今无法开口说话。前后10余小时，连续发生两起车祸，附近居民连连摇头。更令人震惊的是，在此前的20天内，这里还发生了3起车祸。
事故频繁，让这个路口显得特别诡异。
撞人声中下班 撞车声中上班
目击
司机下车瞄了妇女几眼，意识到出事的他，转身飞奔向附近的广场，躲了起来。
前日18时40分左右，在清波社区广场对面吃晚饭的覃章桃突然听到一阵尖利的刹车声，抬头一看，一辆飞速开来的垃圾装运车正将一位骑车的妇女撞飞??这位妇女被撞出几米远。垃圾车往前开了几米才停下，司机下车瞄了妇女几眼，意识到出事的他，转身飞奔向附近的广场，躲了起来。这时，一辆小汽车开了过来，司机下车一看，见垃圾车撞死了人，便转身走了。
当医生赶到现场时，妇女已经停止了呼吸。司机也在此后被警方带走。
覃章告诉记者：“死者的亲属10点过时，还来这里为她烧了纸。”
此刻的他没想到，不用太久，他将在同一地方见到另一起惨烈的车祸。
昨日早上9时40分，覃章桃正在给客户洗车，突然听到一声刹车声??他知道，又来了！路口上，一辆摩托车正迎面冲向一辆“乐驰”。“摩托车的速度很快，‘乐驰’想让，但是没让过来。摩托车撞上‘乐驰’后，司机被弹起几米高，又重重摔在地上，摩托车咔咔磨着火星子，甩到五六米远的路边。”覃章桃回忆说。
覃章桃熟练地摸出电话拨打起120。
最终，经过金沙医院的抢救，司机保住了性命，但暂时还不能开口说话。
11月前绝少事故 11月后事故频发
疑问
这个十字路口开通已快2年，此前没有目击过车祸。但是近1个月来，事故开始频繁，这是什么原因？
“这个地方，我上班才2个月时间，看到的车祸就有5起！”昨日，覃章桃回忆起这20多天内的一幕一幕：
11月底，一辆“别克”和一辆“雪铁龙”在路口相撞……
12月初，一辆“思域”和一辆“金杯”相撞，两位司机下车后差点打起来……
12月中旬，“乐风”撞上了摩托。
再加上昨天这两起事故，刚好是5起。
而覃章桃口中车祸频繁的说法，得到了围观群众的证实，唯一不同的是：有人说已经发生事故7起了，有人说发生6起了……
除了事故频繁，居民认为最奇怪的事情是：这个十字路口开通已快2年，此前没有目击过车祸。但是近1个月来，事故开始频繁，这是什么原因？
新闻延伸
安全路口为何变了？
记录
从12点过3分到12点18分，15分钟时间至少有18辆车在此违规通行。一些司机见记者拍照后，曾一度停了下来??看看有没人来罚款。据覃章桃回忆说，这个十字路口从开通起，4个方向都安装了红绿灯。之前没有发生车祸，是因为随时有交警经过。
但是，最近一个月交警很少出现，红绿灯慢慢成了摆设，不论是汽车、三轮车还是行人，只要看到无车就会闯红灯，5起车祸的原因都与闯红灯有关。
“现在是中午，车比较少，如果是早上，这里更像个菜市场！”最后，覃章桃认真地说：“如果这个地方有电子眼或者每天有警察来查，车祸就不可能这么多了。”
为了证实覃章桃所说的属实，记者决定在路口旁边守一会儿。
12时03分路口红灯亮起，一辆草绿色“哈飞”和一辆奥拓驶来，在左顾右盼一番后，闯了。
1分钟后，一辆出租车连看也不看，甚至没减速，又闯了。
从12点过3分到12点18分，15分钟时间至少有18辆车在此违法通行。一些司机见记者拍照后，曾一度停了下来??看看有没人来罚款。而行人和三轮车在这里，对无视红灯则更加变本加厉。
部门回应：正申请安装电子眼
记者就这一情况向交管部门作了反映，交管部门表示，由于警力有限，在某些时段，这个十字路口的管理确实呈现空白。此前，民警也多次在这里查过闯红灯的违法行为，但是部分司机的法律意识淡薄，一直无法根除。
为此，交管部门正申请在此处安设电子眼。在电子眼未安设前的这段时间，将强化管理力度，力争最大限度规避类似事故的发生。网友“微”观：烦啥枷止钜炻房诜⑸?多起事故，是天灾？还是人祸？

description.hltext_display: 成都至京沪动卧车票明起开卖 三种方式可购买
description.content:
明年1月11日起，成都至北京、上海将开行卧铺动车组2对。昨日，记者从成都火车站了解到，动卧车票可以通过车站的售票窗口、市内各火车票代售点、96006订票电话3种方式购买。目前初步确定成都至京沪卧铺动车组预售期为20天，因此从明日起，旅客就可以购买成都到京沪的卧铺动车组车票了。“成都至北京、上海的动卧将套用现在的第二候车室的成渝动车组专用候车室候车。”据成都车站相关负责人说，在售票方面，成都车站将安排动车组专用售票窗口，确保旅客在车站的每个窗口、市内代售点和电话订票均能顺利购买到动卧车票。据了解，旅客如选择在车站售票窗口买动卧列车车票，可去动车组专用售票窗口排队，以减少排队时间，“自动售票机是否发售动卧车票，暂未确定”。
购票方面，据成都火车站相关负责人透露，成都至京沪卧铺动车组享有“特权”，其车票预售期确定为20天，比普通列车早10天。也就是说，明日，旅客就可以买到至京沪卧铺动车组的车票了。同时，动卧列车也是“提前2小时进站候车”，旅客可从车站的动车组专用进站口进站候车。

description.hltext_display: Indian-origin airhostess jailed for smuggling cocaine into UK
description.content: LONDON: An Indian-origin airhostess, who worked for Air Canada, has been jailed for 8 years after she was found guilty of smuggling 250,000 pounds worth of cocaine into Britain via Heathrow. Mandeep Shahi, 27, smuggled four kilos of the drug on board in her luggage, as it was highly unlikely Air Canada cabin crew would be subjected to random drug searches. She breezed through customs checks after landing at Heathrow, and then headed to a hotel to deliver the goods to former public schoolboy Simon Howard-Harwood and Baljinder Nijjar, both 28. She was caught by an undercover police operation that had been on the trail of the two men, but was only arrested on her return to Britain five months later after detectives identified her using CCTV footage. Shahi claimed she had been an unwitting drugs mule, but a jury at Southwark Crown Court found her guilty of possession of class A drugs with intent to supply. The two drug dealers have admitted to conspiracy to supply prohibited drugs, while minicab driver Ghulem Malik, 53, was convicted of ferrying drugs for the pair. Giving evidence Shahi insisted that she had only packed her bag with clothes, and had no idea it contained drugs. "It was a regular day, a regular flight, a normal situation for me," the Daily Mail quoted her as telling jurors. She wept as the judge sentenced her and her fellow drug dealers to a total of 32 years in prison. Judge Gledhill said they took advantage of the lack of security checks on Air Canada staff as they flew into Heathrow. "As you well knew through your cousin, and perhaps Miss Shahi, Canada is not regarded as a country that poses a great risk of prohibited drugs being brought to this country," he told Nijjar. "The fact of the matter is, as an officer who works at Heathrow told the court, there is virtually a nil risk that flights coming into this country from Canada would be subjected to random checks of crew," he stated. Howard-Harwood, of Waterlooville, Hampshire was jailed for nine years and Nijjar, Southall, Middlesex, was jailed for 12 years after they both admitted conspiracy to supply prohibited drugs. Shahi, of Ontario, was cleared of the conspiracy to supply prohibited drugs along with Malik, of Southall, who was convicted of possession of class A and class C drugs, both with intent to supply. He was jailed for three years.

event_or_fact.property: As you well knew through your cousin, and perhaps Miss Shahi, Canada is not regarded as a country that poses a great risk of prohibited drugs being brought to this country

The fact of the matter is, as an officer who works at Heathrow told the court, there is virtually a nil risk that flights coming into this country from Canada would be subjected to random checks of crew
she had been an unwitting drugs mule, but a jury at Southwark Crown Court found her guilty of possession of class A drugs with intent to supply

description.hltext_display: Herrera y Montesino alaban la cooperación de la Junta en el Foro de Diálogo
description.author: Redacción
description.content:
El subdelegado de la Junta de Andalucía, Tomás Herrera, y el delegado especial del Ministerio de Exteriores en el , Julio Montesino, valoraron ayer de forma positiva el apoyo de la Administración autonómica al Foro de Diálogo.
Los dos tuvieron una reunión en Algeciras durante la que hablaron de este otros temas en los que ambas administraciones colaboran.
Herrera insistió en que la Junta "siempre ha apostado por fórmulas de diálogo y mutuo entendimiento en los asuntos relacionados con el Peñón, siempre bajo la premisa de que este es un asunto de competencia del Gobierno de España y que la Administración autonómica respeta escrupulosamente este punto". Tomás Herrera y Julio Montesino han acordado mantener abierto un cauce de comunicación y cooperación.
Por otro lado, el diputado del PP José Ignacio Landaluce informó de que ha elaborado una serie de iniciativas parlamentarias en el Congreso para que se esclarezcan cuáles han sido los pormenores que han rodeado la muerte de una ciudadana española en la prisión gibraltareña de Windmill Hill el pasado día 15.
Landaluce se ha dirigido al Ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores para conocer si el Gobierno está manteniendo contactos con la familia para prestar ayuda a la hora de la repatriación del cuerpo o si, habida cuenta de que esta muerte se ha producido en "extrañas circunstancias", se han mantenido conversaciones con las autoridades de Gibraltar para que sean estas las que expliquen cómo se produjo el fallecimiento o si pudiera haber existido algún error en el protocolo de vigilancia. Asimismo, añadió que este incidente "ha estado rodeado de cierto oscurantismo, no han dado a conocer las causas de la muerte y se ha abierto una investigación ordenada por el ministro de Justicia del Peñón, Daniel Feetham".

description.hltext_display: HEALTHY AND NON-TOXIC NATURAL CANDLES
description.content:
A candle is a light source usually consisting of an internal wick which rises through the center of a column of solid fuel; typically this fuel is some form of wax with paraffin wax being the most common. Candles are usually used for their aesthetic value, particularly to set a soft, warm, or romantic ambience, also for emergency lighting during electrical power failures. Small number candles are placed on birthday cakes. Scented candles are used in aromatherapy.
Paraffin is the predominant wax used in the candle industry, which is basically the "bottom of the barrel" even after asphalt is extracted. Paraffin is the final byproduct in the refining chain of petroleum. Paraffin wax is a heavy hydrocarbon that emerges from crude oil. These waxes are produced by refining or separating the waxes out of crude mineral oils. Paraffin waxes are derived from the light lubricating oil distillates; they contain predominantly straight-chain hydrocarbons with an average chain length of 20 to 30 carbon atoms. This wax is harmful and cancer causing. Natural candles are healthy and that is why these are a good choice when they are compared to the ordinary paraffin candles that you would find in the market. These candles do not have toxins that could harm you or anybody at your vicinity. This can be seen in the paraffin candle itself when it is lit so have you ever noticed that black soot near the flame of a lit candle? There are so many types of natural candles such as soy candles, beeswax candles, palm wax candles, tallow wax, bayberry wax, jelly wax and gel wax candles. Soy wax is one of the most popular and trendy wax that is used widely today because of its unique features like it is inexpensive, burns without residues and mixes well with fragrant oils. Also it is available in different colors and is used for aromatherapies. On the other hand, beeswax candles are quite expensive and known for its natural scent of honey; the beeswax is sticky and burns slowly. It is the best form of candle wax that is used by many people. It emits no smoke and burns slowly with a sweet decent smell. Palm wax candle is another kind of candle that includes the palm wax made of oil palm and can be used for making candles of different shapes and colors. Tallow wax candles are an age old natural wax candle that can be derived from pigs, cows and sheep. It is used for making candles in jars and containers as it has very low melting point, but it emits unpleasant odor while burning. Bayberry wax candles are known to have a natural and sweet aroma; it is made from mainly two types of shrubs, i.e. the Southern bayberry and the Northern bayberry. It has a rich olive color and is quite expensive when compared to the other types of wax. Jelly wax is similar to hair gel; this particular gel is a ready made wax inclusive of color and scent. Gel wax is yet another type of candle wax which is made from plastic polymer and mineral oils. This wax can be used with small marbles, wax fruit, glitter sprinkles to make beautiful and attractive.

description.hltext_display: Wade patient over title goal
description.content:
James Wade sees himself as a world champion in the making - but refuses to look too far ahead in this year's event at Alexandra Palace.
The second seed began his campaign in the PDC Ladbrokes.com World Darts Championship with a 3-0 win over Spaniard Antonio Alcinas.
"I haven't looked anywhere further than the game I just played - I believe that was the hardest game of this tournament," Wade told Sky Sports 2. "I just look at playing the game in front of me."
Of his title chances, Wade added: "I believe I will win the world title - it's whether it's this one."
Brendan Dolan took advantage of a below-par performance by 18th seed Kevin Painter to produce some top darts and claim an emphatic 3-0 victory.
Painter won just two legs as his opponent was in control throughout in north London.
Alan Tabern twice came from behind to defeat Richie Burnett 3-2.
The 23rd seed was 2-1 down before winning six of the last seven legs to reach the second round.
Denis Ovens defied illness to produce an excellent display and see off Germany's Jyhan Arhut 3-1.

I haven't looked anywhere further than the game I just played - I believe that was the hardest game of this tournament; I just look at playing the game in front of me.

description.hltext_display: Fuji Heavy Industries und Chery Automobile wollen gemeinsames Werk errichten
description.content:
(www.emfis.com) Fuji Heavy Industries, der Mutterkonzern des Automobilproduzenten Subaru und der chinesische Autobauer Chery Automobile befinden sich in Verhandlungen über den gemeinsamen Bau eines Produktionswerks in der im Norden Chinas gelegenen Stadt Dalian. Wie die japanische Nachrichtenagentur "Kyodo News" heute berichtete, hofft Fuji die Verhandlungen bis März 2011 abgeschlossen zu haben, um mit der Produktion in dem neuen Werk ab spätestens Anfang 2013 beginnen zu können. Das neue Werk wird sich zu jeweils 50 Prozent im Besitz der beiden Partner befinden. Die jährliche Produktionskapazität wurde mit 50.000 Stück für das erste Jahr angegeben, in den darauf folgenden Jahren soll der Ausstoß dann auf 150.000 Fahrzeuge gesteigert werden.
© 2010 EMFIS.COM
Klicken Sie hier, um weitere aktuelle Nachrichten zum Unternehmen zu finden:
FUJI HEAVY INDUSTRIES News

description.hltext_display: "Želim život": Prikupljeno više od 450.000 kuna
description.content:
U hrvatskom turizmu iduće će godine najvažnija biti dodjela koncesija za turističko zemljište i izrada strategije razvoja, što će imati dugoročne strateške implikacije na razvoj tog sektora, a kao i ove godine, provodit će se brojne udružene promotivne i druge tržišne aktivnosti javnog i privatnog turističkog sektora s ciljem što uspješnije sezone, izjavio je za Hinu ministar turizma Damir Bajs.
Koncesije će se tvrtkama za zemljište koje nije ušlo u njihov temljeni kapital u pretvorbi dodjeljivati na 50 godina za naknadu koja će se plaćati godišnje, a sastavljena je od fiksnog i varijabilnog dijela vezanog za prihode tvrtki.
Tvrtke koje sada rade na pojedinom zemljištu imat će prvenstvo pri traženju koncesije, pravo na tzv. prioritetnu koncesiju, ali ako to ne žele tražiti, ne moraju jer im to nije obveza. Tada bi se koncesije davale putem natječaja po najvišoj cijeni, pa tko dobije, dobije - kaže ministar.
Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
Donošenje Zakona o turističkom zemljištu ministar Bajs ocjenjuje iznimno važnim jer je time nakon gotovo dvadeset godina riješeno strateško pitanje hrvatskog turizma otvaranjem puta za daljnji razvoj tvrtki i nove, prijeko potrebne investicije, posebno u hotele i kampove.
Bitno je i što će se novac od koncesija vraćati u turizam kroz poseban razvojno-turistički Fond te lokalnoj samoupravi, koji će ga morati namjenski trošiti za poticanje standarda u turizmu.
Iduće će se godine početi izrađivati dugo očekivani dokument strategije razvoja hrvatskog turizma.

description.hltext_display: Старейшая газета России возобновляет свой выход в он-лайн режиме
description.content:
"Русский курьер" снова со своими читателями.
"Декабристы" 2010-го уже вошли в историю страны: впервые русское общество будят ни офицеры, ни философы, ни разночинцы и прочие профессиональные революционеры, а обыкновенные мальчишки-фанаты команды с символичным названием "Спартак".
"Русский курьер" снова со своими читателями. Мы вернулись в тяжелое, но интересное время. Мы вернулись, потому что не могли не вернуться. "Декабрьское восстание "Спартака"" дало мощный толчок для всех граждан России - внезапно всем стало нестерпимо ясно, что дальше так не может продолжаться. Слишком долго будили наш спокойный и рассудительный народ, слишком нагло и болезненно его тормошили и пинали. Но, кажется, дотормошились.
Мы не знаем, как будет дальше, знаем только одно, что по-старому уже быть не должно. Россия берется за ум. Это всегда лучше, чем хвататься за топор. Сегодня очень важно нам всем, кто не считает нашу страну "этой", объединяться и вместе думать, как выходить из того кошмара, в который нас загоняли последние 25 лет. А для этого нужен свободный обмен мнениями, терпимость (не путать с толерантностью!) друг к другу, воля и разум. И еще нужна точка сбора - площадка, где бы накапливалась нужная информация, а идеи кристаллизировались бы в конкретные руководства к действию. Такой точкой могла бы стать газета, которая, по словам классика, помимо всего прочего, еще и коллективный организатор.
Мы хотим выпускать газету необычного формата - газету, которую будут делать не только профессиональные журналисты. Мы хотим создать СМИ, в котором может принять участие любой здравомыслящий человек, не лишенный дара толково излагать свои мысли. Сегодня масса умных и честных людей на виртуальных просторах Сети выражают свои идеи и предложения, многие из которых могут и должны стать достоянием широкого круга читателей. И мы будем стараться дать трибуну таким людям - блогерам, форумчанам, завсегдатаям социальных сетей. Кроме того, любой читатель может поделиться с редакцией своими материалами через электронный почтовый ящик ruskurinfo@gmail.com Нас очень интересуют ваши мысли, предложения, инициативы - всё, что хоть как-то могло бы помочь возрождению нашей великой Страны.
Мы категорически против лозунга "Россия для русских!" ибо в нем начисто отсутствует здравый смысл: нет в природе такого химического соединения как "чистый русский"! Недавно в Интернете проскочила фраза "Россия для тех, кто с русскими!". Такой вариант вполне устраивает всех, кто считает НАШУ страну СВОЕЙ Родиной, кто родился здесь, вырос и не собирается менять свое место жительство на другие уголки земного шара. И нам абсолютно всё равно, какой ты нации или вероисповедания. Россия, словно огромная этнокультурная губка, которая, чем больше впитает в себя, тем она тяжелее. Давайте никогда об этом не забывать и вместе творить будущее. У нас есть всё для того, чтобы это будущее было по-настоящему светлым.
Оставайтесь с нами!
Ваш "Русский Курьер", газета национальных интересов.
Автор: Русский Курьер
Оцените этот текст
Газета №635, рубрика: События
Отзывы и комментарии к статье " "

description.hltext_display: 陈楚生发行影视金曲大碟 稳坐"主题曲一哥"宝座
description.content:
12月21日，华谊兄弟旗下实力派唱作艺人陈楚生携全新影视专辑《影之传说》在位于望京的北京华谊兄弟影院举行了隆重的发布会。2010年，陈楚生担任四部电影、一部偶像剧主题曲的演唱人，无疑成为本年度影视界最为推崇的男歌手，而陈楚生的这张影视大碟《影之传说》也终于在歌迷影迷们的期盼中于2010年末隆重发行。
众多大牌导演钦点 影视专辑重磅推出
据了解，此次陈楚生发行的影视大碟专辑《影之传说》，其中收录了为张艺谋导演指导的电影《山楂树之恋》而创作的歌曲《山楂花》、为徐克导演指导的《狄仁杰之通天帝国》创作的主题歌《丹书铁契》和宣传曲《相忘于江湖》以及为其他电影、电视剧创作、演唱的歌曲。一系列的大手笔制作，将陈楚生推向华语乐坛"内地影视金曲一哥"的宝座。而徐克导演也曾表示非常欣赏陈楚生的本色与鲜明的音乐特色；电影《山楂树之恋》的制片人张伟平先生更钦点陈楚生演唱宣传曲《山楂花》，并表示陈楚生独具个人气质的悠扬嗓音成功的与 "史上最纯洁爱情"完美融合，他的演唱加深了电影想要传达给观众的那份情感。另外，众多专业音乐制作人也对陈楚生的这张影视专辑给予很高的评价: "《影之传说》刻画出了一个创作、演唱俱佳的完美音乐才子形象，他的才华令人惊叹"。相信随着《影之传说》的全国发行，陈楚生创作演唱俱佳的魅力将展示无遗，大放异彩！
现场演唱打动人心 歌迷互动其乐融融
发布会现场，陈楚生现场献唱了《浮光》，《山楂花》及华谊兄弟电影作品——徐克导演指导的《狄仁杰之通天帝国》主题歌《相忘于江湖》，荡气回肠的旋律和洒脱大气的演唱赋予了这首歌全新的意境和陈楚生独到的风格，带领现场歌迷们将气氛推向高潮，赢得在场媒体与歌迷的一片喝彩。陈楚生也表示：这次的影视专辑想要传达给大家"如果人生是一部电影，那么音乐是连接他的生命"这样一个主题。一部好的电影音乐就像是生命中不可缺少的血液一样，是连接和升华整部剧情的重要组成部分。而发行这张专辑的另一个重要原因也是因为这些歌曲随着电影和电视剧的热播，得到了很多歌迷、影迷朋友的认可和支持，所以公司决定将我创作、演唱的这些歌曲汇集起来，发行一张影视歌曲合辑。
当天，众多媒体来到望京华谊兄弟影院，更有数百名歌迷自发来到这里为一睹偶像的风采，也为《影之传说》的发行送上了真诚的祝愿，陈楚生同中国移动无线音乐俱乐部吉祥物"咪咕"一起和"花生"们游戏互动，让大家近距离接触到这一偶像散发出的独特魅力，现场其乐融融，欢声不断。
年底档期爆满成飞人 交响演唱会用诚意做到最好
2010年对陈楚生来说可谓是异常忙碌的，各种演出、活动络绎不绝，年底更是化身空中飞人。为了能将1月8日的北展演唱会做到最好，楚生拿出全部精力积极努力的为这张交响演唱会准备着。当天更为歌迷送上惊喜，现场吉他独唱了即将于交响演唱会上献唱的《非诚勿扰2》宣传曲《爱过》，再次俘获众多歌迷的心。对于第一次举行交响演唱会的陈楚生来说兴奋溢于言表，演唱会当天会将所有的歌曲以交响乐融合电声乐器的形式重新编排献唱，并且改编翻唱了几首大家熟知的金曲，用另外的一种音乐能量展现给大家一个不同于以往的陈楚生。他表示："首次与交响乐合作，我不能说我会做得有多好，但至少我会很认真的去对待这场演唱会，希望能让大家看到又一个不一样的陈楚生，一个勇于尝试新元素，敢于挑战自己的陈楚生。"而对于演唱会的具体安排，陈楚生只是表示为了这场演唱会，提供了众多编曲和演绎的创新想法，会在演唱会当天为大家一一揭晓。
据悉，全新影视大碟《影之传说》将于12月21日开始全国发行，而《非诚勿扰2》的宣传曲《爱过》也将同步发行。

description.content:

Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
