description.hltext_display: Chinas Verbrauch bei Öl, Gas und Treibstoffen auf Rekordniveau, Preiserhöhung ab heute
description.content:
(www.emfis.com) Der Öl-, Kraftstoff- und Gasverbrauch in China erreichte im November Rekordwerte, so die chinesische Entwicklungs- und Reformkommission.
Aus den gestern veröffentlichten Zahlen geht hervor, dass der Ölverbrauch im vergangenen Monat gegenüber dem Vorjahresmonat um 15,3 Prozent auf 20,07 Mio. Tonnen gestiegen war. Der Gasverbrauch kletterte um 13,3 Prozent auf 10,20 Mrd. m² nach oben. Hauptgrund für diesen Anstieg waren die erheblich gefallenen Temperaturen.
Wie die Kommission weiter berichtete, erreichte der tägliche durchschnittliche Dieselverbrauch mit 438.667 Tonnen ein Allzeithoch. Insgesamt wurden im November mit 13,16 Mio. Tonnen Diesel 21,4 Prozent mehr von dem Treibstoff verbraucht als im Vorjahresmonat.
Mit dem heutigen Tag wurden die Preise für die Kraftstoffe nach oben gesetzt. Das ist die zweite Erhöhung innerhalb von zwei Monaten. Nachdem der Benzinpreis im Oktober um 230 Yuan pro Tonne nach oben ging, wird er jetzt um weitere 310 Yuan angehoben. Beim Diesel lag die Erhöhung im Oktober bei 220 Yuan. uns steigt jetzt um weitere 300 Yuan. Um die Bevölkerung nicht weiter zu belasten, wurden die Betreiber der öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel, einschließlich Bus, Bahn und Fluggesellschaften, angewiesen, die Preiserhöhung nicht durchzureichen, so die Kommission.
Auch die Daten für den Zeitraum Januar bis November dokumentieren einen stetigen Verbrauchsanstieg. In den ersten 11 Monaten konnte man die heimische Ölförderung um 6,7 Prozent auf 184,22 Mio. Tonnen erhöhen. Dies reichte aber nicht aus. Es mussten weitere 207,38 Mio. Tonnen importiert werden. Das ist gegenüber dem Vergleichszeitraum des Vorjahres ein Anstieg um 18,3 Prozent.
Weiterhin wurden in den ersten 11 Monaten mit 350,72 Millionen Tonnen Rohöl 13,3 Prozent mehr raffiniert wie im Vorjahreszeitraum. Die Erdgasförderung wurde von Januar bis November gegenüber dem Vorjahreszeitraum um 12,5 Prozent auf 86,2 Milliarden Kubikmeter erhöht. Gleichzeitig wurden 15,3 Milliarden Kubikmeter importiert, was einer Steigerung um satte 130 Prozent entspricht.
© 2010 EMFIS.COM

description.hltext_display: Huskies face final test before Pac-10 Conference season
description.content:
Any improvements left on the Washington Huskies to-do list had better be tended to tonight. The Huskies 6 p.m. meeting with Nevada marks their final game before tipping off Pacific-10 Conference play one week from tonight at Southern California.(We will work on) more of the same more of the same approach we had last game against San Francisco, coach Lorenzo Romar said. The same with this game: We still need to work on our rebounding. We still need to do a good job doing the things with our execution. Thats how were going to approach it.Through 10 games, the Huskies have outrebounded their opponents by an average of 39.3 to 35.3. However, they have been outrebounded in all three of their losses, by an average of 39.7 to 33.3.
After watching his team get outrebounded by six in a one-point loss at Texas A&M, Romar paired his two tallest players and top two rebounders 7-foot Aziz NDiaye and 6-foot-9 Matthew Bryan-Amaning in the starting lineup Saturday against San Francisco. UW won the boards, 40-33, and the game, 80-52.Despite Nevadas 3-8 record, the Wolf Pack has outrebounded its opponents this season, and the Huskies believe this game will provide a useful challenge before Pac-10 play.Any game is big for us, especially since we havent rebounded well in maybe just two games this season, UW co-captain Isaiah Thomas said. Any opponent whatever game it is is a good test for us, because we do it weekly in practice, but we want to do it against somebody else.As for Nevadas record, Romar makes the case that it could be misleading.They have a player who just became eligible, a player who transferred from Duke: Olek Czyz, Romar said. Hes a good basketball player. Hes a frontcourt player, and although he is not a point guard, I just remember the difference that Mike Garrity made for USC last year when he joined them. ? These guys who become eligible at the semester make a difference with their team. ? He makes them an even better team. Meanwhile, the Huskies hope their 7-3 pre-conference record also is misleading.The main goal was to go undefeated, junior Scott Suggs said. But in our losses and even in our wins, we kind of found out what we need to work on.Romar has made sure they understand what that is.Offensive execution and rebounding, Thomas said. Weve got to really work on those things before Pac-10 play, because that first game: USC. Theyve got (6-foot-10 forwards Nikola Vucevic and Alex Stevenson). And the next ones, youve got (UCLAs Nelson) Reeves and Josh Smith. So, were just working on the little things that we need to work on.THOMAS NOMINATED
Thomas was included among 66 candidates for the Bob Cousy Award, presented annually to college basketballs top point guard.A 5-foot-9 junior from Tacoma, Thomas was Pac-10 freshman of the year in 2009 and made the all-conference team last season.He also is a nominee for the Wooden and Naismith player of the year awards.
Huskies gameday
NEVADA (3-8) AT WASHINGTON (7-3)
TIPOFF: 6 p.m., Hec Edmundson Pavilion
TV: FSN. Radio: 950-AM.
Series: UW leads, 5-1, including the most recent meeting, a 61-60 win at Hec Edmundson Pavilion on Jan. 22, 1991. The schools will meet again next season in Reno.
Statistical leaders: For Nevada Mike Story, 13.5 ppg; Dario Hunt, 9.5 rpg; Deonte Burton, 3.6 apg. For UW Isaiah Thomas, 15 ppg; Matthew Bryan-Amaning, 6 rpg; Venoy Overton, 4.5 apg.
Scouting report: UW coach Lorenzo Romar calls the Wolf Pack young, quick and athletic. ? Nevada received a boost from the recent eligibility of Olek Czyz, a 6-foot-7 transfer from Duke who has averaged 7.5 points and six rebounds in his first two games with the Wolf Pack. ? Nevadas wins have come against Montana, San Francisco State and Portland State all home games. The Wolf Pack has played one Pacific-10 Conference team this season, losing at home to Arizona State, 78-75. ? Nevada was picked third in the Western Athletic Conference preseason media poll. The school has accepted an invitation to jump to the Mountain West Conference in 2012. ? Guard Patrick Nyeko is a 2009 graduate of Seattle Prep.
Next: 7:30 p.m. Dec. 29, at USC, Galen Center, Los Angeles.
Don Ruiz, staff writer

description.hltext_display: Total Hip Replacement Surgery
description.content: A total hip replacement is a surgery procedure where the affected bone and cartilage of the hip joint is replaced by surgical methods by means of artificial materials. Hip resurfacing is also a common problem among a lot of people these days. Generally speaking, an unaffected and healthy hip joint is actually a joint of ball and socket . Socket is a bone which is cupped shaped and located in the pelvis area. This socket bone is also referred to as the acetabulum. This ball comprises the head of the femur or the thigh bone. This kind of hip replacement process involves the removal by surgery of the affected socket and ball by means of surgery. By means of surgery, the affected socket and ball gets replaced with a metal ball and stem, which are put into the thigh bone and an artificial cup socket made of plastic is also placed. The metallic false stem and ball which are placed are commonly referred to as prosthesis. When this prosthesis is inserted into the core of the thigh bone, it is properly fixed by the help of a bony kind of cement which is referred to as methylmethacrylate. For other purposes, a prosthesis which is cement less is used and it has pores which are microscopic and these pores let the bony ingrowths from the regular femur bone right into the stem of the prosthesis. This hip which is cement less, is considered effective mostly for those patients who are young, and this kind of a cement less hip is expected to have a comparatively longer duration as well. This kind of hip replacement surgery is carried out pretty commonly due to the fact that severe arthritis which affects the hip joint is on the rise these days. The most common type of arthritis which leads to this kind of hip replacement surgery is osteoarthritis, or what is commonly known as degenerative arthritis of the hip joint. This kind of arthritis is commonly seen in case of aging, any sort of prior trauma caused to the hip joint, or any kind of congenital abnormality. Some other situations which might also lead to this kind of hip replacement surgery would include death of the hip bone which is commonly referred to as aseptic necrosis, bony fractures of the hip joint, and rheumatoid arthritis. Hip bone necrosis might be the result of various factors, including hip fracture, alcoholism, usage of drugs like prednisone, and diseases like systemic lupus erythematosus. There are various reasons which will lead a patient to consider this option of hip replacement. Those reasons include but are not limited to, the intense pain of the hip joints which keep on progressing, this chronic pain leading to the impairment of daily jobs like climbing stairs or walking, not maintaining a proper sitting position and the likes are reasons enough to go for total hip replacement surgery. Hip resurfacing can also be another reason for the affected people to go for this sort of a surgery. This kind of replacement surgery is an elective process, and this decision is always to be made with a thorough understanding of the possible benefits and risk which are associated with this process.

description.hltext_display: Förlust för Småkronorna
description.author: Tomas Ruuth
description.content:
ISHOCKEY Småkronorna lyckades inte rå på Kanada i tungviktsmötet inför junior-VM. Det blev förlust med 1-4.
Sverige vann skotten med 14-5 i första perioden men förlorade ändå den med 0-1. I andra perioden drog Småkronorna på sig en hel del utvisningar och hemmalaget Kanada kunde rinna ifrån till 4-1. Småkronornas mål gjordes av Skövdes division I-forward Max Friberg. - Vi drog på oss för många utvisningar, det håller inte mot Kanada, säger Roger Rönnberg till SVT efter matchen. Natten till julafton möter Sverige Schweiz i genrepet inför JVM. Själva turneringen startar sedan på annandagen med match mot Norge.

description.hltext_display: Gaschen to perform "Songs of Love" concert

description.content:
Broadway veteran and Lubbock native David Gaschen will perform his annual “Songs of Love” Valentine’s Concert at 7:30 p.m. Feb. 12 at the Cactus Theater, 1812 Buddy Holly Ave. Reserved seats are $30.
Call 762-3233 for reservations and more information.

description.hltext_display: 基金的年回报率对选择基金有用吗？
description.content:
答：肯定有用，但不绝对，例如有这样两只基金。甲基金年均回报率是14％，乙基金是9％，如果仅仅根据这两个数据应该选择买入哪一只基金，那就过于简单了。请先看看下面两组数据：甲乙两基金均运作满五年，其中，甲基金第一年盈利20％，第二年盈利40％，第三年盈利20％，第四年亏损50％，第五年盈利40％；而乙基金从第一年到第五年盈利都在9％左右。这两组数据不难发现，乙基金的投资业绩持续稳定，即便在甲基金亏损50％的年份，仍保持了9％的盈利；而甲基金虽然五年平均收益率超过了乙基金，但业绩却大起大落，试想，要是你恰好在第四年之初选择购买了甲基金，那么，头一年就将面临50％的亏损，即使接下来在第二年又获得40％的盈利，对于你来说前两年的累计投资收益还是负数。同样，要是你在第四年之初选择购买了乙基金，结果自然是两年累计收益为18％。因此年回报只是一个参考，而不能成为选择基金的唯一指标。投“基”是个长期的事情，因此需要更长远的目光来选“基”。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 投资者应学会配置并调整适合自己的基金组合
下一篇文章： 基金投资“八项注意”

description.hltext_display: School board, directors mull BUHS budget
description.content:
BRATTLEBORO -- The 2012 BUHS #6 School District budget was presented to the Brattleboro Union High School Board of Directors at a public information session held Monday evening before the board’s regular meeting.
The board discussed the budget and heard from the principals and directors of the three schools comprising the district: BUHS, Brattleboro Area Middle School and the Windham Regional Career Center.
The proposed total budget, including the school’s debt service and payments on the new track, comes in at $27,391,330. That’s $11,008, or .43 percent, more than the 2010/2011 budget.
The budget will go before the voters of the high school district at the annual meeting on Feb. 8.
The proposed budget was approved by the school district’s finance committee last week and was brought to the board of directors for review in anticipation of the board adopting the budget at a meeting held Jan. 3.
David Dunn, chairman of the BUHS Board of Directors, pointed out that within the proposed budget, per-pupil spending is well below the penalty threshold imposed by Act 68.
The budget shows that the 2012 adjusted education spending per student in the BUHS #6 district is estimated at $13,388, which is $1,345 below the state’s threshold.
"We are substantially under the (per-pupil spending) cap," Dunn said.
BUHS principal Jim Day said the high school, like the other
schools in the district, saw only a modest increase in the proposed budget.
Only one new position, an assistant technical coordinator, was added to the 2011/2012 budget, Day said.
There has been only one technical coordinator since 2004, he explained, adding that in the last six years there has been a great increase on the coordinator’s work load.
"We had only two computer carts back then (in 2004), and now there are five to six carts," he said. "Back then, no students were bringing in their own computers, and now students are asking get on our system constantly."
The budget calls for $40,000 for the new position, plus an additional $13,000 for a new Internet filter, an expense that Day said the school pays every three years.
BAMS’ budget is up just a little more than 2 percent, said the middle school’s principal, Ingrid Chrisco.
"There were contract negotiations and contracted salary increases," she said, "but they were offset by the decrease in special education funds."
"I believe we have a very responsible budget," she said.
David Coughlin, Windham Regional Career Center director, said the career center’s budget is essentially level-funded this year.
Thanks to the flexibility of the staff, the center was able to move money around to "put in some modest increases in some programs to take care of the increase in enrollment we had from last year."
Projected residential tax rates were included in the budget as well. In Brattleboro, the estimated impact for the residential tax on a $200,000 home is $7.73.
For Dummerston, it’s estimated that the owner of a $200,000 home will see a decrease of $70.80. That same figure is estimated to be an increase of $34.72 in Guilford, an increase of $49.53 in Putney, and a decrease of $35.28 in Vernon.
The board is planning to adopt next year’s budget at its next meeting on Jan. 3, where there will be another informational session scheduled to begin at 6:30 p.m. in the Windham Career Center’s Cusick Conference Room.
Jaime Cone can be reached at jcone@reformer.com or 802-254-2311, ext. 277.

description.hltext_display: 汪小菲不满大S拍激情戏 嘱咐高晓松要找“裸替”
description.content:
日前传出大S因昔日电影《爱的发声练习》床戏照，导致与张兰的婆媳关系闹僵，随后张兰否认。但已成汪太太的大S，又传出在新戏《大武生》里与吴尊、韩庚有激情裸露戏，对此，老公汪小菲亲自向导演好友高晓松要求，一定要找"裸替"，提到此事，大S平静说："我不想用私事来为戏炒新闻，这些问题我不想回应。"
据台湾"中国时报"消息，由高晓松自编自导的《大武生》，剧情描述吴尊、韩庚两兄弟闯荡上海滩为师父报仇，大S在电影里饰刀马旦，而她师父正是两兄弟的仇人，衍生出3人间剪不断、理还乱的故事。片中，大S不仅动作戏多，也分别与两位男主角都有激情戏。
汪小菲与大S认识之前，和导演高晓松关系甚好，因此传出汪小菲多次以好友身份"关切"大S片中的激情裸露戏，甚至强烈要求高晓松一定要找"裸替"，而高晓松也基本同意他的要求。
爱妻心切的汪小菲近日从北京到上海看老婆，而大S从片场收工后驱车前往酒店陪老公过夜，因此也传大S为方便约会，常搬出去住会情郎，而剧组也配合大S，经常改通告。
大S助理荳荳证实片中确实有激情戏，但尺度是否因汪小菲关说而变保守，则是不清楚。对于大S常不住剧组，她澄清："她一直都是住在剧组里。"据悉，大S在《大武生》的戏分已杀青，所以已离开剧组了，但问到是否直奔北京，投入老公汪小菲怀抱，荳荳说，私人行程不予回应。

description.hltext_display: Završila kampanja "Živim život bez nasilja"
description.content:
U hrvatskom turizmu iduće će godine najvažnija biti dodjela koncesija za turističko zemljište i izrada strategije razvoja, što će imati dugoročne strateške implikacije na razvoj tog sektora, a kao i ove godine, provodit će se brojne udružene promotivne i druge tržišne aktivnosti javnog i privatnog turističkog sektora s ciljem što uspješnije sezone, izjavio je za Hinu ministar turizma Damir Bajs.
Koncesije će se tvrtkama za zemljište koje nije ušlo u njihov temljeni kapital u pretvorbi dodjeljivati na 50 godina za naknadu koja će se plaćati godišnje, a sastavljena je od fiksnog i varijabilnog dijela vezanog za prihode tvrtki.
Tvrtke koje sada rade na pojedinom zemljištu imat će prvenstvo pri traženju koncesije, pravo na tzv. prioritetnu koncesiju, ali ako to ne žele tražiti, ne moraju jer im to nije obveza. Tada bi se koncesije davale putem natječaja po najvišoj cijeni, pa tko dobije, dobije - kaže ministar.
Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
Donošenje Zakona o turističkom zemljištu ministar Bajs ocjenjuje iznimno važnim jer je time nakon gotovo dvadeset godina riješeno strateško pitanje hrvatskog turizma otvaranjem puta za daljnji razvoj tvrtki i nove, prijeko potrebne investicije, posebno u hotele i kampove.
Bitno je i što će se novac od koncesija vraćati u turizam kroz poseban razvojno-turistički Fond te lokalnoj samoupravi, koji će ga morati namjenski trošiti za poticanje standarda u turizmu.
Iduće će se godine početi izrađivati dugo očekivani dokument strategije razvoja hrvatskog turizma.

description.hltext_display: NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development Inaugurated
description.content:
TAINAN, Taiwan--(BUSINESS WIRE)--To elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency and achieve academic excellence, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) of National Cheng Kung University (NCKU), Tainan, Taiwan, is inaugurated on December 22nd in 3rd floor, Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus.
"I am pleased to see that Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang has established the Center for Teaching and Learning Development. As I have often said, outstanding talents cannot be cultivated without excellent education, and universities cannot transform into top universities without outstanding talents.”
"The most important function of a university is education, cultivating talents, and then research and social service. It is a university’s mission to educate youth of the next generation. Education should include two aspects, teaching and learning. However, we mainly focus on the teaching of professors, neglecting the learning of students, which is allowing students to absorb as much knowledge as they can," said President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai of National Cheng Kung University in his opening remark.
President Lai also mentioned, "National Cheng Kung University had established Center for Faculty Development which focused solely on the cultivation of teachers. Thus, I believe the newly inaugurated Center for Teaching and Learning Development must embody both aspects of teaching, developing teaching methods, and learning, discovering questions, raising questions and finding solutions. I believe this is the essence of education and the development direction of the future education of National Cheng Kung University."
NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung revealed, "I am pleased to see that Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang has established the Center for Teaching and Learning Development. As I have often said, outstanding talents cannot be cultivated without excellent education, and universities cannot transform into top universities without outstanding talents." Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung also explained, "As graduates return to their alma mater, they do not recall how wonderful a professor’s research is and they only remember how strict the teaching of a professor is. Students’ parents also do not consider how renowned a professor is in the research field and they only care about how well their children can learn from the school. Therefore, a university, especially a top university, needs to take both teaching and learning into account." Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung stated, "In Taiwan, teachers often teach what they like and students often learn what they want. This is incorrect. As teachers devote themselves into teaching, they must observe the learning efficiency of the students from a different perspective. I hope the Center for Teaching and Development Learning can spread the concept for the teachers to realize the importance of education."
NCKU Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang said, "After four years of efforts, Center for Teaching and Learning Development finally inaugurated today. For the past years, under the goal set by President Lai, the Office for Academic Affairs has devoted itself to humanistic and innovative education and cross-disciplinary learning. We are excited that the Center for Teaching and Learning Development, established to truly integrate all the resources at NCKU and to promote NCKU to a top university, is finally inaugurated." Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang also said, "We have visited research and teaching universities in The United States years ago, realizing that their centers for teaching and learning development have abundant resources, and we have also visited National Taiwan University and Chung Yuan Christian University, discovering that the former lacks integration and the latter lacks manpower. With the advantages of integrated resources and unified manpower as our foundation, I believe National Cheng Kung University can become an internationally top university in the future."
The newly inaugurated NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development is located on the 3rd floor of Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus, and NCKU President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai, Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung, Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang, Director of Center for Teaching and Learning Development J. J. Wang, Director of Center for General Education Wei-Yung Wang, Secretary General Woei-Shyan Lee, other directors, deans and dozens of personnel have attended the inauguration ceremony.
The NCKU Center for Faculty Development, established in 2006, aims to strengthen the professional teaching ability of teachers and teaching assistants; however, to achieve academic excellence and innovation and elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) is established.

description.hltext_display: Crimes em baixa? Nem tanto
description.content: A criminalidade terminará 2010 em queda na Região Metropolitana, de acordo com os dados da Secretaria Estadual de Segurança. O roubo e furto de veículos na Capital, por exemplo, foi reduzido em praticamente 26% o número de carros levados por bandidos ao dia, que chegou a 30 em 2009, baixou para 23 este ano.Mas nem tudo são boas notícias. Cidade a cidade, o Diário Gaúcho constatou crimes que insistem em desafiar a polícia.- Gravataí: vigaristasCidade que atraiu várias indústrias nos últimos anos, Gravataí viu crescer também um tipo de criminoso que, sem usar violência, causa estragos. São os estelionatários, que aplicam golpes em pessoas e empresas. Pelo menos 280 pessoas foram lesadas em 2009, contra 339 este ano crescimento superior a 21%. É claro que a Brigada alerta as pessoas sobre os principais golpes da praça, mas é muito difícil prevenir. Quando descobrimos os criminosos, prendemos, mas a maioria vem de outras cidades, até porque passam a ser reconhecidos em seus municípios de origem alega o comandante do 17º BPM, tenente-coronel Dirceu Francisco Rodrigue Lopes.- Eldorado: de olho nos veículosEldorado parecia imune aos ladrões de carros. Parecia. Este ano, na comparação com 2009, teve um aumento de 147% nos registros desse tipo de crime. Realmente tivemos um aumento, mas foi até outubro, quando identificamos uma quadrilha e, junto com a Polícia Civil, a prendemos assegura o comandante da BM na cidade, tenente Darlan dos Santos Vera.Muitos casos ocorreram nas rodovias que circundam a cidade, o que dificulta ainda mais a ação policial. Em 2011, a cidade deve receber câmeras de monitoramento: Seguiremos fazendo barreiras e tentando identificar os criminosos, operações que, com certeza, ajudam a combater este tipo de crime.- Alvorada: mortes em altaApesar do combate ao tráfico ter reduzido o número de roubos e furtos em Alvorada, o mesmo não aconteceu com os assassinatos. O município viu o número subir de 68 para 87.Para o comandante da BM local, tenente-coronel Edison Estivalete Bilhalva, segurança pública não é só polícia: É preciso ter projetos sociais. O Estado tem de fazer sua parte.Para 2011, o oficial anuncia a manutenção de cinco projetos, ente eles o programa de ressocialização de drogados, que atendeu a 8 mil pessoas este ano.- Cachoeirinha: 53,17% mais roubosNo furto e roubo de veículos, Cachoeirinha vai fechar o ano com uma redução de 23,3%. Porém, no mesmo crime contra pessoas, residências e lojas, a história é bem diferente: aumento de 53,1%. Esse é um tipo de crime difícil de combater porque o criminoso, normalmente, pode planejá-lo. E a cidade é um polo, com economia forte, o que faz bandidos migrarem para a nossa área avalia o subcomandante do 26º BPM, capitão Douglas Rossato.Em abril, a cidade ganhou 40 novos PMs. Em 2011, a tendência é de que mais 30 câmeras de monitoramento sejam espalhadas em pontos estratégicos. Para o capitão, as medidas farão baixar os índices de criminalidade.

description.hltext_display: Oprezno s petardama
description.content:
U hrvatskom turizmu iduće će godine najvažnija biti dodjela koncesija za turističko zemljište i izrada strategije razvoja, što će imati dugoročne strateške implikacije na razvoj tog sektora, a kao i ove godine, provodit će se brojne udružene promotivne i druge tržišne aktivnosti javnog i privatnog turističkog sektora s ciljem što uspješnije sezone, izjavio je za Hinu ministar turizma Damir Bajs.
Koncesije će se tvrtkama za zemljište koje nije ušlo u njihov temljeni kapital u pretvorbi dodjeljivati na 50 godina za naknadu koja će se plaćati godišnje, a sastavljena je od fiksnog i varijabilnog dijela vezanog za prihode tvrtki.
Tvrtke koje sada rade na pojedinom zemljištu imat će prvenstvo pri traženju koncesije, pravo na tzv. prioritetnu koncesiju, ali ako to ne žele tražiti, ne moraju jer im to nije obveza. Tada bi se koncesije davale putem natječaja po najvišoj cijeni, pa tko dobije, dobije - kaže ministar.
Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
Donošenje Zakona o turističkom zemljištu ministar Bajs ocjenjuje iznimno važnim jer je time nakon gotovo dvadeset godina riješeno strateško pitanje hrvatskog turizma otvaranjem puta za daljnji razvoj tvrtki i nove, prijeko potrebne investicije, posebno u hotele i kampove.
Bitno je i što će se novac od koncesija vraćati u turizam kroz poseban razvojno-turistički Fond te lokalnoj samoupravi, koji će ga morati namjenski trošiti za poticanje standarda u turizmu.
Iduće će se godine početi izrađivati dugo očekivani dokument strategije razvoja hrvatskog turizma.

description.hltext_display: Livro retrata o delicado relacionamento entre mãe e filho durante o tratamento de um câncer de mama
description.content: Tweet Compartilhar Elias é um menino lindo de cinco anos e meio, com uma carinha curiosa e muitas perguntas na cabeça. Uma delas deu origem ao livro "Cadê seu peito, mamãe?", da jornalista Ivna Chedier Maluly, com ilustrações de Camila Carrossine, que retrata um episódio real vivido por mãe e filho. Em 2008 Ivna descobriu um câncer de mama. Sua mãe já tinha passado pela doença e duas primas também. Os exames apontaram a existência de dois tumores de menos de 1cm que se comunicavam, daí a decisão pela mastectomia. Um dia, depois da cirurgia, já em casa, a jornalista ouviu do filho a pergunta que dá título ao livro. E resolveu escrever todo o processo da doença e o envolvimento do pequeno Elias de uma forma delicada e bem-humorada. Quando eu perdi os cabelos Elias me disse "mas mamãe, cadê seu cabelo?". Eu respondi que tinha tomado um remédio muito forte e por isso meu cabelo caiu, mas ia voltar logo. Aí ele disse "mas você está parecendo o papai. Eu também quero cortar mais o meu cabelo pra parecer com você". Achei lindo isso conta. A publicação teve uma mãozinha da escritora Thalita Rebouças, fenômeno de vendas entre os adolescentes e amiga de Ivna de longa data. Esta e outras histórias você lê na entrevista abaixo, que a jornalista deu por email de sua casa, em Bruxelas:Ivna Maluly, a autora do livro. Foto: Divulgação Por que você decidiu escrever o livro? Com a quimioterapia tive de aprender a parar e, quando me sentia bem, ia para o computador escrever. Isso me fazia me sentir útil. Fui muito motivada também pelo meu psicoterapeuta, que me dava deveres para casa como por exemplo: "O que é um dia feliz para você, Ivna". Escrever sobre a doença foi assim também. Elias sempre foi um menino curioso, de perguntas pertinentes e inteligentes - de raciocínio bem rápido - e como eu e meu marido sempre fomos a favor de contar as coisas para ele, Elias não hesitou e muitas vezes me perguntava. A partir dessa pergunta tive a idéia de fazer esse conto. Fiz vários contos, na verdade, tenho toda a cronologia com as perguntas que ele me fez durante o processo. Acho que é uma linda história de amor e superação. O livro foi lançado agora, dois anos depois da descoberta do tumor. Como foi esse caminho?Na verdade, retirei o câncer em janeiro de 2009. Claro que receber uma notícia de um câncer não é nada feliz, mas eu sabia que poderia correr esse risco um dia. Minha mãe teve câncer há quatro anos e duas primas minhas também, uma com uma história feliz e outra não. No início fiquei desesperada, claro. Tinha acabado de perder uma das minhas primas, com o mesmo câncer que o meu. Em 2008 eu tinha ido a um médico que me disse que eu não tinha nada. Eu já tinha sentido um caroço no seio direito. Fiz mamografia, ultrassonografia, mas disseram que era displasia. Dois meses depois o caroço continuava ali. Tive dor no seio, ele ficou vermelho, como se tivesse com febre. Aí telefonei para o médico e ele me disse que eu estava querendo ver chifre em cabeça de cavalo. Continuei desconfiada e, como eu ia passar férias no Brasil, fiz todos os exames, que apontaram a existência de dois tumores de menos de 1cm que estavam se comunicando. Daí a decisão de uma mastectomia. Retirei o seio no Brasil. Quando acordei na mesa de cirurgia, o Dr. Carlos Vinícius Leite, mastologista de Petrópolis, me disse que tinha uma notícia boa e uma ruim. A boa era que eu não tive os gânglios infectados pelo câncer, não havia metástase. A ruim era que eles acharam melhor refazer o seio depois do tratamento coadjuvante. Depois vim para a Bélgica, onde eu moro, me tratar num dos melhores institutos de câncer de mama do mundo, o Jules Bordet. Tive sorte, agradeço todos os dias por isso. E o tratamento?A quimioterapia engorda a pessoa por causa da cortisona. Eu inchei muito e vi meu corpo passar de 64 quilos para 80 quilos, uma loucura! Hoje já perdi dez, mas ainda faltam uns quilinhos. Essa mudança do corpo foi muito dura para mim mas não tinha jeito. Outra coisa que a quimio provocou foi uma menopausa transitória: fiquei um ano sem menstruar e o risco de ficar estéril me amedrontou porque eu tenho o desejo de ter outro filho. Ainda não estou liberada, vamos ver. O que foi mais difícil?O mais difícil, por incrível que pareça, não foi perder um seio. O difícil foi aceitar que, mesmo jovem, a gente pode sofrer com doenças graves. E devemos sobretudo aceitar que somos suscetíveis a tudo nesta vida. Eu não conseguia entender porque é que eu tão nova tinha que passar por isso tendo um filho pequeno para cuidar. Mas enfim, essa doença tem cura e o segredo é realmente prevení-la. Meu tratamento durou um ano e meio e hoje estou muito feliz. Estou ótima. Quantos anos o Elias tinha na época que você descobriu a doença e quantos anos tem hoje? Como ele reagiu?Elias tinha três anos e meio e agora está com cinco anos e meio (preciso dizer isso, se não ele fica chateado!). Nós nunca o levamos para o hospital. Explicamos que mamãe estava sendo operada, que estava em tratamento e preferimos deixá-lo seguir o ritmo normal da vida. Ia à escola, ia ao parque, meu marido me ajudou muito na época, brincava e ainda brinca com ele e falava muito com ele. Quando eu perdi os cabelos Elias me disse: "mas mamãe, cadê seu cabelo?" Eu respondi que tinha tomado um remédio muito forte e por isso meu cabelo caiu, mas que ia voltar logo. Aí ele disse, "mas você está parecendo o papai. Eu também quero cortar mais o meu cabelo pra parecer com você". Achei lindo isso. E hoje como ele está? Ainda lembra do assunto?Ele está ótimo. Na escola pergunto sempre para o corpo de professores como ele está e eles respondem sempre que está super bem, que é um aluno curioso e feliz. Quando eu estava passando pelo processo de tratamento, achei que ele estava muito colado na gente, em mim e no meu marido. E depois na minha mãe que passou quatro meses nos ajudando aqui. Ele queria dormir com a gente, que segurássemos ele no colo e brincássemos com ele. Mas acho que isso é normal para uma criança entre três e quatro anos. E você?Eu estou verdadeiramente bem. Faço tudo o que devo fazer para estar bem comigo mesma. Tomo os remédios, frequento a fisioterapia, faço os exames corretamente. E continuo com as minha sessões de psiquiatria. Vivo minha vida como posso, sem me exigir muito, e curto muito os dias frios e quentes de Bruxelas. Estou dando aulas e escrevendo. Gosto da vida. E o peito, voltou?O peito ainda não voltou. Ainda não estava liberada para operar, agora já posso. Estou consultando médicos no Brasil e aqui, mas ainda não tomei minha decisão final. Tem muitas mulheres que não reconstroem seus seios. É até uma nova onda por aqui e acho que no Brasil também: não querem mais sofrer com isso, preferem ficar assim. Também tem a questão da idade, muitas acham que já não são tão mocinhas. Vi um documentário de um francesa que dizia não querer reconstruir. Uma mulher bonita, jovem, mas que estava ok com o seu corpo e não queria refazer o seio. Se eu tivesse decidido não reconstruir o seio, talvez o livro tivesse outras perguntas e respostas, outro final. Mas quero reconstruir. Tenho 35 anos e acho que o seio pra mim e para uma mulher representa muita coisa. Você acha que muitas mães passam por isso? Como você acha que é a maneira certa de lidar?O câncer de mama é o segundo câncer de maior incidência em todo o mundo segundo dados do Inca. Atinge aproximadamente 1 milhão de mulheres em todo o mundo, 49 mil só no Brasil, com a mortalidade de mais ou menos 24% dos casos. Principalmente aqueles com detecção tardia. Aconselho muito as mulheres se informarem, desconfiarem, se tocarem, se não souberem fazer o auto-exame que procurem seus médicos. A palavra câncer dá medo, não é uma notícia feliz. Mas também não é um bicho de sete cabeças. Eu acho que a melhor maneira de lidar com a doença é aceitá-la. E pronunciar esta palavra quantas vezes for necessário: câncer, câncer, câncer... Isso ajuda a se familiarizar com a doença. Quando eu estava fraca por causa da quimio, eu lia, dormia, comia sorvete, ia conversar com um amigo meu padre aqui da paróquia, fazia o que às vezes não tinha tempo de fazer. Aprendi muito! E o mais importante: o que o Elias achou do livro?Elias adora o livro. Gosta de saber que ele é personagem, adora sobretudo a parte em que ele coloca a cabecinha para ver se o meu peito tinha voltado, ri muito. Outro dia disse que estava cansado de dar autógrafos. Eu fiz um carimbo com o nome dele para o dia do lançamento. Como fizemos dois lançamentos, ele me disse que estava fatigado. Vou fazer aqui em casa um lançamento para amigos. Elias já disse que vai me ajudar a carimbar mas só um pouquinho porque quer brincar com as crianças que estarão aqui. A capa da obraFoto:Divulgação Grupo RBSDúvidas Frequentes | Fale conosco | Anuncie - © 2000-2010 RBS Internet e Inovação - Todos os direitos reservados.

description.hltext_display: Why Platelet Rich Plasma is Growing Popular in Surgical Treatments
description.content: Among the essential parts of the body, growth factors are responsible for the body. Growth factors are nothing but molecules triggering the healing of ligaments, tendons and bones at various stages. When injury is inflicted to some part of the body, the damaged cells as well as the exposed collagen proteins give rise to an inflammatory process. Platelets make their way to the injured body part and set in the healing process by releasing the growth factors. The white blood cells or leukocytes too release growth factors to assist platelets heal the damage. The biological process of reducing inflammation, fighting infection and healing damage is known as Platelet Rich Plasma. Platelet Rich Plasma is a focus of scientific research in the medical field. Platelets are found in the blood. They are a high source of the growth factors. Scientists are utilising platelets from the blood of a patient's body to remedy various ailments. They have worked on how to isolate, concentrate and activate the platelets to boost the content of growth factors in the body. Since the 1970s, Platelet Rich Plasma has been used. But, there is no end to the medical research on platelets to discover its healing applications for bone and tendon injuries. The following are different growth factors, used in PRP processes: Platelet Derived Growth Factor or PDGF is a protein that platelets, endothelial cells and macrophages produce. The platelets healthier granules store the protein. Used in Platelet Rich Plasma, this protein is released, when the platelets combine together and the coagulation cascade begins. Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor or VEGF is the immune acid that is 24% similar to PDGF beta. The immune acid combines with the growth factors and triggers the healing process. This powerful mitogene from endothelial cells produces angiogenic actions that are used in Platelet Rich Plasma. Transforming Growth Factor or TGF is a family of proteins including morphogenic bone proteins and many others. It performs three primary functions which are modulating cell proliferation, producing an immune suppressor effects and promoting the synthesis of extra-cellular matrix. It is another important element, used in Platelet Rich Plasma. Fibroblast Growth Factor or FGF increases collagen synthesis, promotes endothelial cell proliferation and stimulates angiogenesis. Similar to FGF, Connective Tissue Growth Factor or CTGF is being utilized in research on Platelet Rich Plasma. It promotes cartilage regeneration, angiogenesis and platelet adhesion.Use of PRP in Medical Surgeries Platelet Rich Plasma or PRP has become popular as a means of cartilage restoration over the past few years. In the field of medical surgery, it has developed into an orthobiologic option for ankle and foot injuries. PRP is also beneficial for such surgical treatments as bone augmentation, plantar fasciitis and Achilles tendinopathy. The use of PRP in cartilage restoration for treating the injuries to the knee and ankle joints is tremendously increasing. PRP offers enhanced concentration of autologous platelets that, in turn, leads to a high concentration of growth factors. Thus, PRP leads ensures the healing of tendons, ligaments and bones at a fast pace.

description.hltext_display: 2010 Transit In Review: MTA Money Woes Lead To Fare Hikes, Reduced Service
description.content:
As NY1 continues its look back at the top news stories of 2010, the Metropolitan Transportation Authority is ending a year of straphangers' fury over fare hikes and service cuts. NY1's Transit reporter John Mancini filed the following report.
For the Metropolitan Transportation Authority, 2010 started out badly, and for the third time in three years, New York's mass transit users found themselves paying.
"What we have now is a system where the riders are constantly being asked to pay more," said Paul Steely White of Transportation Alternatives.
Riders arrived in the new year facing big service cuts to make up for hundreds of millions to cover a shortfall by the state.
"Nobody likes the situation that is here," said MTA Chairman and CEO Jay Walder.
Walder's first full year was full of riders' vents. First, cuts eliminated 38 bus routes and two subway lines, and then dozens of subway booths closed.
Finally, hearings were on the fare hikes, which will take effect on December 30.
In between, the MTA slashed a half-billion dollars by streamlining operations, as nearly a thousand station agents, bus drivers and other union workers were laid off.
Labor leaders mocked Walder as out of touch.
"We're going to fight tooth and nail to make sure that the Jay Walders of the world, that are multimillionaires making these decisions, that are destroying New York's working families, are held accountable," said Transport Workers Union Local 100 President John Samuelsen.
It is certain New Yorkers will pay. Starting on December 30, a price for a monthly MetroCard goes up $15, to $104. The base fare will remain $2.25, but a weekly card will increase from $27 to $29.
Tolls will rise as well. With E-ZPass, it will be $4.80 on the major crossings and the cash toll will be $6.50. All of it was not enough to keep the MTA in the black.
"Our financial situation remains extremely fragile," said Walder.
There were also embarrassments captured by observant riders. An attendant seemed to sleep in the booth, and both a bus driver and subway motorman were caught texting.
"I wanted to punch in a wall. It's just outrageous," said MTA Board Member Doreen Frasca, in regards to the texting motorman. "He should have known better."
Some things improved, such as Select Bus Service and the promise of a faster ride on First and Second Avenues. New subway intercoms made a flashy debut, as did stand-up scooters for transit police.
There was progress made on the Second Avenue Subway, the Fulton Street hub and the 7 line extension, and the city floated the idea of sending the 7 train all the way to New Jersey.
New technology gave real-time schedule info, and a year in, Walder said he has no regrets in taking the job.
"Do I wish that it was easier? Yes. Do I wish that we had more money to do different exciting things? Yes," said Walder.
Whether Walder will stay is up to Governor-Elect Andrew Cuomo, who takes office on January 1.

description.hltext_display: Indian ICVL to appoint adviser on Riversdale stake bid-source
description.content:
EST
NEW DELHI Dec 22 (Reuters) - An Indian consortium of state-run companies will meet later on Wednesday to appoint a merchant bank to advise on whether it should bid for a stake in Africa-focused Riversdale Mining (RIV.AX), a source at a member of the consortium told Reuters.
"We are inclined towards bidding (for a stake in Riversdale) subject to the outcome of due diligence," the source said, requesting anonymity.
The members of the International Coal Ventures (ICVL) consortium are NTPC (NTPC.BO), Steel Authority of India (SAIL.BO), NMDC (NMDC.BO), Coal India (COAL.BO) and Rashtriya Ispat Nigam Ltd.
"The board is meeting this evening to appoint a merchant banker to do the due diligence," the source added.
He said ICVL was not interested in full control of Riversdale. (Reporting by Ruchira Singh)

description.hltext_display: Usmanov to increase stake - report
description.content:
Alisher Usmanov hopes to increase his stake in Arsenal to overtake Stan Kroenke as the club's main shareholder, according to reports.
The Russian billionaire currently owns a 27% share in the Barclays Premier League title contenders and hopes to buy another 2.9% in order for him to surpass American Stan Kroenke, who currently owns a 29.8% stake.
Should Usmanov succeed in increasing his share to 29.9%, he would still be left 0.1% short of the stake required to trigger an automatic takeover.
Usmanov and Kroenke have both been increasing their stakes in the club over the last few years and the Uzbekistan-born metals and mining tycoon did not rule out completing a full takeover of the Londoners today.
"Today, we have 27%. Our objective is to bring that up to a blocking stake of 29.9%," Bloomberg quotes Usmanov as saying on Russian state TV.
"And from there, we will just keep looking," he added.
"You can never tell about what happens in life."
Although Usmanov terms the increase a "blocking" stake, if he did increase his share to 29.9% he would just have a bigger say in the club's business dealings, rather than block any other party taking over the club.
Lady Nina Bracewell-Smith, one of the club's other two shareholders, put her 15.9% stake up for sale in April.
Non-executive director Danny Fiszman, who controls 16% of shares, is the club's other major shareholder.

event_or_fact.property: And from there, we will just keep looking; You can never tell about what happens in life.
in the club's business dealings, rather than block any other party taking over the club

description.hltext_display: 未婚夫透露Selina双腿如蜂窝 容颜难恢复(图)
description.content:
Selina因拍摄爆破戏意外灼伤，事发至今62天，持续住院接受治疗与复健。未婚夫张承中今天上Selina加油网站发言，透露三度灼伤的她双腿如蜂窝、手如生牛肉，外观难恢复。
据"中央社"消息，张承中上午三度在Selina加油网站公开心情与未婚妻的病情，他说："随着她的皮慢慢补满，生命指数渐渐稳定，接踵而来的，是生理与心理复健的双重挑战。"据悉，Selina目前复健的最大障碍，除了新皮易破，还有虚弱无力的萎缩肌肉。
张承中坦言，Selina每次复健拉扯关节，疼痛有如撕裂皮肉；每痛完一次，总是破的破、肿的肿，Selina好不容易辛苦完成一天的复健，接续就面对奇痒难耐让她辗转失眠；"好不容易闭上眼，醒来又是一身紧绷；沮丧完了哭累了，擦擦眼泪再来一次。"
除了漫漫复健长路之外，张承中也指出，"三度灼伤的意思是，康复后有后遗症长期相伴，外观不可能回到从前。"肌肉萎缩改变Selina的身形，双腿像蜂窝，双手背及手臂烧伤处有如新鲜的生牛肉，至于黑红黑红的脸，有机会不留疤。
张承中说："她比我们都清楚自己原来模样，当然，她也比我们都清楚自己现在是什么模样。"Selina自我解嘲又嚎啕痛哭，会镇定端详自己却含泪望着阿中，彻底绝望却又怀抱希望，她想回到过去但只能迎接未来，最后只能默默武装自己，笑脸安慰大家。
张承中希望这个考验会更有意义，希望Selina没有白白受罪，盼公安单位能依法调查、电视台明确解释前因后果、导演、剧组不要再逃避、媒体能持续追踪事件始末、深入探讨事件教训。
"无论多痛多久，她仍然等待着通过考验的那一天，我依旧期待着S.H.E的下一张专辑。"张承中坚信Selina会回来，他也深信，这个社会也不会只好奇Selina的外表变化，迎接她的还会有许多更有意义的关注。

description.hltext_display: 基金“奥运”之选基金要选“冠军队”
description.content:
2004年当地时间8月22日14时26分,张怡宁在雅典奥运会乒乓球女子单打决赛中直落四盘,击败朝鲜对手金香美,为中国体育代表团夺得夏季奥运会上的第100枚金牌。
张怡宁的这枚金牌,充分体现出中国乒乓梦之队的力量。
感叹“既生瑜,何生亮”的同时,德国乒乓名将波尔承认,“在乒乓球上,中国队是完美的。”完美的内涵实际上意味着,中国队的强大,不仅来自个人,更是团队优势。
团队优势不仅能够带来一次成功,更能持续创造卓越业绩。中国乒乓球队长期在国际比赛中奏响凯歌,除了拥有林立高手外,更拥有不断产生高手的机制。投资者买基金也一样。要挑到好基金,首先就要选择一支“冠军队”,即找到综合实力更强的基金公司。有了好的管理团队,就如同有了优越的人才基础与制度基础,再出冠军基金的可能性就更大了。
具体而言,就是要仔细分析造就基金产品的平台。如同预期中国乒乓球队比赛成绩,我们始终坚信他们胜利的几率更大,因为他们基于中国乒乓球队的人才平台、训练平台与制度平台。如果一家公司旗下基金整体表现都相对出色,这就反映出整个团队实力胜人一筹。国内一位知名基金经理曾表示,他所管理的基金业绩做得好,本人的贡献有30%,剩下的70%来自于投研团队。有了好的投研团队,加上合理的制度设计,可以保证基金公司旗下同类型基金产品业绩都相对齐整。对于投资者来说,若购买这种基金公司的某只基金,就可以不再怀着碰运气的心态了。
基金业绩的稳健也非常重要。基金投资强调长期性,稳健投资才能为投资人创造可靠回报。证券市场震荡起伏,某一个季度基金业绩排名在前并不是难事,难的是每个季度都排在前列。如2005年国内上半年净值增长率居前的10只基金,到年底有6只仍居前10名,其中前5名位置几乎没有变动；2006年上半年净值增长率居前的10只基金,到年底仅有4只仍在前10名之列,基金上、下半年的业绩波动性较2005年更大。同时,我们注意到,业绩相对稳健的几只基金,多数来自人们比较熟悉的实力型公司。
也就是说,在某种程度上,出自“名门”,基金未来业绩有更多的可预期性。选基金要选“冠军队”,最好能够选出像中国乒乓球队那样的梦之队。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 基金经理谈选股四原则
下一篇文章： 基金“奥运”之平衡之术选基金

description.hltext_display: Ubijen zaštitar, policija traga za ubojicom
description.content:
U hrvatskom turizmu iduće će godine najvažnija biti dodjela koncesija za turističko zemljište i izrada strategije razvoja, što će imati dugoročne strateške implikacije na razvoj tog sektora, a kao i ove godine, provodit će se brojne udružene promotivne i druge tržišne aktivnosti javnog i privatnog turističkog sektora s ciljem što uspješnije sezone, izjavio je za Hinu ministar turizma Damir Bajs.
Koncesije će se tvrtkama za zemljište koje nije ušlo u njihov temljeni kapital u pretvorbi dodjeljivati na 50 godina za naknadu koja će se plaćati godišnje, a sastavljena je od fiksnog i varijabilnog dijela vezanog za prihode tvrtki.
Tvrtke koje sada rade na pojedinom zemljištu imat će prvenstvo pri traženju koncesije, pravo na tzv. prioritetnu koncesiju, ali ako to ne žele tražiti, ne moraju jer im to nije obveza. Tada bi se koncesije davale putem natječaja po najvišoj cijeni, pa tko dobije, dobije - kaže ministar.
Očekuje se da će najveći dio tvrtki, koje imaju pravo na prioritetne koncesije, to pravo i ostvariti, odnosno zatražiti koncesiju te ih do početka idućeg ljeta do lipnja 2011. i dobiti.
Donošenje Zakona o turističkom zemljištu ministar Bajs ocjenjuje iznimno važnim jer je time nakon gotovo dvadeset godina riješeno strateško pitanje hrvatskog turizma otvaranjem puta za daljnji razvoj tvrtki i nove, prijeko potrebne investicije, posebno u hotele i kampove.
Bitno je i što će se novac od koncesija vraćati u turizam kroz poseban razvojno-turistički Fond te lokalnoj samoupravi, koji će ga morati namjenski trošiti za poticanje standarda u turizmu.
Iduće će se godine početi izrađivati dugo očekivani dokument strategije razvoja hrvatskog turizma.

If you were meeting two people, one of whom was very attractive and the other, so-so, you would tend to pay more attention to the better looking person, according to a new study.
University of British Columbia researchers have said that people pay closer attention to people they find attractive.
Professor Jeremy Biesanz, UBC Department of Psychology, student Lauren Human and undergraduate student Genevieve Lorenzo conducted an experiment involving more than 75 male and female participants.
After each interaction, study participants rated partners on physical attractiveness and five major personality traits - openness, conscientiousness, extraversion, agreeableness and neuroticism.
Results indicated that participants identified the "relative ordering" of personality traits of attractive participants more accurately than others.
"If people think Jane is beautiful, and she is very organized and somewhat generous, people will see her as more organized and generous than she actually is," said Biesanz.
"Despite this bias, our study shows that people will also correctly discern the relative ordering of Jane''s personality traits – that she is more organized than generous – better than others they find less attractive."
"Not only do we judge books by their covers, we read the ones with beautiful covers much closer than others," he added.
The study is published in the December edition of Psychological Science.

description.hltext_display: M-1で優勝すると思うコンビは？ -
Prison staff ‘biggest killers’
description.content:
Prison officials are the biggest killers of prisoners, according to a Judicial Inspectorate of Correctional Services report by Inspecting Judge Deon van Zyl.
Judge Van Zyl said the incidence of inmate murder by prison officials was even more frequent than murders committed by other inmates and raised ?serious concerns?. ?Officials appear to have been involved in acts of violence against inmates who are alleged to have assaulted an official or other inmates . These actions often constitute a form of revenge in response to an attack on an official,? he said, citing ineffective disciplinary measures at the disposal of correctional officials. ?Swift criminal prosecution should, in appropriate cases, ensue, particularly where the level of violence constitutes cruel and inhumane treatment of inmates, if not acts of torture. Our reading of the reports, however, indicates recalcitrance on the part of authorities to take decisive action against correctional officials involved in such cases,? he said. South African Prisoners? Organisation for Human Rights president Golden Miles Bhudu said they had been lobbying the Correctional Services department for years about unnatural prison deaths.
Lukas Muntingh, project co-ordinator at the Civil Society Prison Reform Initiative, said the problem was that South Africa had not classified torture as a crime. ?We need legislation to criminalise torture so that every death in a prison will be treated as a suspicious death.? Correctional Services did not respond by deadline. - Cape Times

description.hltext_display: 基金“奥运”之平衡之术选基金
description.content:
“璇美人”告诉您,掌握平衡,就能把握成功。
2000年,在悉尼奥运会平衡木赛场上,最后一个出场的刘璇以9.825高分征服全场,获得梦寐以求的奥运冠军。
平衡木表面狭窄,要求运动员具备良好的协调性,只有控制好自己的平衡感与节奏,才能伸展自如,翩翩起舞。自1952年第15届奥运会开始,平衡木被列为比赛项目。到20世纪80年代,平衡木运动发展迅速,并已由动静结合发展成以动为主,难中求稳的竞技项目。
其实,在基金大家庭里,也有这样一类懂得平衡之术的成员―――平衡型基金。它通过灵活的资产配置,通过构建股票与债券的动态均衡组合,在景气的多空变化中追求长期稳健收益。
因为平衡型基金在股票和债券上都要适当配置,一般而言风险和收益较股票型基金都要低些,属于进可攻、退可守的品种。特别是在震荡市道,平衡型基金更能显示出攻守兼备的特性。如当市场处于上升期,可以弹性调高股票投资比率,调降债券等保守型投资工具的持有比率；而当市场掉头反转,则可以降低股票的持有比率,提高债券等保守型投资工具的投资比重。平衡型基金通常持股可在20%至75%之间调整,一般股票型基金的持股比例则被限制于60%至95%之间。
在2003、2004、2005年这三个比较波动的年份中,A股市场中平衡型基金的平均回报率都不低,甚至高于股票型基金的回报。另外,在2006年的单边牛市行情中,虽然平衡型收益回报低于股票型基金,但其平均波动率要低很多,说明平衡型更加适合稳健型投资者。
从海外长期市场表现看,根据晨星统计数据显示,在亚洲各类共同基金中,平衡型基金在过去10年间的总回报远超过了包括股票基金在内的其他类型的基金,这证明了平衡型基金在波动行情中的平稳投资能力。因此,对于风险承受能力较低的投资者而言,可将平衡型基金作为波动市场中重点关注的基金品种。
深谙平衡之术,平衡型基金可以及时应对市场变幻,灵活调整投资组合,如平衡木运动员,方寸之间起落有致,创造非凡。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 基金“奥运”之选基金要选“冠军队”
下一篇文章： 择时选股,探索主动管理型ETF

description.hltext_display: About Partial Knee Replacement
description.content: Partial knee replacement is a common thing to go by, given the fact that the knee replacement process is on the rise in the recent times. Gender specific knee replacement is also an available process, as the way to replace knee for a male differs from the process which is to be followed for a woman. This partial replacement of the knee is also referred to as knee arthroplasty. This surgery is considered helpful for treating those people who are suffering from osteoarthritis of the knee joint. Generally speaking, patients usually go through the total knee replacement surgery in case of severe arthritis affecting the knee joint. In case of total knee replacement, all the cartilage is removed from the knee joint, and this is substituted by a plastic and metal implant. This partial replacement process is gaining in terms of popularity and significance as this process generally takes lesser time to recover for the patient when compared to the total replacement process. This partial replacement process also entails smaller cut. This process is also referred to as minimally invasive knee surgery or unicompartmental knee replacement. This process of replacing an arthritis affected knee is helpful in removing the most damaged parts of the cartilage, after which those damaged surfaces are replaced. However, please know that this process cannot be applied on any and everyone. This minimally invasive knee replacement process is generally helpful for those patients who are suffering from very acute arthritis of the knee, and the knee has not been receptive to conservative treatments of arthritis. However, these are only a few of the conservative methods which can be applied on an arthritis affected knee. If these conservative methods have not been effective on the affected knee, then one can consider the various surgical methods, including the partial replacement process. The partial replacement process can be carried out if only a specific area of the knee is affected by arthritis. Never ever should you consider this partial replacement process if the arthritis in your knee is widespread. This process will not be effective in such a widespread situation. Additionally, this process is helpful for those arthritis patients who are not more than 55 years of age, are not obese, are relatively sedentary, and have their ligaments intact. If a particular patient does not cater to all of these factors, then this partial replacement process will not be effective. This is the reason why quite a few patients are not eligible for this kind of knee replacement process, as they do not qualify under all of the above mentioned criteria. Gender specific knee replacement also has a age to be effective. As have been seen in various studies, those patients who seek to undergo this sort of knee replacement are at a very advanced stage of surgery, and therefore, this process will not be of any sue for such advanced stage patients. According to the mentality of most of the patients, they only consider partial knee replacement when the arthritis goes out of hand, which is necessarily the advanced stage. Hence, this process will not work then.

description.hltext_display: Bridge opening delayed
description.content:
DUMMERSTON -- Structural issues at the green iron bridge just off Route 30 have delayed the structure’s long-awaited reopening for several months, according to transportation officials.
During construction earlier this fall at the iron truss bridge located over the West River in Dummerston, crew members located some deterioration at the top cord -- the beam that runs along the top of the bridge -- that is likely to set back repairs an additional few months or longer if weather conditions worsen this winter.
Michael Renaud, of Renaud Brothers Construction in Vernon, said after the flooring was replaced and as crews prepared to paint the bridge near the end of the project, rust was found on the top of the structure. "They just found some problems that weren’t originally discovered ... now they have to decide how they want to address it."
Renaud said in August the renovations were about 90 percent complete and the bridge was slated to open in mid-September before the structural issues were found later in the fall.
Resident engineer Chad Greenwood, of the Vermont Agency of Transportation, said engineers are working to design a top plate for both sides of the truss to ensure it can retain the weight limit of 10 tons. He noted the 120-year-old bridge probably begin deteriorating because of its age and the New England weather.
"Age is probably the biggest issue," he said. "Hopefully we get it repaired and get
Advertisement
it open."
Reopening the bridge provides more access to the western side of town, ideally taking more vehicles off the covered bridge just up the road. Town officials received $3.2 million to rehabilitate the structure in February 2009 and hope to hear back from the state within the next few weeks if the state will fund the more recent structural repairs.
The historic bridge has been closed to traffic for more than a decade. Built in the late 1890s, it is one of the oldest iron truss bridges in Vermont.
Chris Garofolo can be reached at cgarofolo@reformer.com or 802-254-2311 ext. 275.

description.hltext_display: Gra komputerowa promuje Zozole
description.content: Rozpoczęła się niestandardowa akcja promocyjna marki Zozole, skierowana do najmłodszych użytkowników sieci. Interaktywna gra zachęca dzieci do pomocy w poszukiwaniu św. Mikołaja. Gra zawiera elementy komiksowe oraz interaktywne. Gracze mają za zadanie pomóc bohaterom gry - Zozolom - rozwikłać zagadki w formie łamigłówek, które wieńczą kolejne części komiksu. Za kreację i produkcję gry odpowiada agencja interaktywna Nolabel. Trwająca do 26 XII 2010 akcja jest wsparta intensywną kampanią reklamową w Internecie, przygotowaną przez dom mediowy IQ Media. Grę można zobaczyć na stronie mikolaj.zozole.pl. description.hltext_display: Lubbock ranks No. 2 in U.S. for dry eyes
description.author: Lubbock Avalanche-Journal
description.content:
Blame it on the wind and dry air. Lubbock was named the No. 2 hot spot for dry eyes, along with El Paso.
The National Women’s Health Resource Center ranked 100 cities based on information compiled by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration’s Clinic Data and the Environmental Protection Agency. According to the study, factors contributing to the listing included temperatures, humidity, wind, altitude, pollutants and ocular allergens.
Those factors made Texas prime to take the top spots on the list. Midland/Odessa, Dallas/Fort. Worth and Amarillo joined Lubbock on the list, taking the fourth, fifth and ninth spots, respectively.
Those factors typically worsen during the colder months, and consequently so do incidents of dry eyes.
“Winter is the worst,” said Dr. Charles Stockwell, an ophthalmologist with Texas Tech Physicians.
During the season, humidity drops, and forced heating indoors contributes to the dry air. For those with dry eyes, symptoms may become more severe.
“When you have dry eyes, your eyes feel sandy and gritty,” Stockwell said. “It’s like an allergy.”
Other symptoms include mucus developing around the eye, eye fatigue after short periods of reading, sensitivity to light, periods of excessive tearing, and blurred vision, often worsening at the end of the day, according to the Mayo Clinic.
For most people suffering from dry eyes, simple, over-the-counter drops will help elevate the irritation. Placing a humidifier in the home will add moisture to the air, and wearing sunglasses will protect eyes from the wind and sun.
Stockwell said those with more severe problems may require inserts that work like artificial tears keeping eyes moist. Once a day, patients place a cellulose insert between their eye and eyelid. The insert dissolves slowly, lubricating the eye.
Contact wearers are among the most likely to experience dry eye symptoms. However, the solution is simple. Stockwell suggested decreasing wearing time.
More winter eye problems
Winter is not just the worst time for dry eyes. During the season doctors also see an increase in eye injuries and infections.
Stockwell said Christmas trees and other decorations are the cause of many eye injuries.
“We do see a lot of that, especially with children,” he said.
Often, children scratch tree branches against their eyes. As a result, the eyes may seem red or irritated. Parents’ whose children’s eyes are scratched by real evergreen trees should pay extra close attention. It’s possible the trees could spread a fungal infection to the children.
“You certainly need a doctor’s care for that,” Stockwell said.
Doctors also see an increase in infections throughout the winter months, especially among children. As the weather grows colder and kids spend more time inside, infections like conjunctivitis, commonly known as pink eye, are more likely to spread.
There are two kinds of conjunctivitis: viral and bacterial. Viral conjunctivitis produces a water discharge and may last up to three weeks. Bacterial conjunctivitis produces a heavier mucus can be cured in 24 hours. Both are highly contagious.
“Washing your hands frequently is the best way for kids to not spread these things,” Stockwell said.
To comment on this story:

description.hltext_display: Tiha noć - poruka mira iz Salzburga
description.content:
Kada je svećenik Joseph Mohr napisao tekst za Tihu noć 1816., a učitelj Franz Xaver Gruber ju uglazbio dvije godine kasnije, nitko nije mogao zamisliti da će upravo ona postati najpoznatija božićna pjesma na svijetu koja se danas pjeva na 350 jezika i dijalekata.
U vremenu teškog siromaštva i političke nestabilnosti poslije Napoleonskih ratova, Mohr i Gruber željeli su ponovno donijeti nadu ljudima u svom kraju. Jednostavan božićni napjev uz gitarsku pratnju nastao je za lokalnu crkvu koju su uglavnom posjećivali mornari.
Dokumentarna emisija u produkciji ORF-a prati razvoj pjesme i istražuje njezine korijene u širem povijesnom kontekstu. Izvorni dokumenti i intervjui sa stručnjacima rasvjetljuju pravo podrijetlo Tihe noći, mimo mnogih legendi koje je prate.

description.hltext_display: Cabot Oil & Gas completes Pennsylvania Midstream sale
description.content:
Cabot Oil & Gas Corporation reports the completion of its midstream asset sale to Williams Field Services Company, LLC (WFS), a subsidiary of Williams Partners L.P. Cabot received the anticipated $150 million in proceeds.
"This closing is just the first step in our long-term venture with Williams Partners to develop our outstanding Marcellus acreage position and provide decades of clean-burning natural gas supplies to power our nation," said Dan O. Dinges, Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer. "I commend both teams for initiating this win-win deal."
Tags: Cabot Oil & Gas Corporation

description.hltext_display: Cada vasco juega 81,65 euros en el tradicional sorteo navideño
description.content:
Foto: EP BI
BILBAO, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) -
Cada ciudadano vasco juega 81,65 euros en el sorteo de Navidad que se celebrará este miércoles, el más tradicional del año, superando la media nacional que se sitúa en 68,68 euros por ciudadano, según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado.
Los habitantes de La Rioja son los que más juegan en este sorteo, una media de 101,24 euros. Después figuran los castellanoleoneses, con 97,74; los asturianos, con 91,73 euros; los aragoneses, con 85,78 euros; los madrileños, con 82,58 euros, y los vascos, con 81,65. Los valencianos, en séptimo lugar, con una media de 65,48 euros.
Por detrás se encuentran los habitantes de Cantabria, con una media de 72,46 euros; los de Castilla-La Mancha, que se gastan 72,34 euros, y los habitantes de Murcia, con 71,05 euros.
Calaluña aparece en undécimo puesto, con una consignación por habitante de 67,23 euros; Galicia, con 66,75 euros; Navarra, con un gasto de 56,55 euros por habitante; Extremadura, con 55,08 euros; Andalucía; con 47,35 euros; Canarias, con 41,70 euros y Baleares, con 39,76 euros. En , el gasto medio por habitante en este sorteo, es de 16,50 y 17,38 euros, respectivamente.
El Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad se celebra por el sistema tradicional de sorteo, con un bombo para números y otro para premios, y tiene una duración aproximada de tres horas y media. Este año, consta de 195 series, cada una de las cuales tiene 85.000 billetes, con un precio cada uno de 200 euros, dividido en décimos de 20 euros. El precio de un número completo es de 39.000 euros.
El total de la emisión de este año es de 3.315.000.000 euros. El montante que se destina a premios --el 70 por ciento de la emisión, dado que el 30 por ciento restante es para gastos de gestión, administración y Tesoro Público-- alcanza los 2.320.500.000 euros. Cada serie distribuye en premios 11.900.000 euros. En conjunto se reparten 26.001.300 premios. En el bombo entran los 85.000 números de los billetes del sorteo.

description.hltext_display: 择时选股,探索主动管理型ETF
description.content:
一直以来,ETFs都是被动投资的代表,目前现行的被动投资型ETFs资产透明度高,有利于套利机制充分发挥作用,使得二级市场交易价格接近资产净值,而主动管理的投资组合透明度不够,会造成二级市场交易价格偏离资产净值的溢价或折价幅度增加,违背ETFs产品的基本特征,所以中外专家的主流观点是主动管理型的ETFs不具备可行性。然而,笔者认为,通过更加巧妙的设计和充分利用现代计算机交易系统的优势,可以设计出完全保留ETFs原有全部特征的主动管理型ETFs,并且目前上海证券交易所的系统不用做任何改造就能支持这种巧妙的设计。
择时选股型ETFs设计概要
本文提出的择时选股型ETFs的构思初衷源于中国(内地)市场上指数化投资理念的不足,希望在大盘遭遇类似今年4月份以来20%以上的跌幅时,ETFs可与其他主动管理型基金一样通过调整仓位,避免ETFs净值与大盘同步损失。
1、 如何选股
择时选股50ETF选择上证50指数的成份股和其他一些精选的备用股票作为股票池,基金公司根据上市公司访谈以及相关经济形势分析,剔除投资前景黯淡的成份股(基金公司具有很大把握认为其投资前景欠佳),按照事先经过优化配置规定的固定权重投资其余股票(基金公司具有很大把握认为其投资前景较好,和投资前景不明朗的股票)。
择时选股型ETFs资产组合的调整周期最短是半年,因为基金经理选股本身是针对中长线投资而进行的选择,而非短期投机。通过这种比较保守的选股策略,择时选股ETF的期望投资收益率应能通过选股行为高于传统的被动管理型ETFs,还可以减少成份股出现异常情况给基金带来的风险。
2、 如何择时
当基金经理判断后市走强时,择时选股50ETF要求一级市场参与者采用实物申购、现金赎回调高仓位；当基金经理判断后市走弱时,择时选股50ETF要求一级市场参与者采用现金申购、实物赎回降低仓位；当基金经理认为后市走势不明,无需调整仓位时,则同时开放按基金存量的现金含量的蓝子资产进行含规定现金的实物申购和实物赎回。在市场出现极端情况,如基金经理对后市持续看强,一级市场参与者的实物申购和现金赎回导致股票满仓后,关闭现金赎回代之以实物赎回；同样,如基金经理对后市持续看空,一级市场参与者的现金申购和实物赎回导致股票空仓后,关闭实物赎回代之以现金赎回。
这样,择时选股ETFs利用一级市场的申购和赎回自动进行股票仓位调整,不会因为基金买卖股票而增加交易费用和资产不确定性。熊市来临时,基金尽量持有现金,减少了市场大跌对ETFs净值的影响。牛市阶段,基金尽量持有股票,分享市场上涨对ETFs净值的贡献。
3、 如何保障资产透明
利用证券交易所现有设施,只需在ETFs实时行情中增加仓位比例和等价现金替换值EC(Equivalent Cash)两个字段,不用增加其他设施和技术改造,即可实时完成ETFs资产信息披露,弥补常规主动管理型基金资产不透明的缺陷。即:交易所的计算机系统根据含现金的申购和赎回的发生情况,实时计算每一个瞬间ETF资产中的现金含量,并以仓位比例和现金替换值EC两个时间序列连续发布的方式,通过实时行情发布系统实时公布ETF资产的动态仓位,由于ETF资产中的非现金部分各种证券间的相对投资比例固定,则ETF资产就可以保持在每一个瞬间都完全透明,并且实现这一目的不需要对交易所的计算机系统进行任何改造,只要增加一个行情代码或在ETF二级市场行情代码下启用两个冗余字段就可以实现。
4、 如何对冗余现金进行管理
本文从国债回购的角度考虑现金管理。基金公司可利用频繁的短期回购,在保证资产流动性和安全性的角度上尽可能提高基金业绩,举例来说,基金公司可将大部分冗余现金从事七天国债交易所回购。
在投资收益的确认上,可以适当偏向长期投资者,即对于申购,可要求其根据将要实现的收益支付现金；对于赎回,可要求其根据已实现的收益取得现金。
在再投资现金比例上,可借鉴风险管理中VaR的概念,保留一段时间内最大赎回量所对应的现金量,剩余现金用于再投资。如出现极端情况导致缺少足额的现金用于申购和赎回,可考虑全部用实物申购或赎回,也可以暂时关闭一级市场的操作,保证ETFs资产管理按原定方式继续进行。
冗余现金的再投资产生的无风险收益可以弥补基金管理费用和用于基金分红,从而在机制上保证即使提取基金管理费用的比例较高也不会影响ETF资产的透明绩效。
择时选股ETFs的优势与不足
与传统的被动投资ETFs产品相比,择时选股ETFs至少在以下三个方面具有显著优势：
1、 在新兴市场中发挥基金经理的择时选股能力,提高业绩,规避熊市下跌风险。
2、 吸引保险资金、社保资金等参与ETFs市场。
3、 ETFs一级市场不再是单纯的指令发送,而成为真正的交易市场。
当然择时选股ETFs能否成功还取决于以下几个因素：
1、 投资者是否愿意接受这种主动管理型ETFs。
2、 基金经理是否可以有效地主动管理。
总得说来,择时选股ETFs的缺陷有限,而且这种缺陷主要存在于投资者的保守心理,如果做好市场启蒙,并在操作层面上周密安排,打消投资者对主动管理的顾虑是可行的。毕竟主动管理型ETFs在提升业绩、回避熊市风险方面具有显著优势,尤其适用于市场效率不高的新兴市场。
如果主动管理型的ETFs能在中国这片充满活力的古老大地上被创造性的推出并大规模发展,则对传统的开放式基金将是一次全面的挑战。届时不仅整个基金行业会发生翻天覆地的变化,而且中国人对国际资产管理行业革命性创新的伟大贡献也会在金融史上留下浓墨重彩的一笔。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 基金“奥运”之平衡之术选基金
下一篇文章： 基金“奥运”之选基金要选“冠军队”

description.hltext_display: 廖碧儿冷笑贺旧爱抢手 陈豪自称“满足不了她”
description.content:
廖碧儿"甩掉"陈豪搭上"富二代"林忠豪的新闻，成为香港娱乐圈最近的热门话题，有周刊更以封面大字标题指廖碧儿是"贪钱精"。昨天香港某周刊曝光了林忠豪的身家背景，也用"骗情6年"来形容廖碧儿，并引用陈豪的话称，分手原因是因为"满足不了她"。而另一边，廖碧儿前天出席新剧《依家有喜》的宣传活动时，对于分手后陈豪成了"TVB剩女"的抢手货，则冷笑表示祝贺。
林忠豪被指虚有其表
据周刊报道，被廖碧儿视为"金龟婿"的林忠豪，现年32岁，其父是中渝置业控股有限公司副主席兼著名外科医生林孝文，母亲则是中南钟表家族成员庄月华，他的表哥是李泽楷，背景似大有来头。但该周刊翻查资料，发现其驾照登记的地址，即廖碧儿经常出入的浅水湾十二号独立屋，原来并非其名下物业，他只是暂借某富商的房屋居住而已。事实上，林忠豪手上没有物业，只有几辆私家车，而他接载廖碧儿的林宝坚尼，也是2003年的旧款。不过，据说因为林忠豪平时出入很风光，让廖碧儿误以为他身家丰厚，所以没摸清底细就上钩。连月来，廖碧儿放假或收工后就会随时陪伴林忠豪左右，还拿到了浅水湾独立屋的钥匙，成功进驻豪宅当"女主人"。上周五，她被拍到跟林忠豪牵手出入屋苑，还风骚地说："我们是朋友，但将来的事谁也不知道。"对于旧爱陈豪，她则划清界限，由以前的"好朋友"降格为"同事"。
陈豪自称"满足不了她"
据说，陈豪六年来对廖碧儿一心一意，鲜有传出绯闻。对于廖碧儿另结新欢，消瘦了十磅的陈豪无奈地说："我也是看报纸才知道。"问他觉得自己输在哪里，他说："可能我给不了她想要的东西，做得不够好，满足不了她。"问他是不是因为不如新欢有钱，他也没有否认，只是表示："我不知道怎么回答这个问题。"至于廖碧儿说他只是"同事"，陈豪则表示异议："我不会这么说，她是我的同事，也是我的女朋友。"至于会否祝福她的新恋情，陈豪也保留地说："唔……不知道怎么回答。"
不过，陈豪断言不会再吃回头草，对廖碧儿已经心淡："都过去了，发生了这么多事情，现在发现工作最重要，事业最实际。"
廖碧儿冷笑恭贺旧爱
前天，廖碧儿出席新剧《依家有喜》的活动后，接受了记者采访。对于被指是"贪钱精"，她坦言已看过报道："入行至今九年，我一直努力做好本分，积极存钱。我和家人的生活都是自己一手一脚营造的，我的朋友和支持我的观众会知道我是什么人。"问她如何挽救形象，廖碧儿说："我一向尊重自己，不论工作或做人，你怎么对人，人家就会怎么对你，我知道是谁造的谣，谁说的心里有数，大家也心里有数。"问她是否指陈豪，她却没有正面回答，只称时间久了大家就会知道。
六年情结束，陈豪现在成了电视台小妹妹们的"抢手货"，对此，廖碧儿冷笑道："那恭喜他啦！不过，好多报道都不是事实。"（阿文）

description.hltext_display: 3. Lady Rams make use of Baudoin's newfound height
description.content:
Rebounding has taken on a different meaning for Taylor Baudoin this season.
The Immanuel Christian freshman used to think rebounding was "cool." After all, it isn't too often a 5-foot-4 or a 5-5 player has success in the paint corralling misses against taller players.
But thanks to a growth spurt Baudoin no longer has to worry about daring to mix it up with the other post players. Now at 5-10, Baudoin is making the most of her new-found height, and the Immanuel Christian girls basketball team is reaping the dividends.
Baudoin is averaging a team-best 16 points and 13 rebounds per game for the Lady Rams (8-9). Despite a nagging ankle injury she suffered in soccer season and a bone bruise to her knee, Baudoin has emerged as a valuable leader.
For her accomplishments this season, Baudoin is The Dispatch's Prep Player of the Week.
"She is a quiet leader," said Jenny Hutcherson, who is in her third season as coach of the Immanuel Christian girls basketball team. "She is one not to be out front. She doesn't really want the spotlight on her, but our team draws strength from her just being out on the court. If we need a basket, we're looking for Taylor to score or to be the one to make the screen to get somebody open. She truly is the go-to girl."
Baudoin has played forward and center in the first part of the season for the Lady Rams (8-9). She also handles the bulk of the team's ballhandling. To top it off, Baudoin's ability to clean the glass allows Immanuel Christian to get out and run and push tempo.
"I know I get a lot of rebounds, and getting rebounds helps because I can bring it down the court and we can go from there," Baudoin said. " I think (rebounding) is cool, but it has kind of come easier for me now. It's not as cool as I used to think it was, but it still is an important part of the game."
Hutcherson said Baudoin's rebounding ability also is key because it sets the example for the rest of the team and motivates the other players to rebound. She said Baudoin's willingness to do the "blue-collar work" in the paint fits her personality. She said Baudoin is an unselfish player who likes to set up her teammates to score and loves to make great-looking plays.
Sometimes, though, Hutcherson admits Baudoin's youth gets the best of her and she will make a mistake, but she owns up to it quickly. "She will turn around and tell me she shouldn't have done that (when she makes a mistake)," Hutcherson said. "But she is trying. She wants to learn. She is very coachable."
Baudoin joined the varsity basketball team last season just in time for the postseason. Baudoin played so well she was named to the all-district tournament team and to the All-North State tournament team. In all, she played in only seven varsity games.
"She has just grown up in the gym," Hutcherson said when asked to explain how Baudoin was able to make such a smooth transition.
Baudoin started to play basketball in kindergarten. She said she "kind of taught" herself to play the game. The sport is part of an active lifestyle that also includes roles on the school's soccer, softball, and track and field teams. Just like in those sports, Baudoin is willing to do whatever is needed to help the team succeed. She also is hesitant to accept a lot of the accolades that come with being a player who averages a double-double every game.
"I wouldn't be able to do all of that stuff without my team around me," Baudoin said. "Without them I would be nothing."
Baudoin said she and the team, which lost Saturday to Oak Hill Academy, has gone through its ups and downs. She said she has done "OK" and that she has plenty she needs to improve on, especially her outside shooting, her passing, and her ballhandling.
Baudoin doesn't hesitate to say rebounding is the strongest part of her game. She said improved elevation has combined with her growth spurt to help her be a controlling force in the middle.
Hutcherson said Baudoin has plenty of room to mature physically and mentally. She is anxious to see how Baudoin continues to develop into a leader and as a rebounder.
"I know she is one of the best players in our district as a freshman," Hutcherson said. "Moving up to a new district (and from Mississippi Association of Independent Schools Class A to Class AA next school year) will only help her playing against bigger and better talent. I think she will rise to the challenge and college coaches will be asking about her and calling her."
