description.hltext_display: UN Restores Sexual Orientation Reference To Violence Measure, After U.S. Push
description.author: Nikola Krastev
description.content: The United States has successfully persuaded the United Nations to include "sexual orientation" as a category of vulnerable populations whose targeted killings the world body condemns.The resolution was adopted by the 192-member General Assembly on a vote of 93 for and 55 against, with 27 nations abstaining.Controversy broke out after African and Arab states successfully stripped the resolution of a reference to killings for reasons of "sexual orientation," which was included along with killings for racial, national, ethnic, religious, or linguistic reasons, and killings of refugees, indigenous people, and other groups.U.S. Ambassador Susan Rice said she was "incensed" at the move and vowed to restore the original language in a U.S.-sponsored amendment. In a statement issued after the December 21 vote, she said, "The United Nations General Assembly has sent a clear and resounding message that justice and human rights apply to all individuals regardless of their sexual orientation."A spokesman for President Barack Obama said the U.S. leader "applauds those countries that supported the amendment." The statement continued, "Protecting gays and lesbians from state-sponsored discrimination is not a special right, it is a human right."The United States was able to persuade several UN member states who were undecided on the issue to vote for the amendment, including Albania, Rwanda, and South Africa.'Huge Victory'The effort was lauded by gay and lesbian communities in the United States. Human Rights Watch had appealed to UN members to include the category in its list of vulnerable populations that are targeted for extrajudicial killings."We think it is a huge victory, and we are very, very grateful to the countries who have supported us," said Boris Dittrich, the acting director of Human Rights Watch's Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender Program. "With the statement of South Africa and the voting in favor of the amendment, we really think there has been created a momentum for LGBT [lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender] rights as human rights."He said hate crimes that are perpetrated on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity must be opposed as strongly as hate crimes on the basis of race or religion.Speaking at a UN Human Rights Day event on December 10, Rice said the United States considers the protection of people whose sexual orientation makes them vulnerable inseparable from the broader defense of human rights."Around the world, laws that criminalize gay relationships don't just violate human rights," Rice said. "They hinder social cohesion, economic development, and public health. They reduce trust and cooperation among nations."A heated exchange of statements and opinions in the General Assembly chamber delayed the voting for more than two hours. African and Asian states -- among them Afghanistan, Iran, Iraq, and Pakistan -- resisted the inclusion of the "sexual orientation" reference, arguing that it is a personal matter and as such has no place among human rights issues.Homosexuality is a crime in many African and Arab nations.'We Cannot Be Silent'The U.S. and EU position on the issue is in line with that of UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon, who has established himself as a firm advocate of the rights of gay, lesbian, and transgender people. Speaking at the UN Human Rights Day event, Ban said wherever there is tension between cultural attitudes and universal human rights, rights must carry the day. Personal disapproval, or societal disapproval, he said, is no excuse to arrest, detain, imprison, harass, or torture anyone."As men and women of conscience, we reject discrimination in general, and in particular discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity," he said. "When individuals are attacked, abused, or imprisoned because of their sexual orientation, we must speak out. We cannot stand by. We cannot be silent."Although the UN resolution is not binding, it sends a powerful message across the world and symbolically offers protection to people with different sexual orientations even in places where it is outlawed.

description.hltext_display: The top 10 reasons to start drinking alkaline water to become healthier
description.content:
The importance of consuming enough water is not widely recognized. Rather than reaching for a nice cup of alkaline water, or any type of water for that matter, we will instead reach for a cup of coffee, tea, soda, or even an energy drink. Instead of putting a healthy alkaline beverage such as clean water, a lot of us will put acidic beverages in our daily lifestyle. Below are some of the top 10 reasons and benefits of why you should start drinking more alkaline ionized water!
Firstly, alkaline water can help you look younger! - Drinking adequate amounts of alkaline water nourishes your tissue. Not only are you getting the huge benefits of normal water hydration like enhanced skin tone and increased skin moisturizing and you have the additional benefit of enhanced hydration because of the fact of ionized water having small sized water clusters in it.
Second of all, alkaline water can really help digestive function - Sipping water during dining will help your entire body absorb and metabolize food far better. Everything starts in the mouth. Water will help create extra saliva and helps take the food all the way through the digestive tract. It really works in conjunction with dietary fibre to help in eliminating wastes within your body and additionally amplifies your metabolism.
Thirdly, Alkaline Water can help boost concentration - Your brain is made up of 90% water, by restricting water intake your brain will become more dehydrated. Therefore most of us who don't drink sufficient amounts of alkaline ionized water are generally restricting our brains of just what it needs the most, water. Simply by consuming more water you improve your capacity to concentrate, process info, and performance. Who do you know that wouldn't want to use more of those?
Fourth, help with headaches - One of the key aids to severe headaches is dehydration. This really is one of the areas where ionized water shines. Ionized water significantly improves the hydration of the body as a result of its smaller water clustering. Since alkaline water can have an amazing ability to hydrate the brain, it will help prevent headaches which are mostly caused by brain dehydration.
Fifth of all, alkaline water can help manage weight - Drinking water, especially alkaline water, is good for weight loss for a couple of reasons. Water is an amazing appetite suppressant. This is because after drinking water it eliminates the craving for foods that are unhealthy. Moreover water will help enhance your metabolic process which assists in burning calories, and it will help flush out acidic waste that is stored in the body fat. Consuming sugar-filled beverages will not help with weight management like clean alkaline water.
Number Six, Alkaline water will help slow down aging - This factor, number six, is one of the most crucial and outstanding effects of alkaline ionized water. Since it is one of the, if not the most potent source of anti-oxidants on the planet the ability for it to prevent the damaging process in our body is phenomenal. It does this by cancelling out toxins which harms our healthy organs.
Seventh, Improve overall vitality! - Water in the body is actually vital for far better circulation. Oxygen in your blood stream is multiplied whenever your body has been adequately hydrated, especially with oxygen-rich alkaline water. This then results in much more oxygen available to burn off fat which is the necessary ingredient in energy production. The more alkaline water is the more oxygen it can provide to the body. Eighth benefit, greater immunity to sickness – As our body becomes less and less hydrated, the cells begin to become full of toxin build up which cause disease to thrive. By replenishing and renewing the water in the cells, it will prevent this toxic build up caused by dehydration. When your body, and the cells, are more hydrated then your immunity will be less susceptible to unwanted sickness! Ninth, detoxify with alkaline water - Remaining well hydrated assists the body in eliminating dangerous toxins. Among one of the most important filters in our bodies is our kidneys. The kidneys are dependent on water for them to be able to work at peak efficiency. Not only that, as every other cell in our body lacks hydration, they are a lot less efficient in detoxifying. Last but not least, alkaline water can help prevent heart disease! – Research of all kinds have shown that people who drink a good amount of water are less susceptible to heart disease. It was found in 1935 by Otto Heinrich Warburg that disease of any kind can't live in an alkaline body. Alkaline water has been shown to help alkalize the body very efficiently! There are so many benefits to drinking the right kind of water, and eliminating the habit of not drinking enough of it. Alkaline water is the main key factor to preventing disease and sickness, because when you think of it... our bodies are made of an average of 70% water!

description.hltext_display: 北京执法监察巡查共发现各类违法违规用地396件
description.content:
中广网北京12月22日消息 据经济之声《财经早报》报道，2009年10月1日到2010年10月31日，北京市通过开展国土资源执法监察巡查共发现各类违法违规用地396件。
据介绍，查出的违法违规用地占地面积5371亩，其中耕地面积2366亩，基本农田面积899亩；发现矿产违法违规行为221件。
北京市国土资源局相关负责人说，对巡查发现的396件违法违规用地行为立案查处率达到60%以上，非立案查处达到20%。对巡查发现的221件矿产违法违规行为均已处罚完毕。

description.hltext_display: Leo Van Sande blikt terug op de VdeV Challenge Européen Endurance Proto 2010
description.content:
Terugblik op de VdeV Challenge Europen Endurance Proto 2010 : Leo Van Sande vice-kampioen
Na een overwinning in Dijon en 2 tweede plaatsen in Magny-Cours en Estoril in de laatste drie races van het seizoen, werd Leo Van Sande samen met de Fransman Grgory Fargier 2de algemeen in de VdeV Challenge Europen Endurance Proto. Ondanks opgaves door technische problemen, waardoor in het seizoensbegin twee overwinningen en een 2de plaats tijdens de laatste wedstrijdminuten in rook opgingen, kon alsnog een schitterend resultaat behaald worden in een kampioenschap dat steeds meer aan belang wint. Een startveld van een 30-tal gelijkwaardige wagens met de deelname van gewezen F1 piloten Philippe Alliot en Alex Caffi, gerenomeerde piloten zoals Fred Mackowiecki, Emanuel Collard, Jonathan Cochet,… garanderen een zeer competitief kampioenschap op schitterende circuits zoals Mugello, Dijon, Estoril, Motorland Aragon, Paul Ricard,…
Volgend seizoen wordt dit kampioenschap nog een stuk competitiever met de introductie van carbonchassis en schitterende omlopen zoals Mugello, Le Mans en de reeds eerder genoemde circuits. Leo Van Sande zal opnieuw samen met Frgory Fargier een nieuwe NormaM20FC bemannen en met het Team Palmyr aan dit kampioenschap deelnemen. Na de uitstekende resultaten van het voorbije seizoen ambiren ze een podiumplaats.
Meegedeeld
Foto: Claude Foubert - Endurance-info.com

description.hltext_display: ÖNCE DOMUZU SONRA KENDİNİ
Humiliated Cable stripped of powers
description.content:
Vince Cable is clinging on to his position in the Government after being humiliatingly rebuked by the Prime Minister for claiming to have "declared war" on Rupert Murdoch's News Corp empire.
David Cameron allowed Mr Cable to keep his post as Business Secretary but made no attempt to hide his displeasure, stripping the Liberal Democrat minister of responsibility for media regulation and branding his comments - caught on tape by undercover reporters - as "totally unacceptable and inappropriate".
Meanwhile, the Daily Telegraph has revealed that a string of Lib Dem ministers had voiced unease about coalition policies in comments recorded by reporters posing as constituents.
Scottish Secretary Michael Moore reportedly branded the hike in university tuition fees "a car crash, a train wreck", while business minister Ed Davey said he was "gobsmacked" by the decision to strip child benefit from higher-rate taxpayers, and pensions minister Steve Webb acknowledged Lib Dems were being damaged by appearing "too cosy" with Tories.
Labour leader Ed Miliband called for Mr Cable's dismissal, accusing him of breaching the ministerial code requirement for members of the Government to show objectivity in their decisions.
"Vince Cable should have gone. Having apparently breached the ministerial code and having said what he said, he shouldn't be remaining in office," said Mr Miliband.
Conservative ministers were reported to be complaining privately that they would be sacked for making a similar gaffe.
The Prime Minister ruled that Mr Cable would play no further role in News Corp's bid to take a majority stake in the broadcaster BSkyB, while his responsibilities for media policy and competition go to Culture Secretary Jeremy Hunt.
A contrite Mr Cable said in a statement that he fully accepted the decision by Mr Cameron and Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg. "I deeply regret the comments I made and apologise for the embarrassment that I have caused the Government," he said.
Mr Cable appears to have survived largely because Mr Clegg could not afford to lose another senior Liberal Democrat minister from the coalition so soon after David Laws was forced to resign over his expenses. But he is likely to emerge from the controversy as a seriously diminished figure, with Labour branding him a "lame duck" minister who has lost all credibility.

description.hltext_display: Messenger is closing for Christmas
description.author: Greg Barila
description.content:
THIS week?s December 22 edition of the Messenger group of titles will be the last for 2010
The first edition of 2011 will be published on Wednesday, January 12.
Our suburban offices at Morphett Vale, Norwood, Kidman Park and Salisbury will reopen on Tuesday, January 4. Messenger?s city headquarters will reopen on Monday, January 10.
MESSENGER WEBSITES Messenger?s online team will be on leave from Wednesday, December 22, returning Tuesday, January 4.
During this period, please be advised moderation of reader submitted photos, story ideas, Your News submissions, comments on stories, competition entries, events, advertising and editorial inquiries and website membership will NOT be dealt with until staff return on January 4. We apologise for any inconvenience and thank you for your patience and continued support.
Please keep your comments, photos and news tips coming and we?ll publish them as soon as we?re back. Promise! You can contact our staff via the Messenger homepage.

description.hltext_display: WikiLeaks: ONU defende direito a divulgar informações de interesse público
description.content:
Os relatores da ONU e da também apelaram à responsabilidade dos jornalistas Fareed Khan/AP Os relatores das Nações Unidas e da (CIDH) para a liberdade de expressão defenderam hoje o direito a difundir informações confidenciais consideradas de "interesse público" mas também apelaram à "responsabilidade jornalística", referindo-se ao caso WikiLeaks.
Num comunicado conjunto hoje emitido, Catalina Botero, relatora da CIDH, e Frank LaRue, relator da ONU, recordaram que os jornalistas e outros membros da sociedade civil "não devem ser submetidos a sanções por violação do , a menos que tenham cometido uma fraude ou outro delito para obter" informações.
Os dois responsáveis afirmaram também que os denunciantes que, "sendo funcionários governamentais", tenham revelado informações, "devem estar protegidos de sanções legais, administrativas ou laborais sempre que tenham atuado de boa fé" na divulgação de informação de interesse público.

De redactie kan bijdragen zonder opgaaf van reden weigeren. Daarbij hanteren wij onder meer de volgende voorwaarden:
De reactie moet kort en bondig (max. 400 tekens) zijn.
De reactie mag niet beledigen, discrimineren of nodeloos kwetsen.
De reactie mag geen scheldwoorden of bedreigingen bevatten.
De reactie moet betrekking hebben op het artikel waaronder de reactie wordt geplaatst.
De reactie mag geen reclame-uiting bevatten.
De reactie mag geen privé-gegevens van derden bevatten.
De reactie mag geen links naar illegale zaken bevatten (software, muziek, etc.).
De reactie mag geen inbreuk zijn op het auteursrecht van anderen.
Reacties onder overduidelijk valse naam kunnen worden geweigerd.
De reactie moet begrijpelijk en leesbaar zijn.
De redactie houdt zich aanbevolen voor tips, maar zal niet tot plaatsing overgaan van:
Reacties die (impliciete) beschuldigingen of verdachtmakingen van misdrijven bevatten, zolang er (nog) geen gerechtelijke
uitspraak is.
Reacties die de identiteit van verdachten onthullen. Evenmin van slachtoffers, zolang de redactie geen bevestiging van de
politie heeft (en wij mogen aannemen dat de familie is ingelicht)
Over het al dan niet plaatsen van reacties wordt niet gecorrespondeerd.
Het IP-adres van de afzender van een reactie wordt automatisch opgeslagen in het redactioneel systeem. Het kan worden
afgestaan aan derden in het kader van een strafrechtelijk (voor)onderzoek, namelijk als de redactie van mening is dat een
groot maatschappelijk belang in het geding is. Ook daarover wordt niet gecorrespondeerd.

description.hltext_display: VT4 verwerft uitzendrechten F1
description.content: Het wordt nagelbijten voor de VRT-sportcollegas volgend F1-seizoen. Dat de nationale omroep volgend jaar niet langer de F1 GPs zou uitzenden was al langer bekend. Maar dat VT4 de Vlaamse uitzendrechten bekomt uitgerekend nu Belg Jrme dAmbrosio zijn opwachting maakt in het selecte F1-kringetje moet beslist geen pretje zijn. De Vlaamse F1-fans van hun kant kunnen er maar wel bij varen.

description.hltext_display: Harrison, Davis win Australian Open wild cards
description.content: Rising American prospects Ryan Harrison and Laura Davis each won a spot in next month's Australian Open at a wild card playoff tournament in the United States. Harrison fought through qualifying to reach the main draw at this year's U.S. Open, beating Ivan Ljubicic before falling in the second round. Davis is unbeaten in 27 straight matches and recently won two ITF Futures events, the Junior Orange Bowl and the Eddie Herr Junior Championships. The French Tennis Federation said veteran Virginie Razzano and 21-year-old Benoit Paire would receive its reciprocal wild cards to Melbourne. Razzano reached a career-high ranking of 16 in 2009 but has dropped to 114 this year due to injury. Paire is ranked No. 152 and will make his Australian Open debut.

description.hltext_display: Stevige winterkost: schransen op de Hel
description.content:
Aan diepgravend onderzoek voor zijn nieuwe boek Peen & ui kwam Herman den Blijker niet toe.
De recepten voor oervaderlandse winterkost schudt de Rotterdamse chef-kok waarschijnlijk zo uit zijn hagelwitte mouw. Maar voor zijn zoektocht naar het hoe en waarom wij Nederlanders zo dol zijn op gestampte pot heeft hij zo zijn mannetjes. "Ik ben niet geschikt voor bibliotheken, je mag er geen sigaren roken."
Co-auteur Jaap van Rijn verrichtte het veldwerk en maakte fraaie foto's voor het kookboek over de rijke wereld van peen, ui én piepers. Want dat zijn, in de ogen van de meester, de Grote Drie van de Nederlandse keuken, de ruggengraat van menig gerecht. Den Blijker weet er maar liefst zestig varianten van te bereiden.
Een boek vol wijsheden: geen mooier troostvoedsel voor de kleumende mens, die thuis komt dan hutspot. Thuis! Pan op tafel, tijd om aan te vallen. De boekbespreking zou deze pagina's nooit gehaald hebben als de schrijvers voor een onvervalste schranspartij niet waren neergestreken op Fort de Hel. Van peen en spek in het Middeleeuwse Zierikzee via uitgehongerde Leidenaren tijdens het beleg in 1574, waarop Herman de lezers een speciale Spaanse hutspot met kikkererwten voorschotelt, verplaatst de winterkost zich naar de stoofpotten in de Ruigenhil ten tijde van de Franse bezetting. Het is 10 december 1813, vier Franse soldaten zijn achtergebleven in Fort de Hel. Vocht en kou zijn diep in de dikke muren getrokken. De kleine, vierkante ruimte rond de brede schoorsteenmantel is nauwelijks warm te krijgen. De roodharige kok Jean Hutsebaut - bijnaam peenkop - zit al dagen door de voorraad proviand heen. De sergeant is om foerage in Willemstad, maar keert maar niet terug. Een paar uien, boter en gedroogd vlees, daar moet Jean, die nota bene nog aan het hof van Napoleon gekookt heeft, het op dit armzalige fort mee doen. Op strooptocht dan maar, langs de Bataven aan de Helsedijk. Een boer ziet de Fransen aankomen en zegt tegen zijn zonen: 'laten we snel wat klaarzetten, anders halen ze de boel weer overhoop. En zeg tegen de vrouwen dat ze 'm smeren, ik heb geen zin in Franse kleinkinderen.'
De buit is naar behoren: haas, fazant, duif, knolgroenten en bier. Jean stookt een flink vuur en gaat volgens de Bataafse methode te werk. Dat is: alles in een pan flikkeren, de boel tot gort koken en dan in elkaar stampen. Barbaarser kan het niet volgens de Fransen, maar als ze hun neuzen boven de pot hangen, ruikt het wel voortreffelijk. Dat wordt schransen in Fort de Hel, precies ook de titel van dit verzonnen oorlogsrelaas. De aardappel komt er op de kleigronden rond Willemstad anno 1813 kennelijk nog niet aan te pas, hoewel Den Blijker even verderop in het boek gewag maakt over 250 jaar 'piepers jassen'. Fort de Hel smaakte kennelijk naar meer, want als de culinaire tijdbalk voortschrijdt en de mobilisatie zich aandient, is er nog een gedicht aan het fort gewijd: Gemobiliseerde soldaten aten
hutspot met klapstuk.
In Fort de Hel, gewijde culinaire grond.
Wisten zij veel.
De mannen hadden wel iets anders aan hun hoofd.

description.hltext_display: Футбол - Чемпионат России - Испанские СМИ: Муньос возглавил «Терек»
description.content:
Футбол� -� Чемпионат � оссии22/12/2010� -� 11:12� -� Обновлено� 22/12/2010� -� 11:22ImagoЧитайте также� :По сведениям испанской газеты AS, Виктор Муньос возглавил грозненский «». На какой срок и на каких условиях подписано соглашение, не уточняется. На официальном сайте «а» никакой информации о назначении Муньоса нет.
В прошлом сезоне главным грозненцев был Анатолий Байдачный. По окончании чемпионата � оссии спортивные СМИ писали, что Байдачный может быть отправлен в отставку, а кандидатами на пост нового наставника грозненской команды назывались Станислав Черчесов, заключивший соглашение с «Жемчужиной-Сочи» и тренер «Амкара» � ашид � ахимов. 7 декабря газета «Советский спорт» сообщал, что Байдачный подписал новый контракт до конца 2011 года. Однако на официальном сайте «а» новостей о продлении контракта не было. В то же время главным тренером в настоящее время значится Байдачный.
Представители грозненской команды предпочли воздержаться от ответа на просьбу корреспондента Eurosport.ru разъяснить ситуацию.
Виктор Муньос начал карьеру тренера в 1995 году. Он работал в «Мальорке», «Вильярреале», «Сарагосе» и «Хетафе». В 2004 году с «Сарагосой» выиграл Кубок и Суперкубок Испании. В сезоне-2006/07 Муньос тренировал греческий «Панатинаикос».

description.hltext_display: 'Start herbouw in 2011'
description.content:
ZEVENBERGEN - Stichting Woningbouw Zevenbergen (SWZ) start in het derde kwartaal van 2011 met het vervangen van de eerste zeven woningen in de Lage Wipstraat en Langenoordstraat.
Later vervangt SWZ nog eens 29 woningen in de twee Zevenbergse straten. Dat kan als het bestemmingsplan is gewijzigd, wat naar verwachting circa anderhalf jaar duurt. SWZ en de gemeente Moerdijk tekenden gisteren het startdocument voor de herontwikkeling van het gebied.
Volgens SWZ-directeur Henk Hendrikx hebben bijna alle bewoners van de oude woningen een nieuw onderkomen gevonden. Sommige woningen worden nog wel tijdelijk verhuurd. Vijf van de zeven woningen die als eerst worden gebouwd, vallen in de huursector. De twee andere zijn koopwoningen voor starters. Van de in totaal 36 woningen komen er naar verwachting tien beschikbaar voor startende kopers. Hendrikx: "Zo willen we de verscheidenheid een impuls geven."
De woningen worden gebouwd volgens het IQ-concept van Ballast Nedam. "Dit is voor ons ook iets nieuws", vertelt een SWZ-medewerker. Het zijn woningen waarvan het casco volgens een prefab-systeem in de fabriek wordt gemaakt. De onderdelen kunnen daarna snel worden geassembleerd op de bouwlocatie. Dit verkort de overlast van werkzaamheden.
In het gebied zijn ook tussenliggende woningen en een loods verworven. Met de bouw willen gemeente en SWZ het rommelige karakter van de straat aanpakken.

description.hltext_display: 中海基金董事长储晓明辞任 人事斗争加剧
description.content:
上海滩基金行业的人士地震仍在持续，日前中海基金管理公司公告称，同意储晓明辞去公司董事长的职务，这已经是中海基金今年第五次人事变更。
今年沪上基金可谓流年不利，据Wind数据统计显示，今年上半年基金公司公告基金经理变更共有148起，其中上海发生71起，约占全部的50％。
中海基金也是今年人事变更频繁的代表，据业内人士分析，引发中海人事地震也和股东变化有关。中海的股东中海信托实力很强，给其支持也很多，如中海基金的专户一对一业务，即受益于中海集团的规模大。但中海基金的业绩一直平平，股东方当然会有意见。因此，这次人事变动多数不是主动离职，而是来自股东方的压力。
2006年7月，股市近乎最低迷时，中海信托抄底在亏损泥潭中挣扎的国联基金，取得46.9％的股份成为第一大股东，国联基金随即更名中海基金。
中海信托33岁的副总康伟走马上任，成为当时最年轻的基金公司总经理，中海信托总经理储晓明则兼任中海基金董事长。不过铁打的营盘流水的兵，短短4年时间，中海基金已经物是人非，除了储晓明之外，今年上半年，康伟低调离职，陈浩鸣上任；随后中海蓝筹（爱基，净值，资讯）灵活配置基金经理杨大力、中海稳健收益（爱基，净值，资讯）基金经理欧阳凯、中海能源策略（爱基，净值，资讯）基金经理施恒新先后离职，副总经理顾建国、方培池也相继挂靴。
这场“地震”目前看来依然没有结束。近日，业内又盛传中海基金专户投资部总监魏延军和分管投研的现任副总经理李延刚意欲另寻他处。
对于储晓明的出走，一位不愿意透露姓名的业内人士表示，当然业绩是个引爆点，从2004年成立以来，中海基金到现在只有8只基金，甚至不如一家公司一年发的量，而且业绩平平，8只基金中有4只也就是一半在1元净值之下。这样的成绩显然不能令人满意。不过更重要的是基金公司内部集团之间的争斗所致，落下风的一方总是要成为牺牲品，无论业绩和能力如何，最终只能卷铺盖走人。储晓明的命运似乎也在印证这个说法。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 12.22投资策略：再次冲击前期套牢区
下一篇文章： 广发基金许雪梅：明年“黑马”仍看次新股

description.hltext_display: 2010年スポーツ＝米3大プロリーグで予想外の王者相次ぐ
Diamanten huwelijk alsnog gevierd in dienst
description.content:
Pastor Bastiaansen en dominee Röben staan het diamanten paar Piet de Blaaij en Rie Jongmans bij.foto Wim van den Broek
FIJNAART - Het plotselinge overlijden van hun oudste zoon trok een streep door elke vorm van feestvreugde rondom het zestigjarig huwelijk van Piet de Blaaij (89) en Rie Jongmans (86).
Bovendien gaat het ook met de gezondheid van de echtelieden op en af. "Maar da's niets bij het verlies van je kind natuurlijk", zucht Piet. Gisteren werd de oecumenische kerstviering in de Fendertshof met dominee Röben en pastor Bastiaansen als voorgangers opgedragen aan het diamanten paar. Daar was Piet, die jarenlang kerkmeester was bij de Jacobus de Meerdereparochie in Fijnaart, iedereen heel dankbaar voor. "Zo is het ook mooi, meer hoeft niet." Na afloop trok Piet het aangeboden flesje wijn open, Rie keek blij naar het bloemstuk op haar schoot.
In het woonzorgcentrum Fendertshof woont Rie op de gesloten afdeling, Piet bezoekt haar dagelijks vanuit de Jan Punthof aanleunwoningen. Zodra zij haar man ziet beginnen haar oogjes te schitteren. Vertederd rijdt Piet haar dan rond in de rolstoel.
Piet en Rie trouwden op 28 november 1950. Geen gemengd huwelijk, hoewel er die in Fijnaart tientallen gesloten zijn. Piet: "We zijn allebei katholiek, maar ik ben oecumenisch ingesteld. Dat was als dorpskapper ook maar goed ook. Stel je voor dat ik daar onderscheid zou maken."
Heel Fijnaart heeft hij onder zijn schaar gehad. Het paar kreeg drie kinderen en zeven kleinkinderen. "Alles woont in Amsterdam of directe omgeving. Allemaal topfuncties, die hebben geen tijd meer om de ouwe kapper en z'n vrouw in de Fendert op te zoeken."
Hij snapt 't wel: "Ach meneer, zo gaat dat."

description.hltext_display: 2.320 millones de euros en premios
description.author: LUIS MIGUEL LASTRA / AGENCIAS | MADRID
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Son 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: HASAN ÇİLİNGİR'DEN SİGORT
- 陳樹菊獲選全國好人好事代表
description.content:
台東善心女菜販陳樹菊，再接獲全國好人好事運動協會通知，獲選全國好人好事代表，明天將在台北接受「八德獎」的表揚。
陳樹菊女士在民國86年捐了一百萬元給母校台東仁愛國小，作為學童急難救助獎學金；5年前再將多年來賣菜的積蓄450萬元捐給母校蓋圖書館，現在她依然每天在菜市場賣菜，希望能再賺些錢幫助更多小朋友。
陳樹菊這次是由戶籍所在的台東市「建國里」推薦，經由台東縣政府呈轉中華民國表揚好人好事運動協會，經初審、複審及決審等程序，獲選全國好人好事代表，她也是台東縣唯一的獲選受獎者。
陳樹菊長年來的行善義舉，在今年已分別獲得「亞洲富比世亞太地區四傑出善心人士」、美國時代雜誌百大全球影響力人物、並獲頒教育部頒發「一等教育文化獎章」，這是臺灣教育界最高榮耀，也是歷年來唯一只有國小學歷的得獎者。(圖片)張南雄攝

description.hltext_display: ¿Cambiará la suerte?
description.content:
Ávila espera al Sorteo de Navidad con un mensaje claro, «ya toca que toque», al ser una de las cinco provincias sin ‘Gordo’ • Ayer se repitió el arreón de última hora en las administraciones
Colas en la administración de lotería de Reyes Católicos, ayer.
David Castro
María Espeso
CAMBIARÁ este año la suerte? Es la pregunta del millón para los miles de abulenses que juegan a la Lotería de Navidad y que hoy, día del sorteo más esperado, amanecen con ese resquicio de esperanza de que este año sí. Porque ya «toca que toque». Cerca de 200 años, ni más ni menos. Ávila, un año más, vuelve a estar en el mapa de la suerte de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado como una de las cinco provincias de todo el país que aparecen en blanco (junto a Zamora, Salamanca, Tarragona y Huelva, más Ceuta y Melilla), lo que significa que tienen el desafortunado honor de ser las únicas en las que la ‘diosa fortuna’, representada en el ‘Gordo’ más querido, nunca se ha fijado en ellas.
Todo está listo ya para que los bombos -uno con los 85.000 números que se sortean y otro con los 1.787 premios que se reparten- comiencen a girar esta misma mañana, hoy, por primera vez desde el año 1963, en un nuevo escenario que se ha habilitado en el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid. En total se repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros, y entre ellos el más esperado, el ansiado ‘Gordo’, dotado con tres millones, lo que se traduce en 300.000 euros al décimo. Y si no es el primer premio, parece seguro que algo llegará a los bolsillos de los ‘jugones’ abulenses en forma de terminaciones y pedreas. A falta de los datos oficiales que se ofrecerán hoy, desde Lotería Nacional se preveía que en Ávila se gastasen unos 84 euros por habitante en el sorteo, cantidad que el año pasado al final se quedó en una media de 70.
Una buena parte de la cantidad final se desembolsó ayer, a juzgar por el «jaleo» registrado en las administraciones de lotería de la ciudad. Las colas para coger esos últimos décimos, tan codiciados por los más supersticiosos, fueron escenas habituales durante buena parte del día, con momentos de tanta afluencia que incluso a sus responsables les resultaba casi imposible atendernos.
Desde la administración del Centro Comercial El Bulevar explicaban que este año las ventas habían sido bastante «irregulares», con días de poca actividad y otros de «mogollón». Ese fue el caso de ayer, día elegido por muchos para comprar lotería, en unos casos porque se dejan las cosas para última hora y en otros porque «piden ese número que vamos a devolver». En conjunto la sensación era de ligero descenso de ventas respecto al año pasado, la misma percepción que tenían en el establecimiento de la calle San Millán, donde comentaban que «la crisis se nota». En Doña Elenita, sin embargo, la cosa parecía estar yendo mejor, algo «inesperado» que la propia responsable achacaba a que le habían coincidido muchas instituciones, que cada año «van rotando». Ya sea buscando una fecha importante en lo personal o «el número que no quiere nadie», parece que «a la gente le gusta cogerlo a última hora», buscando quizás una suerte que se resiste. ¿Hasta hoy?

description.hltext_display: Line-up: Bob Dylan to headlines Bluesfest festival
description.content:
Festival Survey: Win $250 Moshtix credit
FOR years he refused to play in a town he'd never heard of, but finally Bob Dylan will grace Byron Bay's Bluesfest with his folk saintly presence.
In a huge coup, the East Coast Blues and Roots Festival has confirmed an impressive trifecta of headline acts with influential English troubadour Elvis Costello and blues legend BB King joining Dylan over the Easter weekend.
Bluesfest director Peter Noble has been chasing Dylan's signature since 2003 when the folk legend was booked to play but was forced to pull out at the last minute.
"Bob Dylan and BB King are rock royalty and we especially wanted to get Dylan because of the counter culture and protest music in his early career representing a lot of what Byron Bay was once about," Noble says.
"Byron used to be such an anti-establishment hippy town and to get Bob to play here has always been the Holy Grail.
Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar.
Related Coverage
End of sidebar. Return to start of sidebar.
"He used to say 'don't put me in any town I've never heard of' and finally we've done it, although I think he's heard of Byron now.
"Elvis Costello is the icing on the cake of the best line-up we've had in years."
While the three play their maiden shows in Byron Bay - King returns to Australia for the first time since 1995 - Bluesfest will welcome back some familiar faces including Michael Franti and Spearhead, and Mexican duo Rodrigo Y Gabriela.
Ben Harper will introduce his new supergroup Fistful Of Mercy, comprising also of Joseph Arthur and George Harrison's son Dhani Harrison, as well as playing with his band du jour the Relentless Seven.
Another enticing collaboration sees The Blind Boys Of Alabama paired with soul master Aaron Neville for the first time in Australia.
Other international visitors will include Eric Bibb, Derek Trucks & Susan Tedeschi Band, Robert Randolph & The Family Band and Tony Joe White.
From New Zealand the mighty Trinity Roots return newly reformed and bringing along their side-project Little Bushmen, while local acts include The Cat Empire, Ash Grunwald, Washington, Xavier Rudd, Kate Miller-Heidke, C.W. Stoneking and Saltwater Band.
Two more line-up announcements will be made in the coming months but tickets are likely to move fast on Dylan's inclusion alone and are on sale now.
Bluesfest runs over the Easter long weekend from Thursday, April 21, to Monday, April 25, at Tyagarah, outside Byron Bay.

event_or_fact.property: Elvis Costello is the icing on the cake of the best line-up we've had in years.

Byron used to be such an anti-establishment hippy town and to get Bob to play here has always been the Holy Grail. Start of sidebar. Skip to end of sidebar. Related Coverage End of sidebar. Return to start of sidebar. don't put me in any town I've never h

description.hltext_display: We want to see your holiday photos
description.author: Lubbock Avalanche-Journal
description.content:
Send us your
holiday photos . Send photos of you or your friends. Photos can be from last year, this year or 20 years ago. We’ll run the photos on Saturdays in December. Here’s how to get them in the paper:
• Write one to two sentences describing what’s happening in the photo: who the people are, what they’re doing, where they are and when the photo was taken.
• Identify every person in the photo, and double check that names are spelled correctly.
•E-mail the photo as a jpg attachment at high resolution to heather.daniel@lubbockonline.com. Put “Holiday Photos” in the subject line. Or mail it to Heather Daniel, A-J, P.O. Box 491, Lubbock, TX 79408.

description.hltext_display: 2010年スポーツ＝Ｗ杯優勝のスペインが席巻、ナダルも活躍
广发基金许雪梅：明年“黑马”仍看次新股
description.content:
2010年即将过去，而今年的最后一个月十分重要。12月既是总结今年年度行情、着手明年工作计划承上启下的一个月，又是“十一五”结束、“十二五”开启承前启后的一个月，再逢政府货币政策开始转向。广发稳健增长（爱基，净值，资讯）混合基金经理许雪梅日前表示，眼下对明年市场格局的大趋势做些前瞻性预测，对下一年的投资策略尤为重要。许雪梅认为，通胀的威胁可能在明年上半年会慢慢的减退，而下半年的经济会逐渐的稳定。
从经济数据来看，11月经济数据显示宏观经济继续呈现景气迹象，工业增长小幅回升，PPI受能源、原材料价格上涨等因素影响攀高。另一方面通胀压力较大，CPI高涨的局面预计将延续到明年上半年。
从流动性来看，中央经济工作会议已定调，明年将实施积极的财政政策和稳健的货币政策。需要注意的是稳健的货币政策并不意味着流动性剧烈收缩，中央经济工作会议之后的周末央行只上调了银行存款准备金，并未加息。上调存款准备金率将收紧银行银根，导致明年上半年信贷从紧，但考虑到明年中西部建设（002302）和配套项目、保障房修建等，明年整体的流动性不会像市场预期的那么紧。控制通胀将更多地依靠政府的政策手段、行政手段调控，而不是货币政策。
“2010年时结构性危机与结构性机会并存的一年，外患欧洲债务危机，内忧经济滑坡的情况下，很多基金踏错了市场节拍。”许雪梅称，“眼下看，爱尔兰债务危机只是支付性危机，而中国经济在经过2010年的深度调整之后进入一个新的周期起点，整体来看如果外围环境不出现大的恶化的话，明年一定比今年好，下半年比上半年好。”
许雪梅认为，明年的投资机会将全面和均衡。长期经济转型所涉及的医药、消费、新兴产业，以及经济周期回归的周期性相关领域都会有较好的表现。从估值的角度、成长的角度看，中小板、创业板值得期待，"黑马"将在那些刚上市完成融资，业务扩张顶到暴涨的领先企业中诞生。相对来讲，大蓝筹和周期性行业都会有所表现，而消费股很难出现像今年这样波澜壮阔的行情。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 中海基金董事长储晓明辞任 人事斗争加剧

description.hltext_display: Toulouse end Warriors Euro hopes
description.content:
Glasgow Warriors' French misery continued as their European dreams were shattered following a 36-10 loss to Toulouse.
Maxi Medard and Virgile Lacombe grabbed first-half tries for the hosts who led 14-3 at the interval.
DTH van der Merwe gave Glasgow a glimmer of hope early in the second half but they were blown away by a clinical Toulouse outfit, who scored further tries through Clement Poitrenaud, Thierry Dusautoir and Vincent Clerc.
The Warriors had a torrid week in the south of France with the weather across Europe causing chaos as, first, Sean Lineen's men endured a 16-hour journey to Toulouse and upon their arrival they discovered their luggage had not arrived. That led to the game being postponed twice until the kit was located and delivered to the team.
Toulouse dominated the opening exchanges and Medard broke the deadlock with a fine individual try after 10 minutes. The Top 14 leading try scorer found a mismatch in midfield and stepped inside prop forward Moray Low to race clear and score beneath the posts. David Skrela duly converted to give his side a 7-0 lead.
Colin Gregor came close to scoring after a trademark Max Evans break, but the scrum-half was dragged down agonisingly short of the line but the Warriors secured a penalty and Ruaridh Jackson dissected the posts.
The game almost boiled over with a mass brawl following a Toulouse penalty and because Richie Grey was adjudged to have started the altercation, he was sent to the sin-bin. As a result, Toulouse extended their lead with a second try on the 23rd minute mark, Lacombe the beneficiary of a powerful rolling maul, with Skrela adding the extras.
The visitors made a perfect start to the second half when Van der Merwe danced his way over after 45 minutes. The flying Dutchman stepped inside Poitrenaud to score between the posts. Jackson converted the solo effort to bring Glasgow within four points.
But Toulouse immediately struck back with a Skrela penalty before Poitrenaud made amends and raced clear to score a crucial try that Skrela expertly converted from the touchline.
And the European giants secured the all-important bonus-point try through Dusautoir on 65 minutes before Clerc rubbed salt into Glasgow's wounds.

description.hltext_display: - 蔡批馬政府棄守 投保只提中資鬆綁
description.content:
民進黨主席蔡英文今天批評，第6次「江陳會」未能簽署投資保障協議，會後公布的階段性共識中，攸關「台商人身安全與自由的保障」也隻字未提，反而將重點放在解除中資來台限制，馬政府棄守立場，未來可能達成的協議令人無法期待。（黃悅嬌報導）
第6次「江陳會」落幕，兩岸簽署醫藥衛生合作協議。民進黨主席蔡英文在中常會前表示，本次「江陳會」不但未能簽署投資保障協議，且根據「江陳會」後公布的「階段性共識」看來，未來投保協議的討論，將依中國所設定的的方向進行，只提中資鬆綁，未提台商安全保障，馬政府已棄守立場。(t)蔡英文：『在250字的共識當中，「台商人身安全與自由的保障」竟然隻字未提，反而把重點放在解除中資來台的限制。中國法治及人權的水準遠低於國際和台灣，因此保障台商安全是人民最在乎的談判事項，但馬政府的談判團隊竟然無法固守，甚至棄守，這令人對於未來可能達成的協議也感到無法期待。』
蔡英文表示，民進黨要求立法院要實質審查所有與中國簽署的協議，協議授權下的工作進行，包括ECFA下的「經合會」、衛生醫藥合作協議下的「工作組」，未來的決議與方案都應該送國會審查，以避免空白授權剝奪了政府公權力。

description.hltext_display: Scharfe Kritik an neuem Mediengesetz in Ungarn
Faema gana un premio nacional por su proyecto ‘Un cuento amigo’
description.content:
El galardón, dotado con 9.000 euros, se consigue gracias al trabajo realizado para sensibilizar a los niños sobre la enfermedad mental a través de un contacto directo con los afectados
Beatriz Mas
‘Un cuento amigo’ es un proyecto que se realiza desde hace cuatro años para que los niños de colegios abulenses se sensibilicen sobre la enfermedad mental. Es un trabajo realizado por Faema (Asociación de Familiares y Amigos de Enfermos Mentales Abulense) que ahora ha sido galardonado en la quinta edición de los premios ‘Toda una vida para mejorar’, dentro de la categoría de asociaciones de pacientes. Es un premio que concede la Confederación Española de Agrupaciones de Familiares y Personas con Enfermedad Mental, la Sociedad Española de Psiquiatría, la Asociación Nacional de Psiquiatría, la Asociación Nacional de Informadores de la Salud y los laboratorios Lilly.
El jurado concedió el premio al proyecto abulense tras valorar la importancia de acercar la realidad de la salud mental a la infancia, «ya que ellos pueden hacer cambiar la percepción de los adultos».
Todo ello porque con ‘Un cuento amigo’ se trabaja para sensibilizar a los niños de los colegios sobre la enfermedad mental y se hace relacionando a estos niños con afectados y así aprender cómo viven. Con el proyecto se transmiten valores para respetar la diferencia de otras personas.
A este premio, que se entregará a principios de año por la ministra de Sanidad, Leire Pajín, concursaron 28 asociaciones. En la categoría de periodismo el premio fue para Lara Carrascos (El día de Canarias) por el reportaje ‘El poder de la palabra.
El proyecto. ‘Un cuento amigo’ está financiado por el Ayuntamiento de Ávila a través del Consejo Municipal de Personas con Discapacidad, también con la colaboración de los Servicios Sociales de la Junta y la Fundación La Caixa.
En este proyecto participaron en la última edición cien escolares de los colegios San Pedro Bautista y Santo Tomás. El trabajo comenzó con la visita de la psicóloga de Faema que acudió a los centros para explicar todo lo relacionado con la enfermedad mental, con dinámicas adaptadas a los escolares. Después hubo encuentros entre los niños y las personas con enfermedad mental en las dependencias del Centro Ocupacional y juntos realizaron talleres y los niños recibieron material escolar. La tercera parte es un concurso de cuentos entre los niños en el que se publican los cuatro ganadores.

description.hltext_display: - 元旦升旗主持人新鮮組合 企業界俊男美
description.content:
建國百年的元旦升旗典禮，主辦單位打破慣例，請來企業界人士主持，雅虎亞太董事總經理鄒開蓮表示，在特別的日子做特別的事情，非常值得紀念；統一企業總經理羅智先則表示，主辦單位認為這樣的安排是「驚喜」，他希望不會成為「驚嚇」。
（繆宇綸報導）
建國百年元旦的第一場大型活動元旦升旗，請來雅虎亞太董事總經理鄒開蓮，以及統一企業總經理羅智先擔任主持人，打破以往慣例。鄒開蓮表示，建國百年是非常特殊的日子，元旦又是特別的momemt，接下這個工作，她的父親還一度以為她是要去升國旗(t)『其實對我的家庭而言，這是一個很特別，非常榮譽的事情，我們都是生在台灣，長在台灣，當我們的國家一百週年，我們有這個機會能夠在這個特別的日子中，做一些特別的事情，我相信是很值得紀念的，也希望可以不負眾望，也不讓主委漏氣！』
羅智先則表示，年輕時他也參加過類似活動，但是像這種成為目光焦點的事情，他感到與有榮焉，他接下這個任務，排開這段時間公司所有的會議和重要行程，讓他的員工「如獲大赦」(t)『我們還是非常非常緊張，因為這畢竟不是我們所專長的一件事情，主委說這是建國百年活動的第一個「驚喜」，我希望我們也很努力，希望不要各位有任何「驚嚇」！（哈哈哈......）』
文建會主委盛治仁希望當天打算參加元旦升旗的民眾，都能穿著有紅藍白三色的元素，展現齊心參加升旗典禮的感覺。

description.hltext_display: Freeze keeps pressure on transport
description.content:
Transport operators are under severe pressure to get the Christmas getaway back on track after days of disruption caused by the snow.
Heathrow Airport's second runway reopened on Tuesday night, raising hopes for the thousands of stranded air passengers - many of whom have spent uncomfortable nights in the terminals. It plans to run around two-thirds of flights on Wednesday but travellers were warned not to expect services to return to normal at once.
Forecasters, meanwhile, said a thaw was unlikely in the coming days as cold weather continued.
Prime Minister David Cameron expressed his "frustration" at the length of the disruption at Heathrow, while airlines accused BAA of failing to have enough de-icer to cope with the situation.
Speaking at a Downing Street news conference, Mr Cameron said: "If it's understandable that Heathrow had to close briefly, I'm frustrated on behalf of all those affected that it's taking so long for the situation to improve."
Wolfgang Prock-Schauer, chief executive of airline BMI, told The Times the Heathrow situation was "completely unacceptable". He said: "BAA was not prepared. It did not have enough de-icing fluid."
The EU Commission also slammed Europe's air travel disruption as unacceptable and urged airports to "get serious" about better planning for bad weather.
BAA chief executive Colin Matthews warned people not to expect normal services immediately and urged them to check before going to the airport. He also pledged to investigate how the situation was dealt with and why it took so long to clear snow from aircraft - but only after the "short-term" aim of getting passengers to where they needed to be had been achieved.
Rail travellers have also been affected. The East Coast line, one of the country's main railway arteries, is returning to a "near normal" service after being suspended on Tuesday after hundreds of people were evacuated from stricken trains following damage to overhead power lines at Huntingdon, near Peterborough.
Andy Ratcliffe, forecaster at MeteoGroup, the Press Association's weather division, said Heathrow and Gatwick could expect temperatures of 1-2C and a possibility of heavy snow early on in Wales, East Anglia and the Midlands.

event_or_fact.property: BAA was not prepared.; It did not have enough de-icing fluid.
If it's understandable that Heathrow had to close briefly, I'm frustrated on behalf of all those affected that it's taking so long for the situation to improve.
Heathrow and Gatwick could expect temperatures of 1-2C and a possibility of heavy snow early on in Wales, East Anglia and the Midlands
people not to expect normal services immediately and urged them to check before going to the airport

description.hltext_display: Petrolifera sells interest in Sierra Nevada License in Colombia
description.content:
Petrolifera Petroleum Limited has entered into a binding agreement with an international oil and gas exploration and production company with operations in South America to sell a 25% working interest in its Sierra Nevada License in Colombia. Petrolifera will receive cash payment of US$10 million, payable in instalments in December 2010 and January 2011, in respect of this disposition.
The assignment of the working interest is subject to approval of Agencia Nacional de Hidrocarburos of Colombia ("ANH"). Petrolifera intends to use the proceeds from this sale primarily to fund the drilling of an exploratory well, San Angel X1001, on its Magdalena License in the Lower Magdalena Basin onshore Colombia. Site preparations for the drilling of this well are currently underway and the company anticipates the spudding of this well in late January 2011.
This disposition is in part a result of the strategic alternatives process ("process") announced by Petrolifera on September 7, 2010. Petrolifera is continuing to assess and consider other strategic alternatives available to the company.
Tags: Petrolifera Petroleum Limited

description.hltext_display: Premios a la sociedad
description.content:
Los galardones Pablo Iglesias, de UGT, se entregaron en sus categorías provincial y regional en un acto en el que se reconoció su trabajo, dedicación y compromiso social
Premiados junto a responsables regionales y provinciales de UGT
Antonio Batolomé
Beatriz Mas. Ávila
Las distinciones Pablo Iglesias, de UGT, se crearon en 2005 para reconocer la solidaridad y la dedicación, el compromiso social, la labor académica, deportiva y la creatividad de personas y colectivos abulenses y castellanos y leoneses. Son unas premisas que cumplen los premiados de esta séptima edición que ayer reunió a los galardonados en el acto de entrega de premios, que se celebró en el palacio de Los Serrano, presentado por el periodista José Pulido.
A ambos lados del escenario, todos los premiados, dispuestos a recoger el busto de Pablo Iglesias que se concede a los distinguidos por UGT, pero también las autoridades que iban a presidir el acto. Se trataba de Agustín Prieto, secretario regional de UGT; el alcalde de Ávila, Miguel Ángel García Nieto; el coordinador de la Obra Social de Caja de Ávila, Gonzalo Jiménez; el jefe del Servicio de Cultura, Alejandro Nuñez; el subdelegado del Gobierno, César Martín, el vicepresidente de la Diputación, Miguel Ángel Sánchez Caro, y el secretario provincial de UGT, Luis Sánchez. Una amplia representación institucional, junto a miembros del jurado, que no quitó protagonismo a los galardonados, que estuvieron acompañados por la música de Vanesa Muelas.
La distinción individual de los premios fue para la maestra abulense Julia Resina, como «un ejemplo de educadora vocacional y espejo de la enseñanza en España en el último tercio del siglo XX». Resina aseguró que para ella es un honor recibir el premio, el primero en su carrera. Espera que sea una forma de valorar la labor de los maestros en una época en la que se enfrentan a dificultades por los cambios sociales y cuando es importante que padres y profesores sepan que son protagonistas y se crean su labor.
La distinción colectiva provincial fue para el Óbila Club de Basket, «por su labor promocional del deporte abulense, en especial entre niños y jóvenes a través de sus escuelas y clubes». En el acto estuvo representado por su presidente, Héctor Palencia, que explicó que se trata de un premio especial «porque se circunscribe a la labor de la cantera y además es cuando se cumplen en 2011 diez años». Se trata, dijo, «de un empujón para continuar la labor de la cantera».
El premio en categoría individual regional fue para Prudencio Prieto, presidente de la Unión de Consumidores de Castilla y León, «por la labor de protección de los intereses de los ciudadanos, en su faceta de consumidores y usuarios». Para él, el galardón sirve para renovar el esfuerzo e intentar «dar un servicio y prestación de calidad a una población que nos necesita», en un momento en que la labor es «más técnica y profunda».
En la categoría colectiva regional se distinguió a la Red Europea contra la Pobreza y la Exclusión Social, un grupo de presión, denuncia y reivindicación a favor de las personas y grupos en situación de penuria social. Estuvo representado por su coordinadora, Noelia Martínez, que destacó el trabajo de las 17 ONG que conforman el grupo y que recibe un doble premio, «el primero y de una institución con mucho prestigio como UGT».
La mención especial provincial fue para Antonio Carrera, promotor de la Obra Social y Cultural de Caja de Ávila, que agradeció «el broche de oro de su carrera», que le dio la posibilidad de trabajar toda la vida en algo que le gusta.
Y la mención especial regional fue para los trabajadores de los servicios públicos de emergencias de Castilla y León, en particular por su labor en Haití tras el terremoto. En su representación, Francisco Rivas, coordinador del grupo de rescate, dijo que es un reconocimiento a quienes estuvieron en la catástrofe, zona a la que volverán en enero para ver qué es lo que aún se necesita.
Junto a los premiados, en secretario regional de UGT, Agustín Prieto, destacó la labor del jurado a la hora de elegir a los premiados, «merecedores de este galardón». Se trata de unos premios «que se van consolidando» y que llegan en unos «tiempos difíciles, con avaricia, especulación, codicia y con unos mercados que dictan las normas», pero en los premios se reconoce a gente que «hace una magnífica labor para la sociedad».
Por su parte, el alcalde de Ávila, Miguel Ángel García Nieto, aseguró que los premios son un «referente, sensibles al movimiento ciudadano».

description.hltext_display: DR-vært skal styre award-show
description.author: KATJA MARIA SALOMONSEN
description.content:
DRs karismatiske vært skal styre slagets gang ved årets Danish Beauty Award
Mikael Berthelsen, der har udvidet horisonten med programmer som 'De uaktuelle nyheder', 'den 11. time', og senest voksen-julekalenderen 'Bertelsen på Caminoen', træder snart ind i en ganske ny rolle.
Den 6. maj skifter DRs karismatiske vært nemlig pilgrimsstøvlerne ud med parfume og pudderkvaster. Det sker i forbindelse med Danish Beauty Award, hvor Mikael Bertelsen skal være vært sammen med Camilla Miehe-Renhard. Læs også: Bertelsen og Miehe-Renhard erstatter således Ellen Hillingsø og Peter Frödin, der har styret slagets gang fra scenekanten ved kosmetikindustriens årlige branche-kalas. En fest, hvor årets bedste skønhedsprodukter kåres i et utal af kategorier.
- Værterne er et nøje udvalgt og højt respekteret makkerpar, som rummer stor dygtighed, værtserfaring og troværdighed. De to værter har en fantastisk kemi indbyrdes og mestrer begge evnen til at nå ud over scenekanten. Vi glæder os til en magisk aften i deres selskab, siger arrangørerne bag Danish Beauty Award om valget af Bertelsen og Miehe-Renhard. Læs også:

description.hltext_display: '3G in India: Operator Launch Strategies' and Other Research Reports by Ovum Available at MarketPubl
description.content:
LONDON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Market Publishers Ltd informs that new in-demand market research reports by Ovum have been added to its catalogue.
3G in India: Operator Launch Strategies. The report describes data services targeted at specific market segments, provides the key to faster returns on network investments. The research provides the information on the operators that are now planning their network rollout and service strategies and discusses 3G launch strategies in India ...
Global Services Contracts 1H10: Telcos on a Bankers' Bonus. Banks are back in the market for global network services, with technology and manufacturing companies joining them as key innovators in communications. The report provides a detailed analysis of the global service providers...
America Movil. The research dwells on the company focus on bundled offerings and multi-play services as well as expanding 3G network capacity to drive the next phase of growth. The research discusses strategic objectives and the process of integration of newly acquired operations and stiff competition from regional and local players as key challenges ...
The Status of Mobile Termination Regulation in the EU15. The report provides a detailed analysis of how current MTRs were determined across the EU15 and look at how NRAs are taking the Recommendation into consideration as they undertake new market analyses. The research discusses EC recommendations aimed at harmonizing the charges across Europe ...
Despite LTE, HSPA+ Keeps Evolving. This report describes the main HSPA+ enhancements brought by 3GPP R8, R9, and R10. It also offers early trends for these future HSPA+ options. The report provides technical overview of HSPA evolutionary options and mobile broadband connection forecasts for 2009-2015 ...
More new market research reports by Ovum can be found at http://marketpublishers.com/members/ovum/info.html

description.hltext_display: Vijf Afghaanse burgers gedood bij NAVO-bombardement
description.content:
In het zuiden van Afghanistan zijn gisteren vijf burgers om het leven gekomen bij een NAVO-bombardement. Dat heeft de woordvoerder van de gouverneur van de provincie Helmand bekendgemaakt. Bij het bombardement in het district Sangin werden volgens dezelfde bron ook zeven vermoedelijke talibanstrijders gedood.
"Drie vrouwen en twee kinderen werden gedood tijdens het gevecht, maar we weten niet wie verantwoordelijk is", klonk het. In een mededeling laat de NAVO weten dat een gebouw werd geviseerd van waaruit de taliban ISAF-troepen aanviel.
Burgerslachtoffers veroorzaakt door de internationale troepen zijn een gevoelig onderwerp in Afghanistan en zorgen voor spanningen tussen de NAVO en president Hamid Karzai. Tussen januari en september dit jaar zijn volgens de Verenigde Naties al 2.400 burgers gedood in Afghanistan. (afp/adv)

description.hltext_display: Conservatives call caucus but need still more to hold meeting
description.author: Lubbock Avalanche-Journal
description.content:
A challenger for the top post of the Texas House on Tuesday forced Republicans to call a long-sought meeting but still had a long way to go for the vote conservatives have demanded.
Pampa Republican Rep. Warren Chisum said Tuesday he had the 10 signatures required to call a meeting of the Republican caucus in January.
Getting the support from fellow Republicans that rules required to actually hold the meeting was another matter.
Chisum said he spent Monday gathering signatures after working in vain to have more of a consensus call for the party meeting.
“I just think it’s time to have a caucus and get some of these issues settled,” Chisum said.
Chisum and Rep. Ken Paxton, R-McKinney, have both challenged Speaker Joe Straus, R-San Antonio, considering him too moderate to lead the new Republican supermajority.
Republicans will start the 2011 session with 101 seats in the 150-member Texas House, a margin allowing the party to pass constitutional amendments, suspend rules and breeze through other hurdles if the representatives vote as a bloc.
It also meant challengers with the support of the caucus could ensure Democrats don’t have a role in the speaker election.
Straus received support from some Democrats in the much more evenly split 2009 House that helped build momentum before the speaker vote.
Chisum and Paxton have tried to push Republicans to use the caucus, rather than the traditional system of pledging support to a speaker candidate.
But House Republicans were not in lockstep, as the speaker’s challenge has shown. Previous attempts to call a caucus didn’t work. Not everyone was on board for the meeting Monday as he sought signatures, Chisum said.
“It’s not unanimous, but it doesn’t have to be,”he said.
He does need more than 51 members to show up to the meeting. The caucus can’t meet without a quorum.
That’s why he announced the request so far in advance, he said — to give representatives time to change holiday travel arrangements.
It also gave voters who supported a caucus time to contact their representatives. Several county Republican parties, including Lubbock’s, have passed resolutions requesting Republicans use the caucus to select their speaker nominee.
“We don’t have a very good Republican caucus if we can’t get a quorum,” Chisum said.
Lubbock Republican Rep. John Frullo, a Straus supporter, said he wasn’t for or against a caucus meeting. If there was a quorum, he’d attend, he said.
“Either way, this is, in essence, a non-binding resolution,” Frullo said. “I still fully support Straus, but I’m not opposed to a caucus meeting. I don’t think the two are mutually exclusive — supporting Straus and supporting a caucus meeting.”
Chisum still hopes to land the job, though Paxton appeared to have more support, including from Rep. Dan Flynn, who signed Chisum’s letter. The East Texas Republican’s endorsements also included Reps.-elect Charles Perry, R-Lubbock and Jim Landtroop, R-Plainview.
Landtroop added his name to Chisum’s letter late Tuesday afternoon but could not be reached for comment.
Perry said he had to rearrange a meeting but planned to be there. He had no doubts a meeting would go forward.
“Absolutely,” Perry said. “There’ll be a quorum there.”
To comment on this story:

description.hltext_display: Motivatie, wat drijft ons echt?
description.content:
Aanbevelen
Gepubliceerd:22-12-2010 om 09:05 Auteur:Ben Kepes
We horen al jaren dat incentives voor werknemers het geheim van een hogere productiviteit zijn. Maar is dat wel zo?
Tijdens zijn voordracht tijdens een bijeenkomst over motivatie, vroeg de spreker zich af of het werkelijk zo is dat je meer gewenst gedrag krijgt bij een beloning en of er bij het afpakken van die beloning sprake is van het tegendeel.
Spreker Dan Pink refereerde aan een studie aan het Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) waarin een groep studenten een set aan uitdagingen voorgeschoteld kreeg – fysiek, cognitief en ruimtelijk. De prestaties werden aangemoedigd door deze te koppelen aan een geldbedrag; iets dat overeenkomt met de werkelijke situatie binnen bedrijven. Wat gebeurde er?
1. Zolang de taak bestond puur mechanische vaardigheden aansprak, werkten de beloningen zoals verwacht.
2. Zodra de taak een beroep deed op cognitief vermogen, leidde een hogere beloning tot slechtere resultaten.
De tweede studie die Pink aanhaalde, vond plaats in India en verving de beloningen uit het eerste onderzoek met veel hogere geldbedragen. Je zou denken dat in een land waar de inkomens relatief laag zijn, incentives tot een hogere productiviteit zouden leiden. Niets is minder waar, de studie leidde tot dezelfde conclusies als die bij het onderzoek van MIT getrokken konden worden: zodra er een beroep op de hersenen gedaan wordt, gaat de vlieger niet meer op.
Als een beloning in de vorm van geld de cognitieve vaardigheden niet kan verbeteren, hoe komt dat dan? Volgens Pink komt dat doordat werknemers op een bepaald niveau (en over de hoogte van dat niveau kun je discussiëren) niet langer door geld worden gedreven. Ze baseren hun motivatie op drie andere zaken:
Autonomie – de wens om je werk zelf in te delen. Dit is precies de reden waarom bedrijven als Atlassian en Google hun werknemers tijd gunnen om elke week aan hun eigen projecten te werken.
Vakmanschap – de neiging om beter te worden in dingen. Werknemers zetten zich harder in wanneer ze ook goed zijn in wat ze doen. Pink noemt Linux, Apache en Wikipedia als voorbeelden van projecten waaraan mensen veel tijd besteden om zichzelf persoonlijk te ontwikkelen.
Betekenis – Mensen willen hun werk betekenis geven. Ze willen de wereld verbeteren, ze willen problemen oplossen; kortom, ze willen het verschil maken.
Deze zaken zetten vraagtekens bij eerdere economische en psychologische aannames. Autonomie, Vakmanschap en Betekenis zijn allen factoren die tegen bestaande economische wetten indruisen en zowel voor moeilijkheden als kansen binnen ons werkveld zorgen.
Wanneer we het over het ontwrichtende effect van technologie en economische krachten hebben, wordt het misschien ook tijd om na te denken over hoe we met werknemers omgaan. De presentatie van Pink, hieronder uitgetekend in een YouTube video, is een verfrissende, uitdagende kijk op motivatie in tien minuten. Kijk ernaar en bepaal zelf hoe het met autonomie, vakmanschap en betekenis binnen jouw bedrijf zit.
Ben Kepes is analist, ondernemer, adviseur en commentator. Hij werkt binnen een verschillende sectoren en is actief als bestuurder binnen meerdere bedrijven. Zijn bijdragen zijn op The Diversity Blog te lezen.

description.hltext_display: Sheriff’s detectives search for clues in Modesto killing
description.content:
The Stanislaus County Sheriff’s Department is investigating the homicide death of a 61-year-old Modesto man.
The victim was identified by the sheriff’s department as Manuel Romero Vibanco.
Deputies and emergency medical technicians responded to the Global Auto Body Parts located in the 500 block of South 9th Street in Modesto at 5:32 p.m. Monday. Callers reported that a person had been assaulted with a deadly weapon and when deputies arrived they found Vibanco seriously injured at the side of the roadway. Paramedics rushed him to a local area hospital where he was pronounced dead.
Deputy Luke Schwartz, a sheriff spokesman, said the investigators have determined a cause of death, but are not releasing the details because the investigation is ongoing.
Anyone with information to help further this investigation, or who may have come into contact with Vibanco in the days leading up to his death, is urged to contact Det. Frank Soria. He can be reached at 525-7080. Those that wish to remain anonymous may call Stanislaus County Area Crime Stoppers toll free at 1-866-602-7463 or locally at 521-4636.
To contact Sabra Stafford, e-mail sstafford@turlockjournal.com or call 634-9141 ext. 2002.

event_or_fact.property: the investigators have determined a cause of death, but are not releasing the details because the investigation is ongoing

description.hltext_display: Brüderle: Null-Neuverschuldung 2014/2015 möglich
description.content:
Rainer Brüderle | Foto: dpa
Berlin - Dank des wirtschaftlichen Aufschwungs kann der Bund nach Einschätzung von Wirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle bereits 2014/2015 ohne neue Schulden auskommen.
Sollte sich das Wachstum als robust erweisen, könne die Rückführung der Neuverschuldung auf Null bis dahin realistisch sein, sagte er der "Rheinischen Post". Auch der FDP-Politiker Otto Fricke hält das für realistisch. Voraussetzungen seien neben Wachstum aber eine weiter sinkende Arbeitslosigkeit und eine Stabilisierung des Euro.

description.hltext_display: - 嫌犯蘆洲拒捕企圖衝撞警方 警開三槍嫌棄車
description.content: 台北縣蘆洲警方，22號上午在集賢路，兩名員警正在返回派出所，看到一台黑色自小客車，沒有懸掛車牌，因此上前盤查，但駕駛拒絕受檢，還開著車就衝出去；員警馬上展開追捕，追到五華街口，員警再度要駕駛下車，但駕駛不聽，還企圖衝撞員警， 警方對著輪胎開三槍示警，但嫌犯依舊加速逃逸，蘆洲警方表示，車子剛才在微風運河的停車場已經找到，也查出這輛車是報失竊的，但嫌犯已經棄車逃逸，目前警方還在找尋嫌犯的行蹤。

description.hltext_display: 河南煤矿启动“生命工程” 避险六大系统上马
description.content:
中新网郑州12月22日电 (记者 王逍)被称为井下矿工“生命工程”的煤矿安全避险六大系统建设，河南已经正式启动并列出了明确的时间表：2012年底前，省骨干煤炭企业和地方煤炭中的生产矿井要建成安全避险“六大系统”并投入使用；到2013年6月底前，所有生产矿井中必须完成“六大系统”建设完善工作；基建矿井资源整合技改矿井投产前，也必须建成安全避险“六大系统”，否则不准投入生产。
记者今日从河南省安全生产监督管理局获悉，这项保障煤矿井下职工安全的“生命工程”正式宣告启动。煤矿安全避险六大系统建设包括监测监控、人员定位、通信联络、紧急避险、压风自救、供水施救。
在“六大系统”中，井下紧急避险系统尤为值得关注。河南省明确要求，煤矿必须按照要求，为入井人员配备额定防护时间不低于30分钟的自救器。煤与瓦斯突出矿井应建设采区避难硐室，当突出煤层的掘进巷道长度及采煤工作面走向长度超过500米时，必须在距离工作面500米范围内建设避难硐室或设置救生舱。煤与瓦斯突出矿井以外的其他矿井，从采掘工作面步行，凡在自救器提供的额定防护时间内不能安全撤到地面的，必须在距采掘工作面1000米范围内设置避难硐室或救生舱。

description.hltext_display: In Memory of Craig Dennis Villwock
机构神秘加仓地产股昨集体发飙
description.content:
地产板块昨天大涨4．74%、10只个股封住涨停，长期萎靡的地产股终于扬眉吐气了一把，至于该板块突然发飙的原因，业内将其归于“社保基金等机构加仓”。商报记者注意到，在地产股发飙中，一篇报告起到的作用或不容小觑。
机构单日大举买入地产股
虽然楼市调控阴霾还远未散去，但地产股的春天似乎已来临。昨日，鲜于表现的地产股却异军突起，旗下个股也是接二连三狂奔，截至收盘，该板块大涨4．74%，位居板块涨幅之首。
旗下个股荣盛发展（002146）、世茂股份（600823）、首开股份（600376）、保利地产（600048）（、世联地产（002285）、万科A（000002）、苏宁环球（000718）、滨江集团（002244）、鲁商置业（600223）以及ST东源（000656）10只个股齐刷刷涨停。
此外，招商地产（000024）、北京城建（600266）、金地集团（600383）、泛海建设（000046）、云南城投（600239）和亿城股份（000616）涨幅也均在8%以上，而涨幅在5%以上的地产股更是高达42只。
“肯定是社保和基金等机构在加仓，否则根本不会有这么大的强度。”一位私募人士昨日在跟商报记者闲聊时表示，“众多机构为何突然爆发？这肯定是有原因的，只不过还没曝出来。”据启明星价值评测系统监测数据，地产股昨日整体净流入29．68亿元，位居板块之首，其他采掘和金融服务净流入分别为20．82亿元和20．36亿元。
两大交易所晚间公告证实了机构确实在行动。世茂股份（600823）成交龙虎榜显示，前五大买入席位中机构占据四席，累计买入金额高达7309．40万元。
万科Ａ前五大买入席位中机构也占据4席，累计买入金额4．67亿元，高华证券北京金融营业部也大举买入1．16亿元；荣盛发展买入龙虎榜中两家机构现身；世联地产（002285）买入金额前五大席位中清一色机构专用；滨江集团买入龙虎榜中也现身两家机构。
不过，万科、荣盛发展和世联地产等3家地产股卖出龙虎榜中也分别现身2家机构、4家机构和2家机构。
发飙或源于高盛报告
虽然机构等扎堆建仓地产股已成定局，但至于机构为何不约而同选择在昨日行动仍让市场不解，而昨日稍晚时候市场传来消息，称是高华证券的一篇报告引发的集体发飙，由于高华证券为高盛的关联方，市场普遍将其观点解读为高盛的。
商报记者查阅发现，这份署名孙贤兵的报告称，首开股份最有潜力成为类似万科Ａ、保利地产和金地集团（买入评级均为买入）等的全国龙头开发商，因此将首开股份纳入强力买入名单，而该股也是昨日率先涨停的地产股。
孙贤兵同时将万科也纳入强力买入名单，称首开股份和万科Ａ基于净资产价值的12个月目标价格分别存在64%和55%的潜在上行空间。
在该报告中，高华证券这样解释大力推荐首开股份的原因，称该公司北京房地产业务净资产价值占比为71%，土地储备面积占比位38%，在同行企业中位居前列，2010－2012年预期每股盈利年均复合增长率为37%
在孙贤兵看来，首开股份的高盈利增长潜力受益于北京土地储备的成本竞争优势、在北京市场以外出色的执行能力和公司的国企背景。据悉，首开股份土地成本仅为4000元／平方米，占目前销售均价的20%，而上市同业为30%－40%，且目前该公司在12个主要二线城市的业务已稳步展开，国企背景将使其更易获得银行贷款。值得关注的，该报告中提到的荣盛发展、滨江集团和中南建设（000961）等3只个股也悉数涨停。
然而，商报记者注意到，高华证券的该篇报告早在12月13日便已发布，各大机构为何在一周后才按照报告买入，此举尚无法得到解释。业内分析人士指出，或许还有尚未曝出的有利于楼市的利好因素。

description.hltext_display: ADM urges compliance with stipulations of temporary fencing on construction sites
description.content:
WAM Abu Dhabi, Dec 22nd, 2010 (WAM) -- The Municipality of Abu Dhabi City has called upon building contractors to observe the conditions set for the construction of temporary fencing around construction sites in accordance with the provisions of the Building Code and its Executive Regulation.
In a circular issued in this regard the Acting Executive Director of Town Planning Sector engineer Salah Awad Al Sarraj stressed the importance of seeking permits for constructing such fences as per the stipulations set in Law No (4) for 1983 and its Executive Regulation, and comply with all precautions required for protecting pedestrians, properties and surrounding buildings against the risks of falling debris, building materials or equipment, and adhering to the conditions and regulations of health, safety and environment.
Al Sarraj reflected on the importance of complying with the conditions, quality of materials, and the level of workmanship as stated in the Law. "Due attention has to be made to ensure the construction of the temporary fencing as per the dimensions fixed in the approved layout. In particular, the fence panels have to be of iron sheets fixed on a steel frame mounted on unstable concrete bases and painted in light orange or another suitable colour approved by the Municipality, while attending to periodic maintenance as appropriate," he said.
The stipulations state that the space between the panels of the fence must not be more than 5 cm, the structure must not rise more than 20 cm above the ground, the height of the fence must not be less than 2.5 meters and the width of the entrance must not be more than 5 meters. Moreover, cautionary and guidance notices must be displayed at specific locations of the fence, and a plaque bearing the name of the project, contractor and consultant must be fixed thereabout.
The stipulations alerted contractors not to store any construction materials, or set up any movable or fixed structures over the utility lines or outside the boundaries of the fence. It is also stated that the contractor should be fully responsible for maintaining the utility lines boardering the temporary fencing, provided that the Contractor has to move the fence, if required by the Municipality or any service-providing department, within 24 hours of being informed. The Contractor shall remove the temporary fence and all construction waste upon completion of the work or handing over the site flat and clean.

description.hltext_display: I deserve to be the sportsperson of the year: Jwala
description.content: India's star shuttler Jwala Gutta, who won the gold medal along with Ashwini Ponnappa in women's doubles badminton at the Commonwealth Games, said she deserves to be the sportsperson of the year. "Suggest my name for the sportsperson of the year," Gutta quipped when asked by media persons who she felt should be the sportsperson of the year. "I am serious about it. If you see the amount of hardwork that I had to put in to play both the women's doubles and the mixed doubles and then to win a gold from there I believe I deserve the accolades," said Jwala, who had to play four matches in a day after entering the the mixed doubles and women's doubles quarterfinals at the Commonwealth Games. India's top women shuttler Saina Nehwal, who won as many as five titles this year, and cricket veteran Sachin Tendulkar, who recently scored 50 Test centuries, would be top contenders for the award. Jwala hailed their respective performances but said this year somebody else should be bestowed with the award. "Saina is playing well. Sachin has been performing consistently for a long time. But let this time be somebody else," she said on the sidelines of the launch of 75th Senior National Badminton Championship to be played in Rohtak from January third. Jwala, who took a break after the Asian Games, confirmed her participation in the National championship next month. "The domestic tournaments are important as they give a lot of exposure to the upcoming players," said Jwala, who won the National Championships 13 times till now. She, however, emphasised on the need to schedule the tournaments in a proper manner so that players get enough opportunity to participate in all the events. "Too many events around a particular month deprive players from participating in all of them," Jwala said. The 27-year-old star said one needs to focus more on international events as they have an impact on the world rankings. Jwala and V Diju, who were inside the top 10 bracket last year, slipped to 30th in world rankings after a series of unimpressive performance this year. Asked about the dip, Jwala said, "I am not worried about the rankings, what is important is the performance and I believe we have done well." "It is just that we missed a number of tournaments in view of preparing for the Commonwealth and Asian Games. If we play rankings will improve automatically," said Jwala, who along with Ashwini are ranked 40th in women's doubles. Jwala said her primary focus would be the Super Series events at Korea and Malaysia next year. Asked about the injury woes to her mixed doubles partner, Diju, Jwala said, "Diju has recovered from the back injury and we are looking ahead to play together at the Super Series." The Korean event is scheduled to commence from January 15.

description.hltext_display: - 陳雲林稱賴幸媛「您」 沈呂巡：口語尊敬
description.content:
大陸海協會長陳雲林，昨天在與陸委會主委賴幸媛見面時，刻意避稱賴幸媛的官銜，對此，外交部政次沈呂巡，今天在立院外交國防委會答覆民進黨立委蔡煌瑯質詢時表示，陳雲林使用「您」，是口語中比較尊敬的稱呼，蔡煌瑯對這個回答並不滿意，還說沈呂巡的態度，唸書時一定會霸凌同學，沈呂巡則說，自己小時候個小、內向又害羞，「也許被霸凌」。（程平報導）
沈呂巡舉對教廷的外交禮儀為例，強調通常都會稱對方的官員「閣下」，因此他認為，站在外交的立場，陳雲林稱賴幸媛「您」，是口語中尊敬的稱呼。(t)
只是沈呂巡的答覆，被蔡煌瑯批評是巧言亂德，還說依照沈呂巡的個性，讀書時可能除了馬總統外，一定會霸凌其他同學，沈呂巡則說，也許自己才被霸凌。(t)
此外針對沈呂巡引用史記中的「偶語棄市」，來評論約束官員言行的「大嘴巴條款」，但考試院長關中卻也引論語中「巧言亂德，小不忍則亂大謀」回應，沈呂巡則說，關中是他的老師，他很尊重關中，兩人沒有過節。

description.hltext_display: 44.5 per cent increase in Abu Dhabi International Airport's Duty Free revenues
description.content:
WAM Abu Dhabi, Dec 22nd, 2010 (WAM) -- Abu Dhabi Airports Company (ADAC), announced a 44.5 per cent increase in Duty Free revenues and a 16 per cent increase in passengers at Abu Dhabi International Airport during the F1 season in November, compared to same period of last year's race.
The announcement was made during a prize draw event following a successful F1 promotional campaign at the capital's airport Duty Free. The ceremony was held yesterday at Yas Marina Circuit and attended by senior ADAC officials.
Following the successful rollout of its retail and food '&' beverage brand, Shop-Dine-Unwind, earlier this year and the F1 promotional campaign, the month of November has been a great success for Abu Dhabi Duty Free, with all passengers flying to and from Abu Dhabi International Airport having the opportunity to participate in this activation.
Huraiz Al Mur bin Huraiz, ADAC's Chief Commercial Officer commented: "The Shop-Dine-Unwind brand for the Abu Dhabi Duty Free has demonstrated to be an important asset to ADAC's portfolio of brands. We are proud of the success we saw with this year's F1 season, which goes on to show that we have continued to improve on our customer experience at Abu Dhabi International Airport. I would like to also congratulate the winners and hope that they continue to use Abu Dhabi International Airport as their gateway to the world." WAM/ES/AM
