description.hltext_display: 31只基金净值逾越6124点水平(名单)
description.content:
三年前，当上证指数的“红旗”插在6124点之际，谁也没有想到，这将是一波超级大牛市的终结，这成为不少投资人，甚至是不少基金公司投资梦魇的开始。如今，虽然上证指数还在2800点附近运行，离6000点还有一半以上距离，但已经有不少个股创出历史新高，而小盘股的表现更是全面超越6124点的水平。根据巨灵财经统计，截至本周一共有31只基金超越了6124点的高点，成为基金中的战斗“基”。
从2007年10月16日大盘站上6124点算起，截止本周一，根据巨灵财经的统计，涨幅超过10％的基金有14只。
华夏大盘依然是当之无愧的王者，沪综指从6124点到1664点，再到2800点，上上下下经历了无数的波澜起伏，但是该基金在这个期间依然上涨超过90％，目前其也是净值唯一超过10元的基金。排在第二名的基金也是来自基金豪门华夏基金，华夏复兴（爱基，净值，资讯）以涨幅45.36％排在亚军的位置。排在季军的为泰达宏利，三年的涨幅达到33.66％。
10家老基金中有华夏、嘉实、博时、鹏华、华安和富国6家基金公司的基金产品创出历史新高，占到了老10家的60％。
根据统计，华夏基金旗下有6只基金创出新高，嘉实基金旗下有5只基金创出新高，博时基金、南方基金、鹏华基金各占1只。其中，华夏基金无疑成为新高基金中占比最多的基金公司。
当然有好自然有坏，虽然基金表现参差不齐，但是基本上都跑赢了上证指数，三年来，没有跑赢上证指数的基金仅有3只，分别是大摩基础行业混合、宝盈泛沿海（爱基，净值，资讯）、华泰柏瑞红利ETF。在基金中，没有能力与大盘决一雌雄的是那些被动管理的指数基金。在近三年的业绩涨幅排名表中，指数基金大部分排在倒数后20名，有11只为指数基金，如长盛中证100、华安上证180ETF（爱基，净值，资讯）、融通巨潮、易方达上证50、华夏上证50ETF（爱基，净值，资讯）和华泰柏瑞红利ETF。
逾越6124点的31只基金：
华夏大盘、金鹰中小盘、嘉实理财、中银中国（LOF）、泰达宏利风险预算（爱基，净值，资讯）、兴业可转债（爱基，净值，资讯）、富国天惠成长（LOF）、华夏红利（爱基，净值，资讯）、嘉实服务增值（爱基，净值，资讯）、华安宝利、博时平衡、鹏华行业成长（爱基，净值，资讯）、华夏回报（爱基，净值，资讯）、嘉实主题精选（爱基，净值，资讯）、摩根士丹利华鑫资源优选（LOF）、嘉实策略增长（爱基，净值，资讯）、基金银丰（爱基，净值，资讯）、华夏复兴、泰达宏利成长（爱基，净值，资讯）、华夏中小板股票ETF、基金安顺（爱基，净值，资讯）、基金兴华（爱基，净值，资讯）、华夏优势、基金丰和（爱基，净值，资讯）、基金通乾（爱基，净值，资讯）、泰达宏利周期（爱基，净值，资讯）、银华富裕主题（爱基，净值，资讯）、华宝兴业宝康消费、兴业全球视野（爱基，净值，资讯）、长城久富成长（LOF）、基金汉盛（爱基，净值，资讯）。
专家分析
好基金的三个秘诀
这些穿越6124点的基金到底有什么秘诀，好买基金的分析师曾令华分析认为不外乎有三点：
1.基金产品成立时间较长。这31只基金的成立日期大部分都集中在2002年至2006年之间，当时这些基金都经受住了998点的考验。也都分享到2006年到2007年这波超级大牛市。
从数据来看，该批基金最早成立的可以追溯到1998年，为华夏基金旗下的基金兴华，从1998年5月8日成立日算起，该基金的涨幅已经超过2000％。更为难能可贵的是长城基金旗下的长城久富核心成长是2007年初成立的，至今也跨越6124的高点，目前复权后的净值达到5.41元。
2007年大牛市成立的有2家，并且这些基金中绝大多数都获得了晨星三年评级的五星评级。
业内专业人士分析认为，对基金的真正考验是熊市，能在熊市里表现较好的基金，必定在投资策略、风险控制等方面具有独到之处。
2.基金规模控制较好。从前几名新高基金来看，基金规模也是影响业绩的一个重要因素。最新数据统计，封闭期的华夏大盘基金的最新规模在6.32亿份，泰达宏利成长基金的规模在13.87亿份，金鹰中小盘基金的规模在13.87亿份，嘉实增长基金的最新规模在10.25亿份，华夏中小板ETF基金的规模在13.3亿份。可见这些基金的规模都在10亿份左右。华夏复兴的规模相对较大，超过50亿，不过和现在动辄百亿的基金相比，当然还算小儿科。
3.当然是基金公司要有强大的投研能力，以华夏和嘉实为例，这两家基金公司穿越6124点的基金最多，其规模也位居行业冠亚军。公司人员也相对稳定，流动比例均在行业平均水平之下。
相关文章：
上一篇文章： 着眼布局来年市场 债基岁末“扎堆”分红(图)
下一篇文章： 债券基金年内平均收益超8% 成为明星投资产品

description.hltext_display: Kamionba rohant egy busz, nyolc halott Szibériában
description.content:
FMH - Nyolc ember vesztette életét, kilenc pedig súlyosan megsérült egy közlekedési balesetben kedden este Nyugat-Szibériában, Krasznojarszk térségében.
2010. december. 22. szerda | Szerző: MTI
TETSZETT A CIKK?
Ossza meg az alábbi közösségi oldalakon is:
iwiw Delicious Digg Facebook GReader URLGuru StumbleUpon Tumblr Twitter
Többre kíváncsi? Iratkozzon fel a hírlevelünkre, RSS-feedünkre!
nyomtatás | Küldés e-mailben | A+ | A- | Megosztom szóljon hozzá A címzett e-mail címe:
Az Ön e-mail címe:
Üzenet
(Opcionális)
Másolat Önnek
A közszolgálati televízió tájékoztatása szerint egy autóbusz és egy kamion frontálisan ütközött a Krasznojarszkot Novoszibirszkkel összekötő főúton. A busz sofőrje elvesztette uralmát a járműve felett, és belerohant a szemközt érkező kamionba.
A vizsgálatok eddigi adatai szerint a balesetet az autóbuszban műszaki hibája okozta, ami a rettenetes hideg miatt keletkezett. A térségben szó szerint szibériai hideg uralkodik, a hőmérséklet mínusz 50 Celsius-fokra süllyedt kedden éjjel.
Oroszországban évente 30 ezer ember életét követelik közlekedési balesetek.
Címkék: baleset, halálos baleset, szibéria

description.hltext_display: Early Winter Storms in Europe and U.S. Disrupt December Travel,...
description.content:
Dubliners Walked on Train Tracks as Snowstorms Disrupted Irish Rail Service
Travelers must purchase insurance before a storm is identified on the weather map.
E. Hartford, CT (Vocus/PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Early winter weather has wreaked havoc twice in December on airports in Europe and parts of the upper Midwestern U.S. Northern European airports and railways were disrupted during weekends starting Dec. 3 and Dec. 18, and were struggling to recover full service before Christmas. Minnesota and Wisconsin were hardest hit on the Dec. 11 weekend, and again on Dec. 19 and 20. Now storms are flooding southern California with heavy rain and deep snow only days before Christmas.
Travel Insured International® reminds travelers that storms in progress are no longer unforeseen and cannot be covered by new purchases of Trip Cancellation, Trip Interruption or Trip Delay coverage. But travel insurance is highly recommended to protect against future winter storms expected to be arriving soon. While Santa Claus faces few delays thanks to priority air traffic control clearance and his unique flight navigation system, commercial flights and the winter travelers who fly them are not so lucky.
Travelers must purchase their travel insurance before a snowstorm is identified on the weather map for their trip to be protected against disruptions resulting from that approaching storm. Travel Insured identifies insurance coverage as taking effect “if you are prevented from taking or continuing your trip due to specified unforeseen events." "Unforeseen" means not anticipated or expected and occurring after the effective date of the plan.
Coverage for Winter Storms
All of Travel Insured International®’s plans in the Worldwide Trip Protector line, as well as its Airline Ticket Protector plan, provide Trip Cancellation coverage up to the prepaid cost of the trip when weather causes complete cessation of the insured traveler’s common carrier service for 24 or more consecutive hours. Trip Interruption coverage for the same 24-hour common carrier disruption due to weather can be up to 100% or 150% of the trip cost depending upon the selected Travel Insured plan.
An insured, however, can purchase a Cancel for Any Reason option when buying a Worldwide Trip Protector or Trip Protector Gold plan allowing them to cancel up to 48 hours prior to departure for any reason with coverage up to 75% of prepaid, non-refundable trip cost.
All of the same plans provide Trip Delay coverage when the common carrier is delayed, including for weather, for a minimum of either six or 12 hours depending upon the specific plan purchased. Unforeseen expense reimbursement of up to $100 or $200 per day, depending upon the selected plan, can help pay accommodations, meals and added transportation costs due to the covered trip delay.
Several Travel Insured plans, including Worldwide Trip Protector, Trip Protector Gold and Airline Ticket Protector, provide Missed Connection coverage when a common carrier is delayed, including for weather, for three or more hours, and the Trip Protector Lite Expanded plan provides the Missed Connection coverage for a delay of six or more hours.
About Travel Insured International®
Travel Insured International®, based in E. Hartford, CT, was founded in 1994 by the foresight of insurance industry executive Peter Gehris when he acquired the travel protection division of the Travelers Insurance Company. Coverage is underwritten by Arch Insurance Company (a Missouri corporation, NAIC #11150) with executive offices located in Jersey City, NJ. Arch Insurance is rated A (“Excellent”) for financial strength by the insurance rating service A.M. Best. Not all insurance products or coverage is available in all jurisdictions. Coverage is subject to actual policy language
Travel Insured International®

description.hltext_display: Житель Лянкяранского района ранил односельчанина
description.content:
БАКУ, 22 дек – 1NEWS.AZ
Сотрудники Лянкяранского РОП на основании поступившей информации арестовали жителя села Шихакаран Кязыма Гусейнова.
Об этом 1news.az сообщили в МВД.
Следствием установлено, что примерно в 21 час на территории села Кязым Гусейнов нанес ножевые ранения соседу Илдырыму Гусейнову, вследствие чего последний с колото-резаными ранами был доставлен в Центральную районную больницу. Жизнь потерпевшего врачам удалось спасти.
Инцидент между соседями произошел на почве разделения земельного
участка.
По факту в Следственном отделе РОП возбуждено уголовное дело.
Н.С.

description.hltext_display: Los detenidos por delitos de seguridad vial rozan los 350 en 2010, un 16% menos
description.content:
Desde 2008, 905 detenidos. Desde 2008, poco después de la reforma del código penal, en las carreteras de la provincia se han registrado 905 detenidos por 911 delitos de alcoholemia, velocidad o conducir sin carné.
M. Espeso
Cierto es que el año no ha acabado todavía y que precisamente estas fechas, de comidas y cenas de trabajo, amigos o familia, son propensas a que abunde el alcohol, y con él el peligroso tándem que se forma con la conducción, pero el caso es que de momento el año 2010 da sus últimos coletazos manteniendo la tendencia a la baja en detenidos por delitos contra la seguridad vial que se registraba en 2009 respecto a 2008, el primer año tras la reforma del código penal que tipificó que era delito conducir sobrepasando ciertos límites de velocidad y alcohol o hacerlo sin carné (desde el mayo siguiente). A falta de cerrar diciembre, entre las carreteras de la provincia y las calles de la capital abulense se llevan contabilizados 346 detenidos, lo que supone un 16,6% menos de los registrados en todo el 2009, un total de 415.
Según los datos facilitados por la Subdelegación del Gobierno en Ávila, la Guardia Civil de Tráfico y la Policía Nacional acumulan en este 2010 256 detenidos como presuntos autores de 275 delitos contra la seguridad vial, entre la velocidad -superar en 60 kilómetros por hora a la velocidad permitida en cada vía-, el alcohol -una tasa superior a 0,60 miligramos por litro de aire espirado o 1,2 gramos por litro de sangre-, o conducir sin carné, bien por no haber obtenido nunca el permiso o por tenerlo retirado. Son un 15% menos de detenidos que en el año 2009, cuando se registraron 302 detenidos por 323 delitos. En ese año también hubo descenso respecto a 2008, el primer año del cambio y el que, a juzgar por los números, 347 detenidos y 313 delitos, debió pillar por sorpresa, entre comillas, a más conductores de los deseados.
En la capital las cifras son más bajas, pero también preocupantes. Según los datos facilitados por la Policía Local a través del Ayuntamiento desde enero de 2009, cuando se asumieron labores de Policía Judicial en materia de seguridad vial, se registran más de 200 detenidos por estos delitos, 113 en 2009 y 90 en 2010 (hasta el 16 de diciembre). En la mayoría de los casos el alcohol está presente. En 2010, por ejemplo, de los 90 conductores puestos a disposición judicial 75 lo fueron por conducir por una tasa superior a 0,6, de los que 22 superaron una tasa de 0,8, 9 dieron más de 1 y 3 superaron los 1,2 miligramos por litro de aire espirado. Además, diez conductores se negaron a someterse a la prueba. En la mayoría de los casos, en 35, la detención se produjo tras detectarse una infracción, mientras que 25 se localizaron tras un accidente y 15, por un control. A todo esto se suman los 15 detenidos por conducir sin carné, 11 de ellos ‘pillados’ en un control.

description.hltext_display: 午讯：两市封基小幅走低 未能延续涨势
description.content:
金融界网站12月22日讯 沪深两市封基今日没能延续昨日上涨趋势，早盘开始横盘调整，双双小幅下跌。截至午盘，沪基指报4669.80点，下跌1.33点，跌幅0.03%；深基指报5684.32点，下跌1.70点，跌幅0.03%。
两市封基共有16只上涨，5只持平，其余全部下跌。其中合润B上涨1.12%，涨幅最大，申万进取上涨0.83%，合润A上涨0.76%；双禧B下跌0.66%，领跌两市封基，汇利B下跌0.46%，基金鸿阳（爱基,净值,资讯）下跌0.44%，汇利A下跌0.42%。
ETF今日早盘各有涨跌，8只上涨，7只下跌。其中小康ETF（爱基,净值,资讯）上涨0.68%，深成ETF上涨0.54%，中盘ETF上涨0.46%；中小板下跌0.51，%，跌幅最大，超大ETF下跌0.48%，责任ETF下跌0.21%。
LOF场内交易方面今日早盘14只上涨，5只持平，34只下跌。其中长信100上涨2.24%，涨幅最大，鹏华治理上涨0.86%，万家公用上涨0.62%，长盛300上涨0.55%；鹏华创新下跌1.80%，跌幅最大，华夏行业下跌1.58%，长城久富下跌1.33%。

description.hltext_display: 新疆实施免费师范生改革试点 解决双语师资短缺
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 教育部今日在其官方网站公布了新疆维吾尔自治区实施师范生免费教育改革试点实施方案。方案指出，从根本上解决新疆维吾尔自治区农村中小学和学前“双语”师资短缺问题，大力提高农村中小学“双语”教学质量，吸引和鼓励更多优秀青年报考师范专业。
新疆维吾尔自治区实施师范生免费教育改革试点的总体目标是：落实教育优先发展的战略地位，从根本上解决新疆维吾尔自治区农村中小学和学前“双语”师资短缺问题，大力提高农村中小学“双语”教学质量，吸引和鼓励更多优秀青年报考师范专业，促进高等教育入学机会公平，促进基础教育健康发展。
该试点的阶段目标为：2010年至2013年，每年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生；2011年-2012年，对2008-2009年招收的已在校的师范生，纳入非定向就业免费师范生管理之中。
为落实该试点方案，新疆维吾尔自治区先期已采取一系列改革措施。从2007年起，自治区在“定向汉语师资班”和“汉语师资定向就业计划”的基础上，启动实施南疆四地州乡镇中小学“"双语"教师特培计划”， 2009年特培计划在数量上增加至1100名，2010年自治区六所师范类院校承担6000名本、专科层次免费师范生培养任务，1100名自治区农村“双语”教师特培计划特培生纳入定向就业的免费师范生。免费师范生招生计划列入自治区本、专科零批次录取。
为顺利推进该项改革试点，新疆维吾尔自治区将出台一系列配套政策：免费师范生招生计划面向全区考生，定向就业的免费师范生计划(农村“双语”教师特培计划)优先招收定向就业地(州、市)的生源，优先招收“双语”教学重点推进地区的生源，以招收汉语言、民考汉和“双语”班学生为主。自治区设立免费师范生计划专项资金，全额承担免费师范生在校期间的学费、教材费、住宿费和实习支教等相关费用。
该试点方案的有效实施，需要充分的保障条件：其一，组织保障。在自治区人民政府的领导下,成立自治区免费师范生工作领导小组，履行职责，加强协调，确保培养计划顺利实施；其二，经费保障。自治区财政按照各年度各专业招生人数，按学制、培养层次分年度向承担培养任务的院校拨付经费。
该试点方案的进度安排如下：2010年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生；2011年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生，将2008年招收的已在校的师范生，纳入非定向就业免费师范生管理之中；2012年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生，将2009年招收的已在校的师范生，纳入非定向就业免费师范生管理之中；2013年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生。
免费师范生招生计划基本覆盖了六所承担师范类专业招生的院校，但也有院校未能完全覆盖师范类专业，造成了学校的师范类专业中存在免费与非免费、语种之间存在不均衡的现象。同时，由于定向就业的免费师范生计划(农村“双语”教师特培计划)与非定向就业的免费师范生招生计划优惠政策基本相同，也造成了定向就业的免费师范生招生计划的完成率可能会降低。针对以上问题，要求学校做好免费师范生招生计划的政策宣传工作，做好对学生的解释工作，同时根据学校的实际情况，做好学校的专业以及语种的调整工作。

description.hltext_display: « Ministerie mag SAP voortrekken in aanbesteding
description.content:
Oracle heeft een rechtszaak verloren waarin het protesteerde tegen de voorkeur voor SAP als leverancier van een financieel systeem voor enkele ministeries. De rechter vond de aanbesteding rechtmatig.
« Europa laat open standaarden definitief vallen
De definitieve versie van het nieuwe Europese actieplan voor interoperabiliteit is sterk verwaterd. Open standaarden en open source zijn niet meer nodig, laat staan noodzakelijk.
« Tech in 2010: Topcitaten (video)
In 2010 hebben de top-ceo's van de techwereld weer de nodige dingen verkondigd. Wij zetten de meest gedenkwaardige citaten op een rij.
« Chinezen willen hegemonie Windows doorbreken
Twee Chinese OS-makers slaan de handen ineen om een nieuw besturingssysteem op basis van FreeBSD te maken. Dit besturingssysteem zou een binnenlands alternatief voor Windows moeten worden.
« Malafide linkkrimper dubbelt als DDoS-tool
D0z.me verkort url’s, net als bijvoorbeeld Bit.ly. Maar diegene die vervolgens op de verkorte link klikt, doet ongemerkt mee aan de DDoS-aanval. De site dient als waarschuwing.
« Firefox-plugins vreten geheugen
Veel plugins van Firefox leggen een flink beslag op het geheugen van een computer. Hierdoor wordt de browser of de hele pc een stuk langzamer.
« Waarom 'Indiërs' steeds vaker werkgever worden
Al jaren voeren Indiase bedrijven alle lijsten aan als het gaat om het ontvangen van visa voor werknemers. Toch werken er ook steeds meer 'Westerse' werknemers bij deze bedrijven.
« Microsoft accepteert illegale Office-installaties
Microsoft heeft zijn controletool voor illegale Office-installaties met stille trom afgevoerd. De Office Genuine Advantage geldt niet meer voor versies XP, 2003 en 2007.
« Firefox krijgt ‘volg-me-niet’ knop
Webbrowser Firefox krijgt vanaf versie 4.0 een knop waarmee gebruikers tracking door bijvoorbeeld advertentiebedrijven uit kunnen zetten. Websurfers zijn zo niet meer te volgen op internet.
« Jongeren zweren bij Samsung en BlackBerry
Nokia is in Nederland het merk voor oudere mobiele telefoongebruikers, terwijl de jongere generatie zweert bij Samsung en BlackBerry. iPhone-liefhebbers geven het meeste geld uit.
« 12 miljoen boete voor softwarediefstal door EC
De EC moet 12 miljoen euro betalen aan softwarebedrijf Systran. De Commissie heeft auteursrechten geschonden op vertaalsoftware.
« Intel begint inhaalrace in tabletmarkt
Intel geeft toe ver achter te lopen op de markt voor tablet-pc's, maar begint nu aan een inhaalrace. De chipmaker zegt dat er 35 nieuwe tablets met zijn Atom-processor uitkomen.
« EC ontkent voorkeur voor gesloten software
De Europese Commissie wijst beschuldigingen van de hand dat zij belastinggeld verkwist aan dure gesloten software, terwijl hardop juist open source wordt gepromoot.
« Antivirus belast XP zwaarder dan Windows 7
Antivirussoftware weegt op Windows XP zwaarder dan op Windows 7, blijkt uit tests van het onafhankelijke AV-Comparatives.org. De systeembelasting verschilt ook sterk per pakket.
« Computerkraak kost Nederlandse bank 5,6 miljoen - update
ABN Amro is voor 5,6 miljoen euro getild door Nederlanders die geld wisten weg te sluizen via het systeem van de bank zelf. De buit is grotendeels spoorloos.
« Nederlandse proef zorgt voor goedkoper bellen
De Amsterdam Internet Exchange start een proef met IPX. Met die dienst kunnen mobiele operators direct verbinding maken met elkaar. Mobiele telefonie kan daardoor uiteindelijk goedkoper worden.
« Torrentsites protesteren, halen zichzelf offline
Een groep filesharingsites heeft uit eigen beweging besloten hun sites op zwart te zetten. Dit uit protest tegen de Spaanse regering die een einde wil maken aan de websites.
« Omkoopaffaire HP raakt ook Nederland - UPDATE
Justitie onderzoekt of HP Nederland illegale kortingen heeft gegeven aan eindklanten of wederverkopers. Dit onderzoek volgt uit eerder ontdekte omkooppraktijken door HP in Duitsland en Rusland.
« Microsoft trekt brakke Outlook-patch weer in
Een patch voor Outlook 2007 is enkele dagen na het uitbrengen weer ingetrokken. De fix bleek erger dan de kwaal.
« Google Nexus S binnen dag gekraakt
Googles nieuwste telefoon, de Nexus S, is op de dag van lancering door een ontwikkelaar gehackt. Het is daardoor bijvoorbeeld mogelijk om apps te installeren die meer rechten dan normaal nodig hebben.

description.hltext_display: Stíluslecke karácsonyra
description.content:
Fémesen csillogó vagy flitteres? Jöhet! Zöld vagy piros? Felejtős! Barokk falikárpitokat idéző minta? Naná! Tükörbársonyba borulni? Az már tavaly lejárt! A gombhoz a kabátot elvén először beleszerettünk hat ragyogó körömlakkba (ezek a heti kedvenceink), majd hozzájuk passzintottunk ugyanennyi ruhát, végül az egészet további néhány ünnepi trendtippel tálaljuk. Alant a tuti recept hozzávalói ahhoz, hogy ragyogj a fa mellett.
1. A fémes fényű darabok és a flitterek alapnak számítanak az idén, ezért nem kell feltétlenül a fekete után nyúlnod, ha alkalmi ruhát nézel magadnak. Választhatsz az arany többféle árnyalatából, ezüstből vagy ütősebből, de ne ess túlzásokba. Ilyenkor már fölösleges még több hangsúlyos és csillogó kiegészítő, de az erős smink is túlzás. Ezek a karácsonyfa nagy napjai, fölösleges túltrillázni.
Balról jobbra: ruha -Mango, körömlakk - Dior, ruha - H&M, körömlakk - Dior
2. Óvodás tipp, de soha ne válassz túl rövid ruhát vagy szoknyát – még akkor sem, ha amúgy ragyogó lábaid vannak. Otthon mindenki lazábban mozog, és megfeledkezik arról, hogy éppen glancban van. Mentsd meg magad a kellemetlen beszólásoktól és az ennél is cikibb családi fotóktól az öt centivel hosszabb szoknyarésszel.
Balról jobbra: ruha - Mango, körömlakk - OPI Burlesque kollekció, ruha - Pimkie, körömlakk - Lancome
3. Szintén elég cikifaktort rejt magában, ha nem figyelsz oda eléggé a harisnya vagy zokni választáskor. Bár a kilógó lábujj látványa családban marad, olyan ez, mint valami születési rendellenesség. Mindenki tudja, hogy nem illik róla beszélni, de nem tudják levenni a szemüket róla. Ha eddig nem tudatosítottad volna, most tedd meg: pótzokni, pótharisnya mindig legyen nálad!
Balról jobbra: ruha - H&M, körömlakk - MAC, ruha - Esprit, körömlakk - Givenchy
4. Tiltott szín a vörös és a zöld. Annyira elcsépelt és szájbarágós ez a klasszikus karácsonyi dekorációt idéző színösszeállítás, de külön-külön sem feltétlenül a legjobb választás, főleg, ha tetőtől talpig ebbe öltözünk. Sokkal jobb megoldás a finom jelzés egy-egy zölden csillogó bross, piros öv vagy harisnya.

description.hltext_display: Mireia Belmonte: "Mis regalos de Papá Noel son mis cuatro medallas"
description.author: EUGENIO G. DELGADO
description.content:
EUGENIO G. DELGADO La catalana fue nombrada Mejor Nadadora de los Mundiales de Dubái. Allí, se consagró colgándose 3 medallas de oro y una de plata.
La nadadora Mireia Belmonte volvió a los entrenamientos ayer por la tarde, después de recibir el último homenaje en el CAR de San Cugat, donde se entrena y vive desde los 12 años. No es para menos, pues la catalana se convirtió con 20 en la reina de los recientes Mundiales de piscina corta (25 metros) de Dubái, donde se colgó tres medallas de oro (200 y 400 estilos y 200 mariposa) y una de plata (800 libres) .
¿Cansada de tanto revuelo?
La verdad es que me apetece volver a mi rutina, pero me alegro de que los medios habléis de la natación. ¡Ya tocaba!
¿Pensabas que ibas a ganar tantas medallas?
Aunque no esperaba un resultado tan bueno, me he encontrado muy bien durante todos los Mundiales.
¿Cómo se ganan dos oros en 44 minutos 200 mariposa y 400 estilos?
No me dio tiempo ni a recuperarme. Fue todo muy seguido. Simplemente, salió bien.
¿Qué te ha echo más ilusión: las medallas o ser nombrada mejor nadadora de los Mundiales?
No puedo elegir. Las medallas fueron una pasada y el honor de ser la mejor nadadora, la guinda.
¿Tu evolución como nadadora ha sido más física o mental?
Por ahora, física. Entreno más fuera del agua: cinco horas dentro y una en seco.
El director técnico de la Federación, Luis Villanueva, dice que has madurado.
Sí, también creo que soy más estable mentalmente en competición, con menos altibajos.
Aunque el próximo verano se disputan los Mundiales de Piscina Larga (50 metros) en Shanghái, ¿tu objetivo final son los Juegos de Londres 2012?
Llegaré con una edad muy buena, pero no quiero presionarme antes de tiempo.
Con todas las horas que pasas en el agua, ¿cómo te cuidas el pelo y la piel?
No demasiado. Para el cuerpo, me hecho crema todos los días, y para el pelo, mascarilla un par de veces a la semana.
¿Cómo llevas ser deportista de élite y estudiar una carrera?
Este año he empezado Admón. y Dirección de Empresas. Le dedico lo que puedo. Voy por la mañana tres horas a clase y estudio una por la tarde.
¿Vas a tener vacaciones?
Me quedan tres o cuatro _días de entrenamiento y la última semana descansaré.
Tendrás que cuidarte de los excesos en estas fechas, ¿no?
No hago una dieta estricta, pero no puedo llegar con 4 o 5 kilos de más. ¡No me podría ni mover en el agua!
¿Eres más de Papá Noel o de los Reyes Magos?
De Papá Noel. Los Reyes no me conocen porque siempre estoy concentrada en esas fechas.
¿Qué le vas a pedir?
Nada, se ha portado muy bien conmigo. Las medallas han sido mis regalos de Papá Noel.

description.hltext_display: Dizájner Dórák a Rádayban
description.content:
A december emlékezetes hónap lehet Abodi Dóra és Mojzes Dóra számára, akárcsak a rajongóknak, ugyanis megnyitották közös showroomjukat. A Showroom R9 december 20-a óta már látogatható is. A név magyarázata egyszerű: a Ráday utca 9. szám alatt lelhetőek fel a két Dóra kollekciói.
Az vadiúj showroomban elsősorban a 2010/11-es őszi/téli kollekciók darabjai kaphatóak, de elérhetőek régebbi darabok is a lányok kreációi közül. Különlegessége az üzletnek, hogy nemcsak a divatfüggőket várják: kéthavonta cserélődő fotókiállításaikkal a kultúrát kedvelőket is ki szeretnék elégíteni, azaz galériaként is funkcionálnának a jövőben. Az első fotóművész a FVF zsűritagja, Andreas Waldschuetz, a kiállítás alapja pedig Sandpeople című sorozata lesz, amit meg lehet tekinteni már ezen a héten is.
Természetesen elsődleges szerepe az R9-nek, hogy a magyar divatszíntér két kiválóságának a ruháit megvásárolhassuk. Az azonos név persze két nagyban különböző karaktert takar, mégis jól megférnek egymás mellett kreációik. Mojzes Dóra a MOME és a London College of Fashion hallgatója volt, Abodi Dóra pedig a MODART iskolájában tanult. Mojzes Dóra úgy fogalmazott, hogy ő a darkos vonal, kolléganője pedig egy meseszerűbb világot teremt ruháival. A provokatív, néhol Lady Gaga jelmezeire emlékeztető „Jeanne D'Arc” és a „Bowie Utópia” álomszerű darabjai mellett rengeteg kiegészítőt, táskát, kitűzőt – többek között Mojzes Dóra jól ismert „bogaras” brossait – és kulcstartót is rejt a bolt, és már decemberben különleges vásárokkal várnak mindenkit a lányok. Januártól pedig még több eseményt terveznek, de ezekről még nem rántották le a leplet. A hivatalos megnyitó is várat még magára, de januárban arra is sort kerítenek.
Látogassatok el és csodáljátok meg Mojzes Dóra és Abodi Dóra ruhakölteményeit, más kreálmányait és a kiállítást is. A széles választéknak köszönhetően nem kizárt, hogy a nézelődők még akár karácsonyfa alá való cuccokra is könnyen ráakadhatnak. A ShowroomR9 11-től este 7-ig nyitva tart.

description.hltext_display: Afghan official rebukes NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
KABUL, Afghanistan -- An Afghan provincial governor says NATO needs to exert greater caution in its operations following the death of five civilians during a battle with insurgents.
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.

description.hltext_display: Sania confident of doing well in Australian Open
description.content: Sania Mirza, who recently won an ITF tournament in Dubai to end the year on a high, on Tuesday expressed confidence of a good show in the Australian Open early next year. The 24-year-old, who is now ranked 164th in the world, beat Bojana Jovanovski of Serbia 4-6, 6-3, 6-0 in the USD 75,000 Al Habtoor Tennis Challenge final on Sunday in Dubai. "It's really satisfying. It's like a dream come true considering the way I started the season with an injury. In the last six months I have been playing consistent tennis. And going into a Grand Slam with a title and beating a top 40 player gives you a lot of confidence," Sania said. She denied that it was a conscious attempt to play ITF tournament in between WTA tournaments. "Now ITF are not considered lower tournaments. Some of the events have higher ranked players than WTA tournaments. Recently I played a WTA tournament in which the top seed was ranked 75. But in Dubai the top seed was ranked 40th," said Sania. "It was a good competition. And since I had missed 6-7 tournaments because of Commonwealth Games and Asian Games, so I needed to play," she added. Asked if she can now break into top 50 considering her current form, Sania insisted, "Staying healthy is my priority."

description.hltext_display: Белорусские оппозиционеры провели под стенами СИЗО
description.content:
Акцію протесту під стінами мінської в’язниці влаштувала опозиція Білорусі. Близько ста людей зібралися біля слідчого ізолятора, щоб підтримати заарештованих під час масових акцій протесту проти результатів президентських виборів. За ґратами перебувають близько шестисот людей.

description.hltext_display: ROK begins 3-day sea drills
description.content:
SEOUL, Dec. 22 (Xinhua) -- South Korea will hold three-day drills in waters off the east coast of the Korean Peninsula starting Wednesday, two days after it conducted a live-fire exercise near a tense border, the defense ministry said.
The exercise, to be held about 100 kilometers south of the eastern sea border with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea( DPRK) from Wednesday through Friday, will involve navy vessels and Lynx anti-submarine helicopters, according to local reports.
In a similar but separate move, South Korea also plans to stage on Thursday a major drill involving artillery guns and fighter jets at a firing range in Pocheon, 40 kilometers northeast of Seoul and 25 kilometers south of the heavily fortified land border between the two Koreas.
The exercise, aimed at testing fire power, will be a joint one between the army and the air force.
What officials say are part of routine exercises comes after South Korea staged firing exercise Monday from the western border island of Yeonpyeong, shelled last month by the DPRK.
The DPRK repeatedly vowed retaliation against the drill but did not immediately respond to what it called a "reckless" provocation.
Though saved from an immediate clash, South Korean forces remain vigilant against retaliation from the DPRK, deploying an Aegis destroyer and putting fighter jets on standby.
There are also concerns that a Christmas tree on the top of the Aegibong hill in the South Korean city of Gimpo, lit up a day ago, might be a potential target of the DPRK's strike for being a perceived anti-Pyongyang propaganda tool.
The annual ritual of lighting up the symbolic tree was suspended in 2003 as the two Koreas, amid a conciliatory mood, agreed to stop propaganda war.
Related:
SEOUL, Dec. 22 (Xinhua) -- South Korea plans to hold a major drill Thursday involving artillery guns and fighter jets following its live-fire drill near a disputed sea border earlier this week, the Army said Wednesday.
The ground and air firing drill, which officials said is part of routine exercises, will take place at a firing range in Pocheon, 40 kilometers northeast of Seoul and 25 kilometers south of the heavily fortified land border between the two Koreas. Full story
BEIJING, Dec. 21 (Xinhua) -- China Tuesday urged all parties involved in the Korean Peninsula situation to remain calm and exercise restraint to avoid future unfortunate incidents.
"The Korean Peninsula situation is still complicated and sensitive," Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Jiang Yu said at a regular news briefing as she called on all parties to have a responsible attitude. Full story
MOSCOW, Dec. 21 (Xinhua) -- Diplomats of Russia and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) met here Tuesday and discussed possible measures to stabilize the situation on Korean peninsula.
During the meeting with the DPRK ambassador to Moscow Kim Yong Jae, Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Alexei Borodavkin stressed that Russia is seeking "solutions to the issues between Pyongyang and Seoul by political-diplomatic ways," according to a statement of the Russian Foreign Ministry. Full story

description.hltext_display: 广西将建立教师资格考试机制 严把教师入口关
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 教育部今日在其官方网站公布了广西壮族自治区关于开展教师资格考试改革和注册制度改革试点实施方案。方案指出，将建立教师资格考试机制和实施教师资格注册制度，严把教师入口关，逐步形成较完善的教师资格认定制度,建立能进能出的教师队伍管理机制。
广西壮族自治区开展教师资格考试改革和注册制度改革试点的总体目标是：建立科学有效的教师资格考试机制，严把教师入口关，逐步形成较完善的教师资格认定制度,建立能进能出的教师队伍管理机制，提高教师队伍整体素质。
该试点的阶段目标是：
2.到2015年，形成较科学的中小学教师资格培训、考试、认定的新机制，形成较完善教师资格定期注册办法，初步建立教师退出机制。
为实施该试点方案，广西壮族自治区拟定采取以下改革措施：
1.严格教师资格考试
(1)教师资格考试纳入全国统考。非师范类人员从2011年起，师范类人员从2015年起申请中小学、幼儿园教师资格要参加全国统一考试，申请人参加幼儿园和小学教师资格考试，应当具备大学专科毕业及其以上学历，申请参加初中、高中和中职教师资格考试应当具备大学本科毕业及以上学历。考试内容主要分为综合笔试和教育教学实践能力测试两部分。
(2)实行资格考试(综合笔试)与资格认定相分离，考试委托相应的专业机构实施。综合笔试命题工作由教育部考试中心负责，组织考试、评分工作由自治区招生考试院负责。中等职业学校技能考试(教育教学实践能力测试)由自治区教育行政部门或指定专门机构负责，幼儿园、小学、初中、高中技能考试由市教育行政门或指定专门机构负责。师范类应届生技能考试由培养院校负责。
2.加强教师资格培训
非师范类人员申请中小学、幼儿园教师资格，必须参加教师教育基地集中培训一年。以教育部公布的考试大纲为培训的基本内容，系统学习教育教学理论、教学基本功训练、教育教学实习等，经考核合格后参加全国统一考试。考试时间调整为一年一次，上半年3月为申请教师资格笔试时间，4月为教育教学实践能力测试时间，笔试合格才能参加教育教学实践能力测试。
师范类学生所在院校根据教学进度安排教师资格课程，要求师范生参加全国统一考试(综合笔试)。综合笔试与教学技能考核合格且达到有关教学实习要求的师范生，给予认定相应的教师资格。
3.实施教师资格注册制度
教师资格定期注册是对取得教师资格者的定期核查。实施教师资格定期注册工作目的之一是了解本辖区教师资格持证人员情况，为师资培养规划和教师录用提供依据；目的之二是要打破教师资格终身制，清退不符合教师任职资格条件的人员，建立教师长效激励机制，强化教师的知识更新和能力提高，促进教师专业发展和终身学习。
教师资格注册每五年一次。从事教育工作的持证者每满五年要向教师资格注册机构提供每年继续教育学分登记情况和年度考核情况，如果继续教育达到规定的学分且年度考核合格，则给予注册。对于连续注册5次或市级以上优秀教师、优秀教育工作者或特级教师可不再要求注册，所持的教育资格证书永久有效。逾期未注册或不符合注册条件者，所持的证书自然失效。如重新获得教师资格证，必须重新参加教育教学理论培训考试和教学技能考试，合格后才给予注册。未从事教育工作的持证者每满五年，要到户籍地教育行政部门或指定机构注册一次，向注册机构以书面形式提供五年来的学习进修情况。每年11月为接受教师资格注册申请时间。
自治区教育行政部门统筹教师资格定期注册实施工作，负责监督检查；县级以上教育行政部门根据中小学校隶属关系，负责组织实施本地教师资格定期注册工作。中小学可以为本校教师集体申请定期注册。
为保障该试点方案的有效实施，广西壮族自治区拟定出台以下配套政策： 第一，出台《关于实行“中小学教师资格考试改革试点方案”实施细则》和《关于贯彻落实“中小学教师资格定期注册暂行办法”的意见》；第二，出台关于做好师范生教师资格认定工作的指导意见；第三，出台关于进一步加强师范生教育教学改革的指导意见。

description.hltext_display: Neuer Sponsor beim FC Barcelona: "An den Teufel verkauft"
description.content:
Der FC Barcelona wird in Spanien heftig kritisiert, weil er künftig für die umstrittene Qatar Foundation wirbt. Selbst Klub-Ikonen wie Johan Cruyff wenden sich frustriert ab. Sie fürchten um die Seele des Vereins.
Es gibt so einige Elemente, die den FC Barcelona von anderen Vereinen unterscheiden; komplette Bücher sind dazu geschrieben worden. Seinem mythisch überhöhten Selbstverständnis zufolge ist Barça sogar "més que un club", zu Deutsch: "Mehr als ein Klub", weil er in den Jahren der faschistischen Franco-Diktatur (1939 bis 1975) zum Hort des Widerstands wurde, zum "symbolischen, unbewaffneten Heer Kataloniens", wie es der verstorbene Schriftsteller Manuel Vázquez Montalbán formulierte.
"Wir haben uns entschlossen, nach Reisepartnern zu suchen, die den solidarischen Charakter unseres Trikots untermauern", sagt Barcelonas Präsident Sandro Rosell (re.) über den Werbedeal mit der "Qatar Foundation". (© REUTERS)
Lange Zeit kam dieses Selbstverständnis auch auf dem Trikot zum Tragen: Es war, wie es in Katalonien hieß, "unbefleckt". Frei von kommerzieller Werbung. Das Leibchen schnöde für Mammon verkaufen? So wie es Allerweltsvereine wie Bayern München, Real Madrid oder Manchester United tun? Niemals!, lautete selbst dann noch die Antwort der "socis", der Mitglieder des Klubs, als Weltfirmen mit aberwitzigen Millionensummen lockten.
Als das Präsidium das Trikot doch beflocken ließ, mit dem Kürzel des Kinderhilfswerks der Vereinten Nationen, nahmen die "socis" das gerade eben noch so hin: "UNICEF" klang politisch korrekt. Und überhaupt: Barcelona zahlte auch noch in Form von Spenden 1,5 Millionen Euro jährlich drauf.
Nun aber ist Barcelona angesichts einer Verschuldung von offiziell 430 Millionen Euro netto (600 Millionen Euro brutto) doch den Verlockungen des Geldes erlegen. 165 Millionen Euro erhält Barça dafür, dass ab 2011 und fünf Jahre lang "Qatar Foundation" auf dem Trikot prangt, der Name einer nach eigenen Angaben gemeinnützigen Stiftung des Emirats. "UNICEF" wandert auf einen kleineren Platz unter den Rückennummern.
"Wir haben uns entschlossen, nach Reisepartnern zu suchen, die den solidarischen Charakter unseres Trikots untermauern", sagte Sandro Rosell, seit Sommer Präsident Barcelonas, als er den Deal vorstellte. Mit den Petrodollars sollten "Löcher gestopft werden", man habe "einen Schritt zurück gemacht, um drei Schritte nach vorne zu tun". Doch nicht nur in Katalonien nehmen Stimmen zu, die ihm vorwerfen, dem Trikot einen allzu großen Öl-Fleck verpasst zu haben.
Denn trotz einiger Reformbemühungen entspricht die absolute Monarchie Katar den Werten von Freiheit und Toleranz, für die der FC Barcelona seit seiner Gründung im Jahr 1899 steht, eher weniger. Insbesondere in der Frage der Menschenrechte hat das von Rosell als "fortschrittlich" gerühmte Katar einigen Aufholbedarf: Hauptquelle der Rechtssprechung im Fußball-WM-Gastgeberland für 2022 ist weiterhin die Scharia, die auf dem Koran beruht und mit freiheitlich-demokratischen Grundordnungen eher wenig zu tun hat.
(Sie sind jetzt auf Seite 1 von 2) nächste Seite
In diesem Artikel:
Sie lesen jetzt "An den Teufel verkauft"

Sport RSS
FC Barcelona RSS

description.hltext_display: Snow reveals "weak link" in EU travel chain
description.content:
The severe travel disruption caused by heavy snow reveal a weak link in the European travel chain, European Commissioner for Transport Siim Kallas said on Tuesday.
Heavy snowfalls and black ice have wreaked havoc upon air, rail and road links across Europe these last few days, resulting in the canceling of numerous flights and trains in major European cities and leaving thousands of passengers to their fate. "I am extremely concerned about the level of disruption to travel across Europe caused by severe snow. It is unacceptable and should not happen again," Kallas said. Major airports in England, France, Belgium, and the Netherlands are still operating very limited services Tuesday due to the snow and freezing weather. Thousands of passengers were even forced to sleep in airports.
The commissioner pointed out the problems relating to airlines infrastructure during this severe snow wave as a "weak link" in the travel chain. "I intend to convene a meeting with airports representatives in the coming days to ask for further explanations and to take a hard look at what is necessary to make sure they would be able to operate more effectively in the similar situations in the future," the commissioner said.
Source: Xinhua

description.hltext_display: 江西2011年高考报名结束 比上年减少23035人
description.content:
中新网南昌12月22日电 (王剑 )江西省2011年普通高考网上报名工作近日顺利结束。全省共有288616名考生报名，比上年311651人减少23035人，同比减少7.39%。
中新网记者22日从江西省教育考试院了解到，该省2011年参加全国普通高考的考生为284214人，占考生总数的98.47%，比上年306032人减少21818人，同比减少7.13%；
以“三校生”(职业高中、中专、技校毕业生)身份单独报考高职类院校(以下简称“三校生”高职类)的考生4402人，占考生总数的1.53%，比上年5619人减少1217人，同比减少21.66%。
在参加全国普通高考的普通考生中，文史类考生121350人，占普通考生数的42.7%；理工类考生162864人(含报考少年班407人)，占普通考生数的57.3%。其中，兼报艺术类考生21363人(美术类专业15165人、音乐类专业5469，特殊类专业729人)，占普通考生数的7.52%；兼报体育类考生9687人，占普通考生数的3.41%。
在4402名“三校生”高职类考生中，兼报艺术类考生57人(美术类55人，音乐类2人)，占“三校生”高职类考生数的1.29%；兼报体育类考生56人，占“三校生”高职类考生数的1.27%。
江西省教育考试院提醒广大考生，对于报名信息中的错误，如通讯地址中的别字、身份证号码中个别数字、联系电话等，可于2011年4月15日前向报名所在县(区)招考办提出修改申请，由县(区)招考办集中修改。

description.hltext_display: Президент назначил главных по проведению реформ
description.content:
Президент Виктор Янукович назначил ответственных за внедрение Программы экономических реформ на 2010-2014 годы.
В частности, глава государства установил, что персональную ответственность за реализацию Программы экономических реформ 2010-2014 и национального плана действий на 2011 год несут руководители направлений реформ. Президент назначил министра энергетики и угольной промышленности Юрия Бойко ответственным за реформу нефтегазовой промышленности, угольной отрасли и электроэнергетики.
Министр иностранных дел Константин Грищенко назначен руководителем направления реформ "Международная интеграция и сотрудничество". Депутат Владислав Каськив возглавит направление реформ "Внедрение национальных проектов". Приватизацией, управлением государственной собственностью, дерегуляцией и развитием предпринимательства займется первый вице-премьер - министр экономического развития и торговли Андрей Клюев.
Вице-премьер - министр инфраструктуры Борис Колесников назначен руководителем направления реформ "Развитие транспортной инфраструктуры". Министр юстиции Александр Лавринович возглавит реформу системы органов исполнительной власти. Министр здравоохранения Илья Емец - реформу медицинского обслуживания. Министр аграрной политики и продовольствия Николай Присяжнюк займется развитием сельского хозяйства и земельной реформой, а министр образования и науки, молодежи и спорта Дмитрий Табачник - реформой системы образования.
Кроме того, замглавы Администрации президента Станислав Скубашевский будет отвечать за реформу государственной службы. Вице-премьер - министр соцполитики Сергей Тигипко должен осуществить реформы системы социальной поддержки и системы пенсионного страхования. Министр финансов Федор Ярошенко будет отвечать за реформу налоговой системы, развитие финансового сектора и стабилизацию Госбюджета.
Вице-премьер - министр регионального развития, строительства и жилищно-коммунального хозяйства Виктор Тихонов назначен руководителем направлений реформ "Региональное развитие и реформа межбюджетных отношений" и "Реформа жилищно-коммунального хозяйства". Руководителей направлений реформ Президент обязал в недельный срок создать тематические рабочие группы по осуществлению реформ, привлекая в их состав представителей Координационного центра по внедрению экономических реформ.
Кроме того, эти же руководители должны обеспечить подготовку и представление рабочими группами планов-графиков по внедрению экономических реформ и на их основе предложений к проекту Национального плана действий на 2011 год по внедрению экономических реформ и представить подготовленные предложения Кабмину.

description.hltext_display: Lufthansa: Unterstützung bestätigt - und nun?
description.content:
(www.4investors.de) - Die Lufthansa-Aktie hat jüngst im Zuge einer Konsolidierung die Unterstützung bei 16,32 Euro bestätigt. Am Montag ist das Papier von dieser Zone nach oben abgeprallt. Die Konsolidierung lief bisher von 17,93 Euro auf 16,33 Euro. Allerdings ist die Abwärtsbewegung noch nicht gedreht. Hierfür fehlt der Lufthansa-Aktie bisher ein prozyklisches Kaufsignal. Ein solches hätte das Papier mit einem Anstieg über 16,86/17,07 Euro geben können, doch an dieser Zone ist der DAX-notierte Titel gestern nach unten abgeprallt. Nach einem Tageshoch bei 16,82 Euro ist der Schlusskurs bei 16,61 Euro notiert worden. Die beiden genannten Zonen zwischen 16,32 Euro und 17,07 Euro sollten von Tradern im Auge behalten werden.
Schlusskurs letzter Handelstag – 4investors nutzt Charts von ProRealTime

description.hltext_display: 中菲貿易前10月成長逾4成 (中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者林行健馬尼拉22日專電）在中國與東南亞國家協會（ASEAN）自由貿易協定（FTA）上路之後，中國與菲律賓的經貿關係更加密切。今年前10個月，雙邊貿易總額達到227億美元，成長40.2%。
中國駐菲國大使劉建超今天在記者會上說，中國與東協FTA於1月正式啟動，雙邊將近有9成的7000項貨物享受零關稅待遇，同時服務業貿易協定與投資協定也陸續跟進。
根據中國大使館的資料，今年前10個月，中國對菲出口總額是94億美元，成長40%；中國自菲進口總額為133億美元，成長40.4%，菲國享有貿易順差。
中國現為菲國的第3大貿易夥伴。
在投資方面，今年前9個月中國對菲國投資為7300萬美元，較去年同期成長316%，成長幅度居東協地區第2高。菲國對中國投資達6300萬美元，成長177%。
劉建超表示，中國明年將啟動社會經濟方案，加強內需、投資與出口，這可為包括菲律賓在內的鄰國提供合作機會，特別是在農業、採礦業、發電業和環保等方面。991222

description.hltext_display: 重庆进入铁路建设黄金期 22日2项目竣工5项目开工
description.content:
中新网重庆12月22日电(银雪)22日，铁道部2个项目竣工和5项目开工仪式在渝举行，重庆市长黄奇帆称当地铁路建设进入黄金发展期。
今日竣工的是宜万铁路、达州至万州铁路电气化改造工程，同日开工项目为重庆至贵阳铁路(重庆段)和三江至南川铁路扩能改造工程、重庆北站改扩建工程、重庆至万州铁路、重庆西站建设工程。黄奇帆称，十一五计划期间，重庆完成铁路投资320亿元，开建了渝怀铁路等11项目，建成铁路集装箱中心站等4个项目，铁路营运里程达1342公里，铁路路网密度在西部领先。至今，高密度大规模的铁路项目工程汇集重庆，标志着重庆铁路进入黄金发展期。
据介绍，宜昌至万州铁路是我国《中长期铁路网规划》规划的“四纵四横”快速客运网中沪汉蓉快速通道的重要组成部分，横跨湖北西部、重庆东部，历时7年修建，全线运营里程377公里，为Ⅰ级电气化干线。宜昌至万州铁路通车后，12月23日至2011年元月10日，将开行5对旅客列车。从2011年元月11日起，宜昌至万州铁路将再增加9对客运列车。
达州至万州铁路电气化改造工程于2009年9月动工，主要工程为157公里既有线路电气化改造、增开10个预留车站、既有车站延长到发线有效长等工程。作为川渝地区东部通道间的重要联络线，达万铁路电气化改造峻工将对区域铁路系统配套、发挥区域路网整体能力和提高铁路运输效率和竞争力。
渝万铁路是连接重庆主城与万州的一条双线客运专线，全长246公里，投资311.5亿元，建设工期4年，预计2014年建成投入运行。渝万铁路建成后，将为旅客提供快速、安全、环保、大容量的现代轨道交通服务，解决城市群和城市密集带的交通问题，并与成渝、成绵乐客运专线等一起构成川渝地区间快速便捷的旅游通道，为川渝大旅游圈的建设和发展提供有力的支撑。
重庆至贵阳铁路(重庆段)扩能改造工程位于重庆西至綦江段，全线共设11个车站，项目建设工期为5年，设计时速200公里，规划输送能力为客车每日84对、货运每年2400万吨。渝黔铁路建成后与既有的渝黔铁路形成三线格局，与在建的兰渝铁路、贵广铁路共同构成高标准、大能力、快速度的铁路通道，是西北、西南至华南地区快速铁路通道的重要组成部分，也是沟通重庆、贵阳两市的城际铁路。
三江至南川铁路扩能改造工程、正线全长约55.7公里，同步新建的有三江至南川铁路与渝黔线货车联络线3.2公里、新万盛至万盛西站联络线3.5公里，新建渝黔线赶水站至关坝站铁路支线，长约13公里。新建南平隧道为该项目的控制性工程，全长9.8千米。三江至南川铁路扩能改造完成后，将为开发渝东南地区旅游、矿产资源，促进重庆煤化工产业发展。
同时开工建设的还有重庆北站改扩建工程和重庆西站。重庆北站改扩建工程主要包括新建北场和北站房。北场规模为19站台面21线，加上既有南场7站台面8线，共26站台面29线；北站房建筑面积8万平方米，采用旅客上进下出为主的高架候车模式。新建重庆西站位于既有襄渝线重庆东站址，规划设计31站台面37线，站房建筑面积12万平方米，采用旅客上进下出为主的高架候车模式。
黄奇帆说，重庆未来将投资铁路建设1400多亿，重点建设11条铁路、3个火车站和一个编组站，实现在建里程1860公里，营运里程超过2300公里，建成国家重要铁路枢纽之一。

description.hltext_display: Lubbock police search for three forgery suspects
description.author: Lubbock Avalanche-Journal
description.content:
Lubbock police ask for assistance in identifying three suspects who used forged checks earlier this month.
Camera surveillance captured images of the suspects who passed forged checks at around 3:15 p.m. Dec. 2 at the United Supermarket on 401 Slide Road.
The suspects are described as two Hispanic men and one Hispanic woman.
The police urge anyone with information about these suspects or this case to call Crime Line at 741-1000 or Detective Bob Escobedo at 775-2770.

description.hltext_display: K+S: Nach dem Ausbruch...
description.content:
(www.4investors.de) - Die Aktie von K+S hat zuletzt von verschiedenen Faktoren profitiert, unter anderem einer sich anbahnenden Groß-Fusion in der Düngemittelbranche in Russland, die die Kursphantasie förderte. Im Zuge der Aufwärtsbewegung, die die K+S-Aktie jüngst von 52,92 Euro auf gestern erreichte 57,00 Euro hat steigen lassen, hat das DAX-notierte Papier bei 55,62 Euro einen Widerstand in Form des bisherigen Tops überwunden. Gestern ging das Papier mit 56,65 Euro aus dem Handel. Die Gewinnmitnahmen vom Tageshoch aus gesehen sind auf ein kurzfristigen Überschießen über das obere Ende des Bollinger-Bandes zurückzuführen. Dessen Begrenzung nach oben liegt bei 56,77 Euro, die Tendenz ist leicht steigend. Die Bereiche 55,20/55,68 Euro und 52,92/53,21 Euro sind als Unterstützungen anzusehen, falls es zu einem Rückschlag beim Aktienkurs von K+S kommt.
Schlusskurs letzter Handelstag – 4investors nutzt Charts von ProRealTime

description.hltext_display: ACGG’s Raffle Rifle Is the Perfect Companion Piece for a Serious...
description.content:
One might say that the American Custom Gunmakers Guild (http://www.ACGG.org) brought out its big guns, literally and figuratively, when it put together a team to create the 26th of its annual projects designed to showcase the art of custom gunmaking.
The result is "A Hunter's .470 Double Rifle" — a firearm that would be the perfect companion piece to take on a serious safari. The gun will be raffled off to raise funds for the non-profit organization, whose goal is “Promoting the artistry of fine custom firearms.”
Ticket sales are limited to 4,000 and cost $20 each. There is no limit to the number of tickets an individual may purchase. The winner does not have to be present to win. All state and federal laws apply, and federal tax will be collected before the firearm is delivered, organizers said.
“For this particular project we envisioned this as being a working double gun, similar to something an English officer might have taken off to Africa or India a hundred and some years ago,” said Steve Nelson, the project’s chairman.
Guild members selected for the project were: Tony Fleming, Sparks, NV, who did the metalwork; Glen Morovits, Newell, SD, who did the stockwork, and Larry Peters, Odessa, WA, who did the engraving.
The team met several times face-to-face to settle on a direction for the project.
“We kind of threw around some ideas about where to go with this,” said Tony Fleming. “That was the starting place. We discussed it a little more over the phone. Then we met again the next year, and that’s when the ideas really began to coalesce and take shape.”
From the beginning, team members agreed that Project 26 would be a working double rifle, not a museum piece.
“The stock was designed around the theme of a working double rifle, so it was created to be traditional, but with hard hunting use in mind,” said Glen Morovits.
Engraver Larry Peters added that, “because of the type of rifle, it was pretty much established as a classic English scroll. We talked about doing scenes, but decided against that, because scenes don’t wear as well as scroll.”
Peters acknowledged that perhaps his biggest challenge was not the project itself, but rather having been diagnosed with cancer. With the help of surgery and medical treatment, he is now doing just fine, he said.
ACGG #26 will be on display at the 27th annual Firearms Engravers & Gunmakers Exhibition scheduled to take place Jan. 28-30, 2011, at John Ascuaga's Nugget, in Reno/Sparks, NV. The exhibition is a joint effort of the American Custom Gunmakers Guild and the Firearms Engravers Guild of America (http://www.FEGA.com).
The drawing for "A Hunter's .470 Double Rifle" will take place Saturday, June 25, 2011, at the Buffalo Bill Historical Center in Cody, Wyoming. For more information about Project #26, visit http://www.ACGG.org or call (307) 587-4297
About ACGG: The American Custom Gunmakers Guild is a non-profit organization that advances the art of custom gunmaking by increasing public awareness and appreciation for quality custom firearms and promoting custom gunmaking as an accepted art form.

description.hltext_display: Nuova era per le regole internet: l'americana Fcc vara la neutralità della rete. Ecco cosa significa
È compito della Repubblica rimuovere gli ostacoli...
description.content:
Invia un' e-mail ad un amico
A: Bcc: Il tuo indirizzo email: Messaggio:
Versione stampabile
del.icio.us
Digg this Carmine Gonnella on 22 Dicembre, 2010 08:14:00 | 6 numero letture
Dimensione caratteri
Nessuna novita' per questo articolo
È compito della Repubblica rimuovere gli ostacoli... di ordine economico e sociale, che, limitando di fatto la libertà e la uguaglianza dei cittadini, impediscono il pieno sviluppo della persona umana e l'effettiva partecipazione di tutti i lavoratori all'organizzazione politica, economica e sociale del Paese.
Cari giovani studenti ieri sera ho fatto un sogno, oggi mi trovavo ( nel sogno) ai vostri cortei, contro il ddl “Gelmini”, fotografo per caso. A mia sorpresa davanti ai cortei, non ho visto teppisti con mazze ed elmetti, ma i vostri genitori, padri, madri, nonni ed educatori. Ma la cosa che mi ha riempito il cuore di gioia, ( sempre nel sogno) che prima, ancora dei vostri genitori, padri, madri, nonni ed educatori, c’erano le forze dell’ordine, invece dei caschi ptotettivi, avevano in mano, i tanks della benzina vuota Poi mi sono svegiato e mi sono reso conto, che a Ballaro’, stava ancora parlando il ministro Alfano, che sparava mink..ate, come al solito. Adesso vi invito attentamente a leggere il lungo titolo, non e’ altro ( per chi dormisse ancora) che il secondo comma ( dopo la legge e’ uguale per tutti ) dell’articolo terzo della nostra Costituzione. Lo spauracchio di tutti i governanti e parlamentari di tutti i tempi. Io penso che se ogni Capo dello Stato, si appellasse all’ articolo terzo, rispedirebbe tutti i ddl al mittente. Mi auguro che Giorgio Napolitano, il nostro stimarissimo Presidente della Repubblica, ascolti l’appello fatto dai giovani e non firmi il ddl “Gelmini”

description.hltext_display: LA LETTERA DI NATALE DI CALDEROLI E’ UN INSULTO ALL’ ITALIA E AL SUO PSEUDO-DECENTRAMENTO
description.content:
Carmine Gonnella on 22 Dicembre, 2010 00:11:00 | 6 numero letture
Dimensione caratteri
Nessuna novita' per questo articolo
Cari confratelli italiani federali in Italia e all’ Estero, sta per per terminare un anno e ci avviamo verso un nuovo, che a mio “modesto” avviso, sara’ piu’ buio dell’ oscurantismo. Il ministro delle semplificazioni Calderoli nella sua lettera ( qui pubblicata) non fa altro che darcene un preabolo. A partire dal suo “Cari fratelli padani”, un insulto all’ Italia e al suo psedo-decentramento. Veniamo ai fatti, Calderoli chiederebbe, un Senato Federale monopolizzato, con tutti ( o quasi ) i ministeri in padania, probabilmente anche il Senato Federale, senza pero’ il Fondo Prequativo* e il suo reale costo per la Nazione. Ancora oggi molti politici responsabili, fra questi Casini e Fini lo stanno chiedendo senza esito positivo, da parte sia di Calderoli, sia Tremonti.. Avere un Senato Federale, mantenendo lo status quo, di regioni, province, comuni e in aggiunta citta’ metropolitane, significa, semplicisticamente un ritorno al fedualismo medioevale, dove la parte dei pricipi e principini in futuro la faranno i padani. Sono loro stessi ad affermarlo:” Per essere totalmente padroni a casa nostra e per attuare completamente il Federalismo, infatti, dovremo infatti spostare i centri nevralgici dell’amministrazione pubblica dal centro al territorio: avere un Senato Federale, che sia espressione dei territori e abbia sede qui in Padania, e decentrare i ministeri da Roma alle nostre città, significherà avvicinare l’amministrazione, e le sue decisioni, ai cittadini, al tessuto produttivo e sociale e ai loro concreti bisogni.” Non vorrei qui gufare, ma a me questo federalismo, cosi’ come e’ stato demplificato, mi sembra sempre di piu’ solo un altra “porcata”. Le opposizioni ne prendano atto
*Fondo perequativo
Il fondo perequativo è a favore delle regioni con minore capacità fiscale per abitante.
Le quote del fondo sono assegnate senza vincolo di destinazione;
L’applicazione del principio di perequazione mira a ridurre le differenze tra i territori con diverse capacità fiscali per abitante senza alterarne l’ordine e senza impedirne la modifica nel tempo conseguente all’evoluzione del quadro economico-territoriale; Cosa garantisce il fondo perequativo:
1. integrale copertura delle spese corrispondenti al fabbisogno standard per i livelli essenziali delle prestazioni;
2. integrale copertura delle spese al fabbisogno standard;
Ricevono risorse dal Fondo perequativo le con minore capacità fiscale, ossia quelle nelle quali il gettito per abitante del tributo regionale è inferiore al gettito medio nazionale per abitante.
Il finanziamento delle funzioni trasferite alle regioni attraverso l’attuazione del federalismo fiscale comporta ovviamente la cancellazione dei relativi stanziamenti di spesa, comprensivi dei costi del personale e di funzionamento, nel bilancio dello Stato.

description.hltext_display: La risposta di Vittorio Porta Frigeri a Beppe Severgnini
description.content:
Invia un' e-mail ad un amico
A: Bcc: Il tuo indirizzo email: Messaggio:
Versione stampabile
del.icio.us
Digg this Il Popolo della Libertà on 23 Dicembre, 2010 00:16:00 | 2 numero letture
Dimensione caratteri
Nessuna novita' per questo articolo
Egregio Dott. Severgnini,
nel Suo editoriale "Uno straniero alla Scala" sul "Corriere" del 9 dicembre scorso, Lei in sostanza sostiene:
a) i tagli alle spese per la cultura, operati naturalmente dall'attuale Governo, sono intollerabili, pur concedendo che "il momento è economicamente difficile",
b) l'assenza del Ministro della Cultura alla prima della Scala è stata "imbarazzante e imbarazzata".
Da informazioni apparse successivamente sullo stesso "Corriere" e da altre fonti mediatiche, è risultato che in realtà:
a) i tagli piu' severi al bilancio del Ministero dei Beni culturali sono dovuti al Governo di sinistra dell' On. Prodi e precisamente alla Legge finanziaria del 2008, che ridusse di ben 150 milioni di Euro il già magro bilancio ministeriale;
b) il Ministro della Cultura non è intervenuto alla prima della Scala perchè impegnato nelle votazioni al Senato sulla Legge finanziaria.
Ho dovuto constatare con sorpresa e delusione che Lei non ha dato atto pubblicamente di queste precisazioni, non foss'altro per correttezza e per attribuire una validità "super partes" alla sua perorazione di fondo in favore della difesa e valorizzazione del patrimonio artistico e culturale del nostro Paese, certo condivisibile, anche se, a mio parere, "guastata" dall' insistenza stucchevole sugli stranieri come i migliori paladini dei tesori italici.
Poteva, tra l'altro, essere una occasione ghiotta per rilevare, con la Sua "verve" abituale, come il Ministro responsabile in primis dei detti tagli altro non fosse che il Prof. Padoa Schioppa, marito, per ironia della sorte, della nota giornalista Barbara Spinelli, che incessantemente fustiga il Governo in carica e la maggioranza di centrodestra, come colpevoli di tutti i mali dell'Italia, soprattutto nell'ambito della cultura e dell'istruzione.
Al di là di questi aspetti pur di grande rilevanza, ritengo comunque gravissimo il modo leggero e riduttivo con cui Lei ha trattato le violente manifestazioni davanti alla Scala come "protesta comprensibile" che "prendeva le solite, incomprensibili forme".
Le chiedo: "Cosa c'è di "incomprensibile"? Si tratta di "forme", cioè violenze di ogni genere, che si ripetono con schemi quasi immutabili almeno dagli anni '70 con la fredda determinazione di aggredire, ferire e distruggere.
Non ritiene che dopo una esperienza quarantennale, gli intellettuali potrebbero fare uno sforzo per non giungere sempre con colpevole, irrimediabile ritardo a riconoscere e stigmatizzare senza furbizie ed incertezze le pulsioni e le azioni sovversive e criminali dei gruppi estremisti di sinistra, all'occasione fiancheggiati da delinquenti vari e, sempre piu' spesso, da immigrati clandestini, dei quali ultimi viene "messa a frutto" la disperazione?
Non ritiene che vi sia grande saggezza negli accorati richiami sui pericoli della situazione da parte del Suo collega Gianpaolo Pansa, che da tempo pone in guardia contro gli episodi di intolleranza e di violenza fisica persino in occasione della presentazione di libri da parte di sindacalisti si', ma non graditi agli estremisti?
Nel passato, l'isterica opposizione al "regime democristiano" (ora sempre piu' rimpianto!) porto' la stragrande maggioranza dei cosiddetti uomini di cultura a sostenere ed incitare anche apertamente facinorosi, assassini e terroristi, con le drammatiche conseguenze che ben conosciamo. Dobbiamo forse attenderci che la analoga opposizione attuale al "regime di centrodestra" conduca a ripercorrere piu' o meno la sciagurata traiettoria di alcuni decenni fa?
Inaccettabile, infine, che Lei non abbia espresso il minimo apprezzamento per l'opera delle Forze dell'ordine a difesa della civile convivenza e non abbia nemmeno manifestato umana solidarietà e riconoscenza alla "quindicina" tra poliziotti e carabinieri feriti negli scontri, come se tali ferimenti dovessero essere considerati "normali".
Mi auguro che le selvagge violenze e distruzioni di ieri a Roma, da un lato, Le aprano gli occhi sui criminali autori delle stesse, e, dall'altro, Le ricordino l'umana comprensione che Pier Paolo Pasolini non ebbe timore di esprimere nei confronti degli appartenenti alla Polizia ed ai Carabinieri.
Distinti saluti,
Vittorio Porta Frigeri, giovedì 16 dicembre 2010

description.hltext_display: Литвин просит депутатов убрать принесенные плакаты
Lettera aperta di un poliziotto agli studenti: “Siamo con voi. In piazza per consentirvi di manifestare”
description.content:
Invia un' e-mail ad un amico
A: Bcc: Il tuo indirizzo email: Messaggio:
Versione stampabile
del.icio.us
Digg this Dimensione caratteri
Nessuna novita' per questo articolo
Discussione sulla violenza di piazza e di regime
''Io poliziotto, sono figlio e padre, e quando finisco di lavorare torno a casa dalla mia famiglia'', scrive Cudicio nella lettera pubblicata sul sito Grnet.it, il ''portale di informazione indipendente del comparto Difesa e Sicurezza''.
''Mia moglie mi chiama al cellulare e mi dice di non fare tardi. Io la tranquillizzo e le dico che tornerò prima possibile. Passano le ore e mi ritrovo in ospedale con la testa rotta. Studente, mi rivolgo a te, io sono consapevole che non sei stato tu, tu hai tutte le ragioni del mondo di manifestare per i tuoi diritti, ma quello che non sai forse è che noi poliziotti siamo con voi, siamo dalla vostra parte e non siamo contro nessuno''.
''Noi rappresentiamo lo Stato quando ci vedete in strada - continua la lettera - ma credimi siamo orgogliosi di farlo, amiamo il nostro lavoro ma siamo in piazza anche per voi. Per noi siete tutte persone che hanno diritto di manifestare e noi siamo in piazza perche' questo diritto sia rispettato. Non siamo li' per divertimento e facciamo di tutto, credimi studente, per evitare che qualcuno si faccia male. Certo gli ordini sono ordini e noi siamo obbligati ad eseguirli, ma sappiamo benissimo dove dobbiamo fermarci per il bene nostro e vostro. Abbiamo paura, sì tanta, a volte e in certi momenti forse sbagliamo, ma credimi, parlo con il cuore, quando ci troviamo tra due fronti, in mezzo alla guerriglia urbana è veramente dura''.
Maurizio Cudicio ha creato un gruppo su

description.hltext_display: Daspo per studenti da soli in piazza
description.content:
Un silenzio assordante avvolge tanti insegnanti, tanti adulti che non sanno e non vogliono sapere, tanti sindacati e sindacalisti in affanno, che non prendono iniziative, tanti intellettuali trincerati nelle loro dotte e inutili disquisizioni, lontani dalla realtà.
I leader dell’opposizione spendono solo flebili, occasionali parole sulla scuola ma non l’hanno mai messa realmente al centro del loro progetto politico. Ogni tanto si affacciano su una piazza, su un tetto, a un sit-in o a un convegno per esprimere un conforto verbale, un tiepido impegno, scampoli di promesse a cui non possono più credere neanche gli ostinati, volenterosi professionisti della speranza.
Chi ha messo invece la scuola al centro della sua agenda politica è stato, tenacemente, il Governo.
Non è vero che non ha fatto niente in questi due anni: ha fatto molto in realtà, bisognerebbe dirlo ai tanti giornalisti e ai tanti cittadini italiani che vanno ripetendo questa formula come un mantra vagamente consolatorio.
Con l’art. 64 della legge 133 dell’agosto del 2008 e con il relativo piano programmatico attuativo varato da Tremonti, la scuola statale italiana, già languente, è stata condannata a morte, complici i provvedimenti Gelmini, che hanno consentito lo smembramento strutturale dell’intero sistema, pezzo per pezzo. Ancora un ultimo anno, poi non resteranno più neppure le disiecta membra.
Perchè un tale accanimento?
All’indomani della sua ultima vittoria elettorale, Berlusconi indicava, in una puntata di Ballarò, i luoghi in cui si nascondevano i suoi nemici comunisti e dove li avrebbe, conseguentemente, stanati: nelle scuole, nella magistratura, tra i giornalisti, nelle televisioni.
Proprio in quest’ordine. Specificando ulteriormente: tra gli insegnanti medi.
L’urgenza personale di abbattere in primis quel nemico (del resto anche il più debole, non essendo una casta, non essendo un potere forte) ha intercettato il generale risentimento verso la pubblica amministrazione, ben incarnato dal ministro Brunetta, la cui acredine nei confronti dei lavoratori statali si tinge spesso di sfumature patologiche. Il disprezzo verso la cultura (roba inutile, che non si mangia), il pervicace convincimento, a dispetto di ogni evidenza, che il pensiero è semplice, e la necessità di rispettare il patto di stabilità imposto dall’Europa hanno infine consentito a Tremonti la quadratura del cerchio per mantenere i conti in ordine, ovvero tagliare gli sprechi dove non ce n’erano, licenziare il personale dove la catena di montaggio non si fermava, contenere la spesa pubblica con tagli draconiani nell’unico settore dove nessuno avrebbe significativamente reagito.
Del resto anche il Rapporto sull’istruzione della Fondazione Agnelli nel 2009 ci dice che “per la prima volta, nella storia recente della scuola italiana, l’evoluzione demografica del corpo-docente, con il considerevole incremento nel prossimo decennio dei flussi fisiologici di docenti in uscita e con la sospensione dell’immissione in ruolo dei precari, rende possibile avvicinare il rapporto insegnanti/studenti della scuola pubblica italiana alla media europea senza creare eccessive tensioni sociali”.
Troppo impegnati a difendere il nostro “particulare” e a non considerare prioritario il bene comune, come la nostra storia da sempre c’insegna, non abbiamo significativamente reagito ai tagli di 8 miliardi di euro decisi nell’agosto del 2008 mentre eravamo in vacanza e non volevamo essere disturbati da cattive notizie; non abbiamo significativamente reagito al mancato pagamento alle nostre scuole di un miliardo e mezzo di crediti residui; non abbiamo significativamente reagito alla mancata erogazione, per due anni, dei fondi per il funzionamento didattico e amministrativo; non abbiamo significativamente reagito all’espulsione di 130.000 nostri colleghi precari affatto superflui; non abbiamo significativamente reagito all’aumento progressivo del numero degli alunni per classe, alla mancata assunzione degli insegnanti della materia alternativa alla religione cattolica, o dei supplenti che ci sostituiscono quando noi ci assentiamo e dei docenti di sostegno per nostri alunni disabili; non abbiamo significamente reagito quando hanno deciso di calmierare la presenza di alunni stranieri nelle nostre scuole, senza capire che molti di loro, nati in Italia, sono italiani di fatto ma non di diritto; non abbiamo significativamente reagito al blocco del nostro contratto di lavoro, dei nostri scatti di anzianità maturati; non abbiamo significativamente reagito allo scippo della nostra contrattazione integrativa e, ora, del nostro TFS.
Quasi come se tutto questo non ci riguardasse. Ai limiti dello scollamento dalla realtà.
Ma, soprattutto, non abbiamo significativamente reagito all’affronto fatto alla nostra Costituzione, permettendo a questo Governo di privatizzare prima la scuola e ora l’Università; non abbiamo significativamente reagito all’affronto fatto all’istituzione democratica che dovremmo orgogliosamente rappresentare, la scuola, strumento di emancipazione culturale e di crescita sociale, palestra di cittadinanza critica, attiva e partecipativa. Non abbiamo significativamente reagito in difesa del diritto allo studio, all progettualità, al futuro dei nostri figli, dei nostri studenti, dei nostri futuri concittadini.
E oggi li lasciamo in piazza da soli, senza i sindacati e senza i partiti, questi ultimi troppo impegnati a sopravvivere a se stessi.
Li lasciamo da soli, senza di noi, adulti, educatori, genitori, cittadini responsabili e consapevoli, prigionieri della nostra ignavia.
Li lasciamo senza protezione, in balia della loro rabbia e dei facinorosi di professione, in balia di politicanti d’accatto pronti a screditarli, a offenderli, a insultarli, a provocarli. In balia di chi, in malafede, è pronto a strumentalizzare ogni loro sentimento, ogni loro comportamento. Non assegnamogli di nuovo l’intera “responsabilità sociale di rappresentare lo scontento di tutti noi”.
Se un residuo di dignità può essere ancora salvato dai ragazzini, che qualcuno di noi adulti sia insieme a loro, a mostrarla con loro.

description.hltext_display: 宗教局:中国天主教选领导人不需梵蒂冈“恩准”
description.content:
国家宗教事务局发言人就梵蒂冈指责中国天主教第八次代表会议发表谈话
新华网北京12月22日电 国家宗教事务局发言人22日就梵蒂冈发表声明指责中国天主教第八次代表会议一事发表谈话。
发言人说，12月17日，梵蒂冈新闻室公开发表声明，指责前不久召开的中国天主教第八次代表会议，攻击中国宗教信仰自由政策。梵蒂冈的这一行为不仅非常冒失，而且十分无理。
中国天主教代表会议是团结全国天主教徒、民主讨论教会发展途径、共商服务社会大计的重要组织形式。50多年来，中国天主教先后召开了八次全国代表会议，为推动中国天主教健康发展，服务祖国现代化建设，都发挥了重要作用。
中国天主教爱国会、中国天主教主教团是依法登记的合法社会团体，依据《社会团体登记管理条例》规定，每5年召开代表会议，修改章程，选举产生领导机构，确定工作任务和行动目标。中国天主教代表会议制度不涉及天主教教义问题，不违背天主教基本信仰，不存在其他国家或外国组织承认与否的问题。
中国宪法规定，中国公民享有宗教信仰自由权利，同时宗教团体和宗教事务不受外国势力支配。按照这一规定，中国各宗教包括天主教坚持独立自主自办的原则。中国天主教第八次代表会议审议通过的《中国天主教爱国会章程》和《中国天主教主教团章程》规定：中国天主教会“在政治、经济和教会事务上坚持独立自主自办原则，维护国家主权和教会事务自主权，与社会主义社会相适应”，在《中国天主教主教团章程》中还规定：“在信仰及福传事业上，依据主耶稣基督对宗徒们的派遣和圣神赋予宗徒们的权力，履行牧职使命，在当信当行的教义教规上，与宗徒之长伯多禄的继承人保持共融。”但在梵蒂冈新闻室发表的声明中声称，“独立自主自办教会及民主办教原则与天主教教义是无法调和的”，这是对中国天主教现状的误解，不知是他们根本没有看到章程规定，还是故意混淆政治与信仰的界限。梵蒂冈的政治立场是尽人皆知的，试图借宗教信仰推行政治理念，这是十分危险的，将对中国天主教在中国的健康发展带来严重危害。
代表会议制度是中国天主教在探索民主办教实践中形成的，中国政府予以充分尊重。近两三年来，梵蒂冈通过各种方式阻止中国天主教代表会议的召开，对参加会议的神职人员代表以“惩罚”进行威胁。到底是谁用强制手段对待宗教信仰，是谁要求天主教徒违背自己的“良心”，难道不是十分清楚吗？这让我们想起新中国刚建立时的那一幕，梵蒂冈驻华代表发出“指令”，要求中国天主教拒绝与新生政权合作。历史是那么相似，但时代毕竟进步了，固守旧思维已经办不成什么事情了。
中国天主教第八次代表会议选举产生了中国天主教爱国会和中国天主教主教团新一届领导机构，主要负责人都是高票当选，体现了与会代表的意愿和期盼，可谓众望所归。梵蒂冈新闻室声明却对他们进行谴责，这是对中国天主教会广大神长教友民主意愿的粗暴践踏和蔑视，是极其蛮横和无礼的行径。难道中国的宗教社会团体选举领导人，还要外国组织“钦定”或者“恩准”吗？
近年来，为了改善中梵关系，中方以极大诚意与梵方进行坦诚、建设性对话，寻求改善关系的途径和方式。但梵蒂冈总有一些人在关键时刻出来干扰，无休止地提出无理要求，阻挠双方改善关系的进程，此次破坏中国天主教代表会议，就是最新的典型例子。梵蒂冈还在接触商谈的同时，以公开和秘密方式干涉中国天主教内部事务，试图重新控制中国天主教会。中梵关系出现当前这种令人遗憾的局面，责任完全在梵方。
发言人说，中国政府改善中梵关系的原则是明确的，态度是真诚的。近年来，中方为改善中梵关系，在言论上一直保持克制，希望营造一个良好环境。但梵蒂冈的媒体以及有关人员，不断发表攻击性言论。我们的克制不等于可以放弃原则和底线，希望梵蒂冈谨言慎行，自我约束，不要再恶化双方关系，回到对话的正确轨道上来。

description.hltext_display: Trojans Check Win Against Knights Off Christmas List
description.author: George Edgar
description.content:
jSINGconf.videoPlayers['olympic-vs-bremerton-girls-basketball'] = }, params: }, attrs: }, installSWFURL: 'http://media.kitsapsun.com/corp_assets/asphalt/swf/expressInstall.swf', embedParams: } }; BREMERTON — The Christmas wish list for the Olympic Trojans didn’t include a win over the Bremerton Knights. Coach Laurie Shaw told her team it wouldn’t work that way.
“Before the game I reminded the team of the six Ws,” Shaw said. “Work will win when wishing won’t.’”
So the Trojans didn’t wish for the win, they worked hard and earned a 57-49 Olympic League victory over the Knights.
The Trojans pushed the tempo for most of the game, thanks to a solid contribution from the bench. Shaw said she wanted her reserves to get some good minutes and some points.
“We knew we had to push the tempo,” Shaw said. “To do that, we needed our reserves to play for minutes to spell some people. I may have played some people too long, but for the most part, we did what we needed to do.”
Malia Lagat, a 5-foot-3 guard, came off the bench to lead the Trojans (3-5 overall, 3-3 league) with 14 points. Lagat capped an 11-point run over the first and second quarters with a layup that put Olympic ahead 17-6 early in the second quarter.
Starting forward Shannon Jackson added 12 points and grabbed 13 rebounds to give Olympic an inside presence against the taller Knights.
“Going into the game, we saw she was working hard offensively and defensively, and grabbing rebounds,” Shaw said. “We like what we see in Shannon.”
“It was a real good game tonight,” Jackson said. “There was lots of good inside competition.”
Jackson held her own against Kourtney Carpenter, one half of Bremerton’s twin tower combination. With her sister Jalen still out with a knee injury, the 6-0 Kourtney led the Knights (3-6, 2-4) with 19 points and 12 rebounds.
Carpenter hit a 3-pointer early in the fourth quarter to bring the Knights to within two points at 38-36, but that was as close as they got. The Trojans scored the next eight points.
Freshman forward Sawyer Kluge scored 15 points, including a pair of baskets to end the third quarter. Sharnaee Grettenberger also added 10 points, 12 rebounds, and four assists.
“I wanted someone else to score with Jalen down,” Lindgren said. “I want everyone to get at least ten points; it’s tough enough to divide them between two scorers.
“The injury hit us hard,” Lindgren added, “but now everyone else is a go-to person.”
Both teams will have one more non-league game over the holiday break. Olympic plays next Wednesday against Tumwater, while Bremerton plays on Dec. 30 at Fife.
Olympic 57, Bremerton 49
Bremerton 6 13 14 16 — 49
Olympic 10 16 10 21 — 57

description.hltext_display: Homeless warning over benefit cut
description.content:
Government cutbacks on housing benefit are likely to leave many people struggling to pay their rent and forced to move to cheaper areas, a cross-party parliamentary committee has warned.
The House of Commons Work and Pensions Committee urged the Government to monitor the impact of the changes and be prepared to increase the 190 million fund it has set aside to smooth the transition to the new system and help local authorities deal with possible increases in homelessness.
The committee said it was not possible to predict how many landlords would respond to the benefit reductions by cutting rents, as ministers hope. While some would do so, their response will vary in different parts of the country depending on local market conditions.
The MPs also expressed unease at plans to cut Housing Benefit by 10% after a year out of work.
They urged ministers to come forward with "a more nuanced approach", recognising the difference between disabled people and single parents who find it difficult to get into work and those who are simply not trying to find a job.
Changes to Housing Benefit were announced in Chancellor George Osborne's emergency budget in June in a bid to cut the 17 billion annual cost of the payout, claimed by 4.75 million households.
Maximum weekly rates are to be capped at 400 a week and payments will be reduced by linking them to the cheapest 30% of properties in a neighbourhood, rather than the average rent.
In an inquiry into the changes, some witnesses told the committee that an increase in evictions and homelessness was "inevitable".
In its report, the committee said it supported the Government in its goal of managing the costs of Housing Benefit and agreed that support for the housing costs of low-income families should provide value for taxpayers' money.
Committee chair Anne Begg said: "It is difficult to judge at the moment to what extent Housing Benefit claimants will change their behaviour as a result of these proposals. The Government hopes that people will be able to find cheaper accommodation in cheaper areas and that private landlords will be willing to reduce their rents to Local Housing Allowance claimants, so that the new levels will not result in an increase in homelessness."
